entry.defn: measure word [for boats or ships] 兩艘油船 Liǎng sōu yóuchuán two tankers 一艘飛船 Yī sōu fēichuán a spaceship 四艘巡洋艦 sì sōu xúnyángjiàn four cruisers
telepathy

verb piece together; join together 把兩塊木板拼起來 Bǎ liǎng kuài mùbǎn pīn qǐlai join the two boards together verb ready to risk one's life (in battle, work, etc.); go all out in doing sth. 拼到底 pīn dàodǐ fight to the bitter end 拼得一枚銀牌 pīn de yī méi yínpái fight desperately to get a silver medal
sense of achievement

verb prescribe (or set) a limit to; limit; restrict 限定時間完成 Xiàndìng shíjiān wánchéng set a time limit for completion 參加這次座談會的人數限定為四十人。 Cānjiā zhècì zuòtánhuì de rénshù xiàndìng wéi sìshí rén. Participation in the forum will be limited to 40.

adverb 1 [often used correlatively with 不管, 無論, etc.] in any case; at any rate; anyway 老王來不來還沒決定, 反正小張一定來。 Lǎo wáng lái bù lái hái méi juédìng, fǎnzheng xiǎo zhāng yīdìng lái. Lao Wang hasn’t made up his mind whether to come or not; anyway Xiao Zhang is coming. 不管怎麼樣, 反正工作不能停。 Bùguǎn zěnmeyàng, fǎnzheng gōngzuò bù néng tíng. Come what may, the work must go on. 無論你怎麼說, 反正我不答應。 Wúlùn nǐ zěnme shuō, fǎnzheng wǒ bù dāying. No matter what you say, I won’t agree. 2 since; as 反正得去一個人, 就讓我去吧！ Fǎnzheng de qù yī ge rén, jiù ràng wǒ qù ba! Since someone has to go anyway, let me go. 反正路不遠, 咱們就走著去吧！ Fǎnzheng lù bù yuǎn, zánmen jiù zǒuzhe qù ba! As it’s not far, we might as well go on foot. 反正你不是外人, 我也就不客氣了。 Fǎnzheng nǐ bù shì wài rén, wǒ yě jiù bù kèqi le. Since you’re my friend, I won’t stand on ceremony.
noun dialect (beef) brisket
noun scenic spot 觀光景點 guānguāng jǐngdiǎn scenic spot; sight

adjective special; specialized 專門的款項 zhuānmén de kuǎnxiàng special fund 專門研究化學 Zhuānmén yánjiū huàxué specialize in chemistry adverb for a particular purpose; specially 專門為兒童寫的故事 zhuānmén wèi értóng xiě de gùshi stories specially written for children 今後你就專門搞會計工作吧。 jīnhòu nǐ jiù zhuānmén gǎo kuàijì gōngzuò ba. From now on you’d best concentrate on accounting alone.
noun 1 gravity 2 attraction 這部電影對觀眾很有吸引力。 Zhè bù diànyǐng duì guānzhòng hěn yǒu xīyǐnlì. This film has strong audience appeal.

noun 1 interval; gap; space 利用工作間隙收集資料 Lìyòng gōngzuò jiànxì shōují zīliào find free time to gather material 利用戰鬥間隙進行休整 lìyòng zhàndòu jiànxì jìnxíng xiūzhěng rest, train and consolidate between battles 2 mechanics clearance 齒輪間隙 chǐlún jiànxì gear clearance 凈空離地間隙 jìngkōng lídì jiànxì ground clearance

verb 1 mix; confuse 混在一起 hùn zài yīqǐ mix things up 這是兩碼事, 不要搞混了。 Zhè shì liǎng mǎ shì, bùyào gǎo hùn le. These are entirely different things, don’t mix them up. 2 pass for; pass off as 混冒 hùn mào disguise oneself as 3 colloquial muddle along; drift along 連口飯都混不上 Lián kǒu fàn dōu hùn bù shàng barely make a living 我是混一天算一天。 Wǒ shì hùn yī tiān suàn yī tiān. I muddle along from day to day. 4 colloquial get along with sb. 同他們混得很熟 Tóng tāmen hùn de hěn shú be very familiar with them adverb thoughtlessly; recklessly; irresponsibly 混出主意 hùn chū zhǔyi make thoughtless suggestions
Japanese chess (shōgi)
noun story (or plot) of a play or opera 劇情發展 jùqíng fāzhǎn development of dramatic action

verb 1 work; labour 不勞則無獲。 bù láo zé wú huò. No pains, no gains. 2 strain; exercise hard 勞其筋骨, 苦其心志 láo qí jīngǔ, kǔ qí xīnzhì get stronger through tough training; go through both mental and physical hardships 3 polite expression [asking a favour of sb., also 有勞] put sb. to the trouble of 勞你幫個忙。 Láo nǐ bāng ge máng. Would you please do me a favour? or Could you give me a hand? 4 express one's appreciation (to the performer of a task); reward noun 1 fatigue; toil 2 meritorious deed; service; achievements 汗馬之勞 Hàn mǎ zhī láo distinctions won in battle; war exploits 3 labourer; labour 勞多田少 láo duō tián shǎo too many hands and too little land 4 (Láo) a surname

noun 1 archaic ancient cooking vessel with two loop handles and three or four legs 三足鼎 Sān zú dǐng tripod 四足鼎 sì zú dǐng quadripod 2 dialect pot 3 state power; the throne 問鼎 wèndǐng intend to seize state power; usurp power; try to win a championship; aim for the top adjective literary courteous great; generous 鼎助 dǐngzhù your kind and generous help verb literary enter upon a period of 鼎盛 dǐngshèng in a period of prosperity; at the height of prosperity

conjunction so; therefore; for this reason; consequently 雪融化時吸收熱量, 氣溫因此下降。 Xuě rónghuà shí xīshōu rèliàng, qìwēn yīncǐ xiàjiàng. Melting snow absorbs heat, and so makes the temperature drop. 她的話引得大家都笑了, 室內的空氣因此輕鬆了很多。 Tā de huà yǐndé dàjiā dōu xiào le, shìnèi de kōngqì yīncǐ qīngsōng le hěn duō. What she said set everyone laughing, and consequently the party livened up a lot.
noun 1 physics energy 能量轉化 Néngliàng zhuǎnhuà energy conversion 2 capabilities 他們人數雖少, 能量卻很大。 Tāmen rénshù suī shǎo, néngliàng què hěn dà. They may be few in number, but they can do a great deal.
noun vaccine 疫苗接種 yì miáo jiē zhòng vaccination 乙肝疫苗 yǐgān yìmiáo hepatitis B virus vaccine 給孩子接種疫苗以預防天花 gěi háizi jiēzhòng yìmiáo yǐ yùfáng tiānhuā vaccinate the child against smallpox

verb lose 失去控制 shīqù kòngzhì get out of hand; get out of control 失去平衡 shīqù pínghéng lose balance 失去妻子 shīqù qīzi be bereaved of one’s wife 失去時效 shīqù shíxiào be no longer effective; cease to be in force 失去信心 shīqù xìnxīn lose confidence 失去作用 shīqù zuòyòng lose effect 失去自製 Shīqù zìzhì lose control of oneself; forget oneself 失去一切希望 shīqù yīqiè xīwàng be bereft of all hope 失去知覺 Shīqù zhījué lose consciousness 失去中國國籍 shīqù Zhōngguó guójí forfeit one’s Chinese citizenship
dialect bicycle
noun pickled vegetables; pickles 朝鮮泡菜 Cháoxiǎn pàocài Kimchi 四川泡菜 Sìchuān pàocài Sichuan pickles

verb 1 burn 燒穿 shāo chuān burn through 燒成灰燼 shāo chéng huījìn burn to ashes 把帽子燒了一個洞 Bǎ màozi shāo le yī ge dòng burn a hole in one’s hat 乾柴好燒。 Gānchái hǎo shāo. Wood burns better (or more easily) when dry. 這臺鍋爐燒油。 Zhè tái guōlú shāo yóu. This furnace burns oil. 2 cook; heat; bake; roast 燒炭 Shāo tàn make charcoal 燒磚 Shāozhuān bake (or fire) bricks 燒一點兒水 shāo yīdiǎnr shuǐ heat up some water 水燒開了。 Shuǐ shāo kāi le. The water is boiling. 3 stew after frying or fry after stewing 燒茄子 shāo qiézi stewed eggplant 4 roast 燒乳豬 shāo rǔzhū roast suckling pig 5 run a fever; have a temperature 病人燒得厲害。 Bìngrén shāo de lìhai. The patient’s running a high fever. or The patient has a high temperature. 6 damage (or injure) by excessive (or improper) use of fertilizer 上的肥太多, 把根兒都燒壞了。 Shàng de féi tài duō, bǎ gēnr dōu shāohuài le. Overfertilization burned the roots. noun fever 燒退了。 Shāo tuì le. The fever is down. adjective colloquial swollen-headed 被成功燒得飄飄然 bèi chénggōng shāo de piāopiāorán be carried away by success 他讓錢燒得慌。 tā ràng qián shāodehuang. The money is burning a hole in his pocket. 她買彩票中了頭獎, 燒得不知怎麼才好。 Tā mǎi cǎipiào zhōng le tóujiǎng, shāo de bùzhī zěnme cáihǎo. She’s forgetting herself because she has hit the jackpot.
verb wink; twinkle (一)瞬間 shùnjiān instant; in the twinkling of an eye; in a split second; in a flash

verb 1 evaporate See 36050688蒸氣zheng1qi4蒸氣 2 steam 蒸飯 Zhēngfàn steam rice 菜涼了, 蒸一蒸吧。 cài liáng le, zhēng yī zhēng ba. The food is cold. Let’s warm it up in the steamer. 3 have a hot steam bath 蒸桑拿 zhēng sāngná have a sauna
noun allusion; literary quotation
1 medicinal herb (genus Mesona) 2 grass jelly

verb 1 give birth to 生兒育女 shēng'éryùnǚ have children 2 rear; raise; bring up 育蠶 yùcán raise silkworms 育花 yùhuā cultivate flowers 育草 yùcǎo cultivate grass 育嬰 yùyīng feed and take care of babies 3 educate noun education 德育 déyù moral education
verb mix; blend; mingle 客貨混合列車 kè huò hùnhé lièchē mixed train

noun appointment; engagement; date 訂個約會 Dìng ge yuēhui make an appointment 事務性約會 Shìwùxìng yuēhui business appointment 我今天晚上有個約會。 Wǒ jīntiān wǎnshang yǒu ge yuēhui. I have an engagement this evening. verb arrange a meeting; make an appointment 大伙兒約會好在這兒碰頭。 Dàhuǒr yuēhui hǎo zài zhèr pèngtóu. We’ve arranged to meet here. 他們約會過我, 我沒去。 Tāmen yuēhui guò wǒ, wǒ méi qù. They invited me, but I didn’t go.

noun use; good 抱怨有什麼用處？ Bàoyuàn yǒu shénme yòngchu？ What’s the use (or good) of complaining? 不要扔掉, 將來會有用處。 Bùyào rēngdiào, jiānglái huì yǒu yòng chu. Don’t throw it away; it may come in handy. 這兩件東西, 各有各的用處。 Zhè liǎng jiàn dōngxi, gè yǒu gè de yòngchu. Each of the two things has its own use.
traditional form of Chinese, as opposed to simplified form 簡體jiǎntǐ [簡體]

conjunction even; even if; even though; even granted that; notwithstanding 即使下雨我也去。 Jíshǐ xiàyǔ wǒ yě qù. I’ll go anyway even if it rains. 即使跟我沒有關係, 我也要管。 Jíshǐ gēn wǒ méiyǒu guānxi, wǒ yě yào guǎn. I shall make it my business even if it had nothing to do with me. 即使條件再好, 也還要靠自己努力。 Jíshǐ tiáojiàn zài hǎo, yě hái yào kào zìjǐ nǔlì. No matter how favourable the conditions are, we’ll still rely on our own efforts.
noun transliteration humour; funny side; funniness 黑色幽默 hēisè yōumò black humour adjective humourous 他很幽默。 Tā hěn yōumò. He’s full of humour. or He is very humorous.

noun expression; indication 友好的表示 Yǒuhǎo de biǎoshì expression of friendship; friendly gesture 接吻是愛的表示。 jiēwěn shì ài debiǎoshì. Kissing is a sign of affection. verb show; express; indicate 表示憤慨 Biǎoshì fènkǎi voice (or express) one’s indignation 表示關切 biǎoshì guānqiè show concern 表示歉意 biǎoshì qiànyì offer one’s regrets; offer an apology 表示熱烈歡迎 biǎoshì rèliè huānyíng extend a warm welcome 發高燒表示有病。 Fā gāoshāo biǎoshì yǒu bìng. A high fever indicates sickness. 我們謹向你們表示衷心的祝賀。 Wǒmen jǐn xiàng nǐmen biǎoshì zhōngxīn de zhùhè. We wish to convey to you our hearty congratulations.
1 to roll 2 to turn over 3 to invert 4 to flip

verb create; produce; bring about 創造奇跡 chuàngzào qíjì create miracles; work wonders; achieve prodigious feats 創造新紀錄 chuàngzào xīn jìlù set (or create) a new record 創造優異成績 chuàngzào yōuyì chéngjì produce excellent results 創造有利條件 chuàngzào yǒulì tiáojiàn create favourable conditions 人民是創造世界歷史的動力。 Rénmín shì chuàngzào shìjiè lìshǐ de dònglì. The people are the motive force in the making of world history. noun creation; innovation 展現中華民族智慧的偉大創造 zhǎnxiàn Zhōnghuá mínzú zhìhuì de wěidà chuàngzào great innovation showing the wisdom of the Chinese nation
verb lay in; lay up; store; deposit 儲存餘糧 Chǔcún yúliáng store up surplus grain 儲存戰略物資 chǔcún zhànlüè wùzī stockpile strategic materials 把錢儲存在銀行裡 bǎ qián chǔcún zài yínháng lǐ deposit money in a bank

noun summary; brief account; outline 史略 shǐlüè historical outline 事略 shìlüè biographical sketch verb omit; delete; leave out 略去不提 lüèqùbùtí make no mention of; leave out altogether 略去細節 lüèqù xìjié leave out the details adjective brief; sketchy (opp. 詳) 該詳就詳, 該略就略 gāi xiáng jiù xiáng, gāi lüè jiù lüè be detailed or brief as is required 這個提綱寫得太略了。 Zhège tígāng xiě de tài lüè le. This outline is rather too sketchy. adverb literary slightly; a little; somewhat 略表寸心 lüèbiǎocùnxīn just to show my appreciation; as a small token of goodwill 略有出入 lüè yǒu chū-rù vary slightly; there’s a slight discrepancy 略有所聞 lüèyǒusuǒwén have heard a little about the matter noun strategy; plan; scheme 策略 cèlüè strategy 方略 fānglüè plan; scheme verb capture; seize 攻城略地 gōngchéng-lüèdì attack cities and seize territories

adjective exaggerate; overstate; be pompous 誇張的語言 kuāzhāng de yǔyán inflated language; bombast 你這樣說未免太誇張了。 Nǐ zhèyàng shuō wèimiǎn tài kuāzhāng le. I’m afraid you’ve been exaggerating. noun rhetoric hyperbole 誇張色彩 kuāzhāng sècǎi hyperbole colouring 藝術誇張 yìshù kuāzhāng artistic exaggeration
pronoun at that time; then; in those days 那時正是冬天。 Nàshí zhèng shì dōngtiān. It was wintertime then.

noun 1 silk 2 threadlike thing 銅絲 tóngsī copper wire (蜘)蛛絲 zhīzhūsī thread spun by a spider; cobweb 把土豆切成細絲兒 bǎ tǔdòu qiē chéng xì sīr cut the potatoes into fine shreds; shred the potatoes 3 stringed instruments See 30756096絲竹si1zhu2絲竹 measure word 1 a thread or shred of 一絲亮光 yī sī liàngguāng a thread of light 這盤菜裡一絲兒肉也見不著。 Zhè pán cài lǐ yī sīr ròu yě jiàn bu zháo. Not a single shred of meat can be found in this dish. 2 si a a traditional unit of length, equal to 0.00001 chi (市尺), and equivalent to 3.333 microns b a traditional unit of weight, equal to 0.000001 jin (市斤), and equivalent to 0.5 milligram or 0.0075 grain 3 a tiny bit; trace 一絲不差 yīsībùchà not a bit of difference 一絲風也沒有。 Yī sī fēng yě méiyǒu. There isn’t a breath of air. 她臉上沒有一絲笑容。 Tā liǎnshàng méiyǒu yī sī xiàoróng. There isn’t a trace of a smile on her face. 4 one ten-thousandth of certain units of measure See 30753024絲米si1mi3絲米

verb literary arrive; reach 至京次日 zhì jīng cìrì the day after I arrived in Beijing 有風颯然而至。 Yǒu fēng sàrán ér zhì. There was a noisy gust of wind. preposition to; until 從早至晚 cóng zǎo zhì wǎn from morning till night 從左至右 Cóng zuǒ zhì yòu from left to right 至上月底為止 zhìshàng yuèdǐ wéizhǐ up to the end of last month adverb literary extremely; most 是為至盼。 Shì wéi zhì pàn. That is our sincerest hope. See 77444835至囑zhi4zhu3至囑
verb lose face; disgraced; embarrassed 這不是丟臉的事。 Zhè bù shì diūliǎn de shì. There’s nothing to be ashamed of. or This is not shameful.

verb make a detour; go by a roundabout route 前面有個水庫, 我們得繞道過去。 Qiánmian yǒu ge shuǐkù, wǒmen děi ràodào guòqu. There’s a reservoir ahead. We’ll have to make a detour. 你別一見難事就繞道走。 Nǐ bié yī jiàn nánshì jiù ràodào zǒu. Don’t always try to skirt round difficulties.
for example; for instance

noun hero 英雄本色 yīngxióng běnsè true quality of a hero 女英雄 nǚyīngxióng heroine 人民英雄 rénmín yīngxióng people’s heroes 傳奇式的英雄 chuánqí shì de yīngxióng legendary hero adjective heroic 英雄氣概 yīngxióng qìgài heroic spirit; mettle 英雄行為 yīngxióng xíngwéi heroic deeds 英雄業績 yīngxióng yèjì heroic exploits
noun 1 Bodhisattva 觀音菩薩 Guānyīn púsà the Bodhisattva Guanyin 2 Buddha; deity; god 3 figurative kind-hearted person

verb know 誰曉得！ Shuí xiǎode! Who knows! 明天你要提早十分鐘來啊！——我曉得。 Míngtiān nǐ yào tízǎo shífēn zhōng lái a! ——Wǒ xiǎode. You must get here ten minutes earlier tomorrow. —I know. See 31400448天曉得tian1xiao3de5天曉得

noun form; shape 藝術形式 yìshù xíngshì art form 組織形式 zǔzhī xíngshì organizational makeup 形式地看問題 Xíngshì de kàn wèntí consider a question in a mechanical way 以公開信形式提出建議 yǐ gōngkāixìn xíngshì tíchū jiànyì put suggestions in the form of an open letter 那次選舉只不過是個形式。 Nà cì xuǎnjǔ zhǐ buguò shì ge xíngshì. The elections were conducted only as a matter of form.
noun 1 banker (in a gambling game) 2 finance market maker
informal eunuch
noun soap 一塊肥皂 yīkuàir féizào a cake (or piece) of soap 一條肥皂 yī tiáo féizào a bar of soap
remain silent
verb dehumidify
noun memory (opp. 忘性) 記性好 Jìxing hǎo have a good memory 記性壞 jìxing huài have a poor (or short) memory

noun 1 means 生產資料 shēngchǎnzīliào means of production 2 data; material 參考資料 cānkǎo zīliào reference material 搜集資料 sōují zīliào gather material; collect data 詳細資料 xiángxì zīliào detailed data 有資料顯示…… Yǒu zīliào xiǎnshì…… Data indicates that ...

verb 1 literary raise (opp. 俯) 仰頭 yǎngtóu raise one’s head; raise one’s eyes 2 face upward 仰著睡 Yǎng zhe shuì sleep on one’s back 3 admire; respect; look up to 瞻仰 zhānyǎng look at with reverence 4 rely on 仰人度日 yǎng rén dùrì live on others 5 dated [used in official documents, transmitting orders or requests] 仰即遵照。 Yǎngjízūnzhào. We hope that you will act accordingly at once. 仰請允準。 Yǎngqǐngyǔnzhǔn. We beg for your kind permission.

verb match; balance; correspond to; about equal to; commensurate with 得失相當。 Dé-shī xiāngdāng. The gains balance the losses. 兩隊實力相當。 Liǎng duì shílì xiāngdāng. The two teams are about equal in strength. 他們倆年齡相當。 Tāmen liǎ niánlíng xiāngdāng. They are well-matched in age. or They’re about the same age. 你的月薪相當(於)我的兩倍。 nǐ de yuèxīn xiāngdāng wǒ de liǎng bèi. Your salary is twice mine. 這筆錢大概相當(於)我三個月的開銷。 Zhè bǐ qián dàgài xiāngdāng wǒ sān ge yuè de kāixiao. This amount is about what I spend in three months. 水壩高達七十八米, 相當於二十層的大樓。 Shuǐbà gāo dá qīshíbā mǐ, xiāngdāngyú èrshí céng de dàlóu. The dam is 78 metres high, as tall as a 20-storey building. adjective suitable; fit; appropriate 他一時想不出相當的字眼來。 Tā yīshí xiǎng bù chū xiāngdāng de zìyǎn lái. At the time he couldn’t think of a suitable word for it. 這個工作還沒有找到相當的人。 Zhège gōngzuò hái méiyǒu zhǎodào xiāngdāng de rén. We haven’t found a good person for the job yet. adverb quite; considerably 相當好 Xiāngdāng hǎo quite good 演出相當成功。 Yǎnchū xiāngdāng chénggōng. The performance was a total success.
noun 1 courteous teacher 2 military division commander
noun shop; store 雜貨鋪兒 záhuòpùr general store noun plank bed 床鋪 chuángpù bed noun 1 archaic courier station 2 [in place names] 五裡鋪 wǔ lǐ pù Wulipu 十裡鋪 Shílǐpù Shilipu

verb glance over; skim through; browse 瀏覽報章雜誌 liúlǎn bàozhāng-zázhì browse through newspapers and magazines 這本書我只瀏覽過一遍。 Zhè běn shū wǒ zhǐ liúlǎn guò yī biàn. I’ve only skimmed through (or glanced over) the book.

noun monster; demon 鬼怪 guǐguài evil spirit adjective 1 strange; odd; queer; bewildering 怪現象 guàixiànxiàng something quite unusual 你說怪不怪？ Nǐ shuō guài bù guài？ Isn’t this strange? 他這個人真怪！ Tā zhège rén zhēn guài! He’s rather odd. 他不來才怪呢。 Tā bù lái cái guài ne. I would be surprised if he doesn’t come. or Of course he’ll come! 2 find sth. strange; wonder at 那有什麼可怪的？ Nà yǒu shénme kě guài de？ There’s nothing strange about that! or Nothing to be surprised at! adverb colloquial quite; rather 怪不好意思的 guài bù hǎoyìsi de feel rather embarrassed 箱子怪沉的。 Xiāngzi guài chén de. The suitcase is pretty heavy. verb blame 不能怪他們。 Bù néng guài tāmen. They’re not to blame. or It’s not their fault. 怪我沒講清楚。 Guài wǒ méi jiǎng qīngchu. It’s my fault for not making things clearer.

verb 1 put up; build 搭窩 dāwō build a nest 搭帳篷 dā zhàngpeng pitch a tent 搭一個臨時舞臺 Dā yī ge línshí wǔtái put up a makeshift stage 2 hang over; put over 把洗好的衣服搭在繩上 bǎ xǐ hǎo de yīfu dā zài shéng shàng hang the washing on a line 3 come into contact; join 搭上關係 dāshang guānxi strike up a relationship with; establish contact with 前言不搭後語 qiányán bù dā hòuyǔ speak incoherently 4 throw in (more people, money, etc.); add 你忙不過來, 給你搭個人吧。 Nǐ mángbuguòlai, gěi nǐ dā gèrén ba. You’re terribly busy. We’ll send someone to help you. 5 lift sth. together 請幫我把這包大米搭上卡車。 qǐng bāng wǒ bǎ zhè bāo dàmǐ dā shàng kǎchē. Please help me lift the bag of rice onto the truck. 6 take (a ship, plane, etc.); travel (or go) by 搭輪船去上海 Dā lúnchuán qù Shànghǎi go to Shanghai by boat 搭某人的車走 dā mǒurén de chē zǒu get a lift in sb.’s car 7 combine 各種食物要搭著吃, 以保證營養均衡。 gèzhǒng shíwù yào dā zháochī, yǐ bǎozhèng yíngyǎng jūnhéng. Various kinds of food should be combined in diet to ensure balanced nutrition.

noun senior (person); elder; older generation (opp. 後輩) 革命前輩 gémìng qiánbèi revolutionaries of the older generation 他們都是我的前輩。 Tāmen dōu shì wǒ de qiánbèi. They are all my seniors. 在書法方面你是前輩。 zài shūfǎ fāngmiàn nǐ shì qiánbèi. You are our venerable senior in calligraphy.

noun 1 order; command 命令式的口氣 mìnglìng shì de kǒuqì commanding tone; peremptory 下命令 xià mìnglìng issue an order 服從命令 fúcóng mìnglìng obey orders 2 computing command ＤＯＳ命令 ＤＯＳmìnglìng DOS command verb order; command 連長命令一排擔任警戒。 Liánzhǎng mìnglìng yī pái dānrèn jǐngjiè. adjective smooth; successful; without a hitch 工作正在順利進行。 Gōngzuò zhèngzài shùnlì jìnxíng. The work is going on smoothly. 會議進行得很順利。 Huìyì jìnxíng de hěn shùnlì. The meeting went off without a hitch. 在順利的情況下, 要看到還會有困難。 Zài shùnlì de qíngkuàng xià, yào kàndào hái huì yǒu kùnnan. When circumstances are favourable, we must not forget that there will still be difficulties.

measure word [usu. for sth. roundish] 一顆黃豆 yī kē huángdòu a soya bean 一顆炸彈 yī kē zhàdàn a bomb 無數顆星星 wúshù kē xīngxing an uncountable number of stars 他臉上的汗珠子一顆顆往下掉。 Tā liǎnshàng de hànzhū zi yī kē kē wǎng xià diào. Beads of sweat were dripping down from his face.

一種以電動馬達及輸送帶, 運送行人上、下樓層的裝置。行人所站階梯一路保持水平或微斜升、降, 兩旁設有與階梯同步移動的扶手, 供使用者扶握。也作「自動扶梯」、「電扶梯」、「電動扶梯」。【陸】也作「步行電梯」、「滾梯」。
verb [as aux.] should; ought to 應當不成問題。 Yīngdāng bù chéng wèntí. There should be no problem. 咱們是同事, 應當互相幫助。 zánmen shì tóngshì, yīngdāng hùxiāng bāngzhù. As colleagues we ought to help each other.

verb 1 float; drift 樹葉在水面上浮動。 Shùyè zài shuǐmiàn shàng fúdòng. Leaves were floating on the water. 2 fluctuate 物價飛漲, 人心浮動。 Wùjià fēizhǎng, rénxīn fúdòng. With the soaring of prices, there was a growing feeling of insecurity. 3 economics float 貨幣共同浮動 Huòbì gòngtóng fúdòng joint currency float

verb 1 play with; fool with 小孩子愛弄沙土。 Xiǎoháizi ài nòng shātǔ. Children like to play in the sand. 你別弄鬧鐘了。 Nǐ bié nòng nàozhōng le. Stop playing with that alarm clock. 2 do; manage; handle; get sb. or sth. into a specified condition 弄飯 nòngfàn prepare a meal; cook 他把衣服弄髒了。 Tā bǎ yīfu nòng zāng le. He got his clothes dirty. 弄得不好, 就會前功盡棄。 Nòng de bù hǎo, jiù huì qiángōngjìnqì. If we don’t do well now, all our previous work will be wasted. 他這一說反把我弄糊塗了。 Tā zhè yī shuō fǎn bǎ wǒ nòng hútu le. His explanation only confused me more. 我來不及了, 你幫我弄弄吧。 Wǒ láibují le, nǐ bāng wǒ nòng nòng ba. I’m short of time so please do it for me. 有些問題還需要弄清楚。 Yǒuxiē wèntí hái xūyào nòng qīngchu. Certain questions remain to be clarified. 3 get; fetch 你去弄點兒水來。 Nǐ qù nòng diǎnr shuǐ lái. Go and get some water. 4 play 弄手段 nòng shǒuduàn play tricks
adverb perhaps; maybe 她或許能來。 Tā huòxǔ néng lái. She might come. 他或許沒有趕上火車。 Tā huòxǔ méiyǒu gǎnshàng huǒchē. Perhaps he has missed the train.

adverb 1 at long last; finally 會議一再延期, 現在總算開成了。 Huìyì yīzài yánqī, xiànzài zǒngsuàn kāi chéng le. noun 1 standard; norm; criterion 準則 zhǔnzé standard 2 rule; regulation 法則 fǎzé rule; law verb literary imitate; follow 則先烈之言行 zé xiānliè zhī yán-xíng follow the example of the martyrs in word and deed measure word [for news, writing, etc.] piece; item 新聞一則 xīnwén yī zé an item of news 寓言四則 yùyán sìzé four fables conjunction literary 1 [indicating cause, condition, etc.] 少則幾年, 多則幾十年 Shǎo zé jǐ nián, duō zé jǐshí nián several years at least and several decades at most; between several years and several decades 不戰則已, 戰則必勝。 Bù zhàn zé yǐ, zhàn zé bìshèng. Fight no battle unless victory is sure. 物體熱則脹, 冷則縮。 Wùtǐ rè zé zhàng, lěng zé suō. Objects expand when heated and contract when cooled. 2 [indicating concession, contrast, etc.] 好則好, 只是太貴。 Hǎo zé hǎo, zhǐ shì tài guì. It’s good but too expensive. 今則不然。 Jīn zé bùrán. However, things are quite different today. auxiliary [listing reasons, preceded by 一, 二, 三, or 一, 再, 三] 這篇課文不合適, 一則太長, 二則太難。 Zhè piān kèwén bù héshì, yīzé tài cháng, èrzé tài nán. verb 1 request; ask 請人來修機器 Qǐng rén lái xiū jīqì get sb. to repair the machine; get the machine repaired 請他進來。 Qǐng tā jìnlai. Ask him in. 請你多加指導。 Qǐng nǐ duō jiā zhǐdǎo. adverb almost; nearly; practically 幾乎不可能 jīhū bù kěnéng next to impossible; scarcely possible 幾乎沒摔倒 jīhū méi shuāidǎo nearly fall down 幾乎一夜沒睡 jīhū yī yè méi shuì lay awake almost the whole night 你比我幾乎高了一頭。 Nǐ bǐ wǒ jīhū gāo le yī tóu. People in different moods feel differently about things.

adverb 1 certainly; surely; necessarily 必敗 bìbài sure to lose; destined to fail 人必有一死。 rén bì yǒu yī sǐ. Everyone must die some day. 我明天下午三點必到。 Wǒ míngtiān xiàwǔ sāndiǎn bì dào. What he says is not necessarily true. 我所知道的就這些。 Wǒ suǒ zhīdao de jiù zhèxiē. That’s all I know. c [as a noun without 的, esp. when the verb is monosyllabic] 所到之處 suǒdàozhīchù wherever one goes 所見所聞 suǒjiànsuǒwén what one sees and hears 盡我所能 jìn wǒ suǒ néng do all I can 據你所說 jù nǐ suǒ shuō from what you say 2 [所＋verb] a [with 的 to modify a noun] 所需的費用 suǒ xū de fèiyong necessary expenses 所用的方法 suǒ yòng de fāngfǎ the methods which are used b [with 的 as a noun] 所需的並不多。 Suǒ xū de bìng bù duō. What is needed is not much. 我們所考慮的正是這一點。 wǒmensuǒ kǎolǜ de zhèngshì zhè yīdiǎn. That’s just what we have under consideration. c [as a noun without 的, esp. in set phrases in which the verb is monosyllabic] 各盡所能 gèjìnsuǒnéng from each according to his ability 3 [為 or 被＋ noun or pronoun ＋所＋ verb, expressing a passive meaning] 為人所笑 wéi rén suǒ xiào be laughed at by other people 被表面現象所迷惑 bèi biǎomiàn xiànxiàng suǒ míhuo be misled by outward appearances 4 [所＋ verb used as the object of 有 or 無] a [as the object of 有] 有所創造 yǒusuǒ chuàngzào create something or other 有所準備 yǒusuǒ zhǔnbèi be prepared in some way or other b [as the object of 無, esp. in set phrases] 無所準備 wú suǒ zhǔnbèi need do nothing in preparation for it 無所用心 wúsuǒyòngxīn not give serious thought to anything

It is a glorious thing to die for the people. 2 (Róng) a surname

noun originally; at the outset; in the first place; at that time 當初打算在這兒蓋一座大樓。 Dāngchū dǎsuan zài zhèr gài yī zuò dàlóu. It was originally planned to put up a big building here. 早知今日, 何必當初？ Zǎo zhī jīnrì, hébì dāngchū？ Had I known it would come to this, I would have acted differently.

verb 1 lean 靠躺在椅上 kào tǎng zài yǐ shàng rest on a couch 背靠背 bèikàobèi back to back 2 lean against (or on) 把梯子靠在牆上。 Bǎ tīzi kào zài qiáng shàng Lean a ladder against a wall. 3 stand by the side of; get near; come up to; be near to; keep to 靠窗座位 kàochuāngzuòwèi window seat 療養院靠海。 Liáoyǎngyuàn kào hǎi. The sanatorium stands by the sea. 車輛一律靠右走。 Chēliàng yīlǜ kào yòu zǒu. All vehicles should keep to the right. 船已經靠碼頭了。 Chuán yǐjing kào mǎtou le. The ship has docked. 他已是靠五十的人了。 Tā yǐ shì kào wǔshí de rén le. He’s already close on fifty. 4 depend on; rely on 靠天吃飯 kàotiān-chīfàn live on the mercy of the elements 靠自己的汗水 kào zìjǐ de hànshuǐ by the sweat of one’s brow 萬物生長靠太陽。 wànwù shēngzhǎng kào tàiyáng. All living things depend on the sun for their growth. 他只能靠說謊過日子。 Tā zhǐnéng kào shuōhuǎng guò rìzi. He was reduced to depending on telling lies to get by! 他家裡靠他維持生活。 Tā jiālǐ kào tā wéichí shēnghuó. His family depended on him for support. 5 trust 可靠 kěkào trustworthy noun theater (in traditional opera) stage armour (made of embroidered silk) 扎靠 Zhā kào wear stage armour

The participating countries affirmed these principles. 本憲法以法律的形式確認了中國各族人民奮鬥的成果。 Běn xiànfǎ yǐ fǎlǜ de xíngshì quèrèn le Zhōngguó gè zú rénmín fèndòu de chéngguǒ. verb 1 prop up; put up 支帳篷 zhī zhàngpeng put up a tent 兩手支著頭 liǎng shǒu zhī zhe tóu rest one’s head in both hands 用兩張凳子把木板支起來 yòng liǎng zhāng dèngzi bǎ mùbǎn zhī qǐlai prop up the board with two stools 2 protrude; raise 支著耳朵聽 zhī zhe ěrduo tīng prick up one’s ears 他那兩隻虎牙朝兩邊支著。 Tā nà liǎng zhī hǔyá cháo liǎngbiān zhī zhe. His two upper canine teeth protrude. 3 support; sustain; bear 孩子疼得支不住了。 Háizi téng de zhī bù zhù le. The child couldn’t bear the pain. 4 send away; put sb. off 把他們支開 Bǎ tāmen zhī kāi put them off with excuses; send them away upon some pretext 這事甭支別人了, 你自個兒去吧。 Zhè shì béng zhī biéren le, nǐ zìgěr qù ba. Don’t send someone else; go yourself. 5 pay or draw (money) 支撥 zhībō pay a sum of money; transfer a sum of money in payment 上銀行支款 shàng yínháng zhī kuǎn go to the bank to draw money noun (Zhī) a surname noun branch; offshoot 支店 zhīdiàn branch store 郵政支局 yóuzhèng zhījú branch post office measure word 1 [for long, thin, inflexible objects] 一支箭 yī zhī jiàn an arrow 一支鋼筆 yī zhī gāngbǐ a pen 一支香煙 yī zhī xiāngyān a cigarette 一支五瓦的節能燈 Yī zhī wǔ wǎ de jiénéng dēng a 5-watt energy-saving light 2 [for troops, fleets, sports teams, etc.] 兩支隊伍 liǎng zhī duìwu two contingents of troops 一支艦隊 yī zhī jiànduì a fleet 3 [for songs or musical compositions] 一支曲子 yī zhī qǔzi a tune 一支新歌 yī zhī xīn gē a new song 4 [for the size or quality of yarn] count 六十支紗 60- liùshí zhī shā count yarn 細支棉紗 xì zhī miánshā fine count yarn 中支棉紗 zhōng zhī miánshā medium count yarn 5 (for the illuminating power of electric lights) watt 一個四十支光的燈泡 yī ge sìshí zhī guāng de dēngpào a 40-watt bulb noun abbreviation VARIANT OF 19929344地支di4zhi1地支 (twelve) Earthly Branches (used in combination with the ten Heavenly Stems (天干) to designate years, months, days, and hours) See 21391616干支gan1zhi1干支 gānzhīÀ

preposition [used in a passive structure to introduce either the doer of the action, or the action alone] 被擒 bèiqín be caught 他被對手擊倒。 Tā bèi duìshǒu jīdǎo. He was knocked down by his opponent. 她被選為主席。 Tā bèi xuǎn wéi zhǔxí. She was elected chairwoman. 那棵樹被大風颳倒了。 Nà kē shù bèi dà fēng guā dǎo le. The tree was uprooted by the gale. noun quilt 做一床被 Zuò yī chuáng bèi make a new quilt verb literary 1 cover (with) See 17376768被覆bei4fu4被覆 2 suffer 被災 bèi zāi suffer from a disaster

noun 1 thigh 股動脈 gǔ dòngmài femoral artery 2 section (of an office, enterprise, etc.) 人事股 rénshì gǔ personnel section 3 strand; ply 三股兒繩 Sān gǔ r shéng three-strand rope 雙股毛線 shuāng gǔ máoxiàn two-ply wool 4 one of several equal parts of property 分股 Fēn gǔ divide into equal parts 每股五百元。 Měi gǔ wǔbǎi yuán. 500 yuan for each share. 5 share; stock 入股 rùgǔ become a shareholder measure word 1 [for sth. long and narrow] 一股線 Yī gǔ xiàn a skein of thread 一股泉水 yī gǔ quánshuǐ a stream of spring water 2 [for strength, smell, etc.] 一股勁 yīgǔjìn a burst of energy 一股熱氣 yī gǔ rèqì a stream (or puff) of hot air 一股香味 Yī gǔ xiāngwèi a whiff of fragrance 3 pejorative [for a group of people] 兩股土匪 liǎng gǔ tǔfěi two gangs of bandits 一股敵軍 yī gǔ díjūn a horde of enemy soldiers; an enemy detachment noun archaic mathematics longer leg of a right triangle See 21784064勾股定理gou1gu3ding4li3勾股定理 gōugǔdìnglǐ

verb (-//-) sign one's name; autograph 簽名蓋章 qiānmíng gàizhāng sign and affix one’s seal; set one’s hand and seal to 親筆簽名的照片 qīnbǐ qiānmíng de zhàopiàn an autographed picture 她請電影明星在本子上簽了個名。 Tā qǐng diànyǐng míngxīng zài běnzi shàng qiān le ge míng. She asked the movie star to sign his autograph in her notebook. noun signature; autograph 為請願書集取到一萬份簽名 wèi qǐngyuànshū jí qǔ dào yīwàn fèn qiānmíng collected 10,000 signatures for the petition

noun 1 concept; conception; notion; idea 基本概念 Jīběn gàiniàn fundamental concept; basic concept 玩弄概念遊戲 wánnòng gàiniàn yóuxì play with concepts (to confuse or show off) 有一點兒模糊的概念 yǒu yīdiǎnr móhu degàiniàn have a hazy idea about sth. 2 new design
verb 1 hold; grasp 握筆 Wòbǐ hold a writing brush (or pen) 2 grasp; hold; wield; in control of 手握大權 shǒu wò dà quán wield the sceptre; hold power; be in charge

adjective full; ample; abundant 充分的證據 chōngfèn de zhèngjù full evidence 準備工作做得很充分。 Zhǔnbèi gōngzuò zuò de hěn chōngfèn. Ample preparations were made. 我們有充分理由相信這消息是可靠的。 Wǒmen yǒu chōngfèn lǐyóu xiāngxìn zhè xiāoxi shì kěkào de. We have every reason to believe the information is true. adverb to the full; as fully as possible 充分利用 Chōngfèn lìyòng fully utilize; make full use of 充分協商 chōngfèn xiéshāng full consultation 充分發動群眾 chōngfèn fādòng qúnzhòng fully mobilize the public 充分發揮水平 chōngfèn fāhuī shuǐpíng give full play to one’s abilities
adjective happy; joyous 懷著萬分喜悅的心情 huáizhe wànfēn xǐyuè de xīnqíng with a feeling of immeasurable joy; with great joy 內心充滿了喜悅 nèixīn chōngmǎn le xǐyuè be filled with joy; feel happy
noun works (esp. of literature and art)

verb fix in advance; predetermine; schedule 按預定計劃進行 Àn yùdìng jìhuà jìnxíng go according to schedule; follow a predetermined plan 這項工程預定在明年完成。 Zhè xiàng gōngchéng yùdìng zài míngnián wánchéng. The project is scheduled for completion next year.

noun 1 spray 水花四濺 shuǐhuā sìjiàn spray of water flying in all directions sports 壓水花技術 yā shuǐhuā jìshù (in diving) rip entry 入水時水花很少 rùshuǐ shí shuǐhuā hěn shǎo (in diving) clean entry 2 dialect water bloom 3 dialect chicken pox; water pox

verb 1 close; shut 關閉門窗 guānbì mén-chuāng close the doors and windows 2 (of a shop or factory) close down; shut down 那家工廠因無人訂貨而被迫關閉。 nà jiā gōngchǎng yīn wúrén dìnghuò ér bèipò guānbì. The factory had to close down for lack of orders. 3 (of computer system, etc.) shut down 關閉系統 guānbì xìtǒng shut down the system
noun a surname
adjective far back; ages ago; remote 年代久遠 niándài jiǔyuǎn of the remote past; age-old; time-honoured; ancient

noun 1 structure; composition; construction 結構失調 jiégòu shītiáo structural imbalance 產品結構 chǎnpǐn jiégòu product mix 產業結構 chǎnyè jiégòu the structure of production; industrial set-up 進口結構 jìnkǒu jiégòu import mix 經濟結構 jīngjì jiégòu economic structure 原子結構 yuánzǐ jiégòu atomic structure 所有制結構 suǒyǒuzhì jiégòu the structure of ownership 這篇文章結構嚴密。 Zhè piān wénzhāng jiégòu yánmì. This article is compact and well-organized. 2 architecture structure; construction 鋼結構 gāngjiégòu steel structure 鋼筋混凝土結構 gāngjīn hùnníngtǔ jiégòu reinforced concrete structure 鉚合結構 mǎo hé jiégòu riveted construction 焊接結構 hànjiē jiégòu welded construction 3 geology texture 斑狀結構 bān zhuàng jiégòu porphyritic texture 致密結構 zhìmì jiégòu compact texture

noun early stage (or phase, days); initial stage 早期作品 Zǎoqī zuòpǐn sb.’s early works; the works of sb.’s earlier period 早期食道癌 zǎoqī shídào'ái early-stage carcinoma of the esophagus; early cancer of the esophagus

noun later; after; afterwards 三天之後 Sān tiān zhīhòu after three days; three days later 這次大會之後 zhècì dàhuì zhīhòu following this conference 從那之後她就沒來過。 Cóng nà zhīhòu tā jiù méi lái guò. She hasn’t been here since then. 之後他又給我寫了兩封信。 Zhīhòu tā yòu gěi wǒ xiě le liǎng fēng xìn. Afterwards, he wrote to me twice.

noun 1 port; harbour 港規 gǎngguī harbour regulation 2 airport 飛機已離港。 Fēijī yǐ lí gǎng. The plane has taken off. 3 (Gǎng) abbreviation Hong Kong 港商 Gǎngshāng merchant or businessman from Hong Kong 港資 Gǎngzī Hong Kong capital

noun 1 leaf; foliage 紅花綠葉 hóng huā lǜyè red flowers and green leaves 2 blade; leaf-like thing 肺葉 fèiyè lobe of the lung 一葉扁舟 yī yè piānzhōu a small boat 3 VARIANT OF 34305024頁ye4頁 page; leaf 4 (Yè) a surname noun part of a historical period 清朝末葉 Qīngcháo mò yè closing period of the Qing Dynasty 十九世紀中葉 shíjiǔ shìjì zhōngyè (in) the middle of the 19th century

adverb [indicating that an action once happened or a state once existed] 她曾經參加過校隊。 Tā céngjīng cānjiā guò xiào duì. She once played for the school team. 我曾經在美國住過兩年。 Wǒ céngjīng zài Měiguó zhù guò liǎng nián. I once lived in the United States for two years. 這臺電腦是他剛參加工作時曾經用過的。 Zhè tái diànnǎo shì tā gāng cānjiā gōngzuò shí céngjīng yòng guò de. He used this computer when he first started working.

verb 1 throw; toss; fling 拋球 pāo qiú throw (or toss) a ball 拋出一項容易產生誤導的提案 pāo chū yī xiàng róngyì chǎnshēng wùdǎo de tí'àn dish out (or trot out) a misleading proposal 2 leave behind; cast aside 拋進歷史的垃圾堆 Pāo jìn lìshǐ de lājīduī relegate to the garbage heap of history 他跑得很快, 把別人都拋在後面。 tā pǎo de hěn kuài, bǎ biéren dōu pāo zài hòumian. He ran so fast that the other runners were all left far behind. 3 undersell; dump; sell in large quantity 拋出股票 pāo chū gǔpiào dump stocks 4 show; expose See 27633408拋頭露面pao1tou2lu4mian4拋頭露面

verb 1 strike up a conversation with sb. 他總是一邊賣東西一邊和顧客搭訕。 Tā zǒngshì yībiān mài dōngxi yībiān hé gùkè dāshan. He likes to talk with his customers while doing business. 2 say sth. to smooth over an embarrassing situation 他很尷尬, 搭訕著走開了。 Tā hěn gāngà, dāshan zhe zǒu kāi le. Feeling embarrassed, he muttered a few words and walked off.

noun 1 accommodation for guests 旅館 lǚguǎn inn; hotel 2 embassy; legation or consulate 使館 shǐguǎn embassy 3 (of service trades) shop 茶館 cháguǎn teahouse 4 place for cultural activities 博物館 bówùguǎn museum 5 dated old-style private school 教館 jiāoguǎn teach at a private school
noun pavement; sidewalk

adjective 1 minute; tiny; slight 微雨 wēiyǔ drizzle 微雲 wēiyún thin clouds 相差甚微。 Xiāngchà shèn wēi. The difference is slight (or negligible). 我跟他微說了一下。 Wǒ gēn tā wēi shuō le yīxià. I just mentioned it to him. 2 profound; abstruse 精微 jīngwēi profound and subtle 3 decline; be on the wane 影響漸微。 yǐngxiǎng jiàn wēi. The influence is declining. See 30197504式微shi4wei1式微;30557696衰微shuai1wei1 衰微 adverb slightly; little 微頷 wēi hàn nod slightly 微溫 wēiwēn lukewarm; tepid noun one millionth part of; micro- See 32177152微米wei1mi3微米
noun dated natural science; general name for zoology, botany, mineralogy, physiology, etc.

verb similar (to); analogous (to) 類似物 lèisì wù analogue 趣味類似 qùwèi lèisì be similar in taste 性格類似 xìnggé lèisì be alike in character 相互類似 xiānghù lèisì be analogous to each other (or one another) 呈現驚人的類似之處 Chéngxiàn jīngrén delèisì zhī chù exhibit a curious resemblance 保證不再發生類似事件 Bǎozhèng bùzài fāshēng lèisì shìjiàn guarantee against the occurrence of similar incidents 我見過很多類似這樣的例子。 Wǒ jiàn guò hěn duō lèisì zhèyàng de lìzi. I have seen many instances similar to this.

noun physical (or bodily) strength; physical power 消耗體力 xiāohào tǐlì be a drain on one’s (physical) strength; consume (or sap) one’s strength 增強體力 zēngqiáng tǐlì build up one’s strength 他體力好, 打滿五局擊敗對手。 Tā tǐlì hǎo, dǎ mǎn wǔ jú jībài duìshǒu. He had good stamina and beat his opponent at the end of the fifth game. 下半時隊員們顯得體力不支。 Xiàbàn shí duìyuán men xiǎnde tǐlì bù zhī. The players showed signs of tiredness during the second half.

noun jelly 肉凍兒 ròudòngr meat jelly; aspic verb 1 freeze 別讓白菜凍壞了。 bié ràng báicài dòng huài le. We mustn’t let the cabbages be damaged by frost. 水管裡的水凍(住)了。 Shuǐguǎn lǐ de shuǐ dòng le. The water in the pipes froze. 2 feel very cold; freeze; frostbitten 多穿些, 別凍著了。 Duō chuān xiē, bié dòng zhe le. Put on more clothes so you don’t catch cold. 她手都凍了。 Tā shǒu dōu dòng le. Her hands were frostbitten. 真凍得夠戧！ Zhēn dòng de gòuqiàng! Brrr, I’m freezing!
trump (suit of cards)
verb [usu. in the negative] agree without giving serious thought; readily subscribe to (sb.'s view) 你的意見我不敢苟同。 nǐ de yìjian wǒ bù gǎn gǒutóng. I cannot agree with you. or I beg to differ.
noun school (administration) district
verb mince (meat)

verb know sth. or sb. well; be familiar with; have an intimate knowledge of 熟悉內情 shúxi nèiqíng know the ins and outs of the matter; know the inside story of; be in the know 用群眾熟悉的語言來寫作 Yòng qúnzhòng shúxi de yǔyán lái xiězuò write in language familiar to the masses 你到了那裡, 要先熟悉當地的情況。 Nǐ dào le nàli, yào xiān shúxi dāngdì de qíngkuàng. When you get there, first of all familiarize yourself with the situation. adjective familiar with (opp. 陌生) 他們彼此很熟悉。 Tāmen bǐcǐ hěn shúxi. They know each other very well. 他對這工作不熟悉。 Tā duì zhè gōngzuò bù shúxi. He is new to the task. 他對各項生產數字很熟悉。 Tā duì gèxiàng shēngchǎn shùzì hěn shúxi. He has the various production figures at his fingertips.
noun music melody
verb pick up (with the thumb and one or two fingers) take a pinch of 從罐子裡拈出一塊糖 Cóng guànzi lǐ niān chū yī kuài táng take a candy from the jar
1 tired 2 exhausted
verb calculate in advance; estimate 預計大樓十個月可以完工。 yùjì dàlóu shí ge yuè kěyǐ wángōng. It is estimated that the building will be completed in ten months.

auxiliary that is all; nothing more 如此而已, 豈有他哉！ Rúcǐ éryǐ, qǐ yǒu tā zāi! That’s all there is to it! 我不過是個學生而已。 Wǒ bùguò shì ge xuésheng éryǐ. I’m just a student, that’s all. 以上只是幾個例子而已, 類似的情況還很多。 Yǐshàng zhǐshì jǐ ge lìzi éryǐ, lèisì de qíngkuàng hái hěn duō. I’ve given only a few examples; similar cases are too many to mention.

verb 1 exchange; swap sports 交換場地 jiāohuàn chǎngdì exchange of courts, goals ends or sides 交換契約 jiāohuàn qìyuē exchange contracts 交換數據 jiāohuàn shùjù swap data 交換意見 jiāohuàn yìjiàn exchange views (or opinions); compare notes 交換戰俘 jiāohuàn zhànfú exchange of prisoners of war diplomacy 交換照會 jiāohuàn zhàohuì exchange of notes 交換留學生 jiāohuàn liúxuéshēng (of two countries) exchange students 2 barter, trade; exchange (goods) 實物交換 shíwùjiāohuàn barter; swap 用小麥交換大米 yòng xiǎomài jiāohuàn dàmǐ barter wheat for rice
verb revolt; resist 反抗侵略 fǎnkàng qīnlüè resist aggression 哪裡有壓迫, 哪裡就有反抗。 Nǎli yǒu yāpò, nǎli jiù yǒu fǎnkàng. Where there is oppression, there is resistance.

adjective 1 cruel; oppressive 酷虐 kùnüè ferocious; savage 2 fierce; scorching 酷日 kù rì scorching sun adverb very; extremely 酷類 kùlèi be exactly like adjective transliteration slang 1 cool; excellent; fashionable; great 酷斃了！ kù bì le! This is cool! 2 stylish and sober; graceful and stern 酷哥 kùgē handsome and stern young fellow 酷語 kùyǔ fashionable words; cool expression 擺酷 bǎikù pretend to be stylish and indifferent; be cool
noun chapters and sections
adjective glittering; sparkling; glistening 亮晶晶的露珠 liàngjīngjīng de lùzhū glistening dewdrops 亮晶晶的星星 liàngjīngjīng de xīngxing glittering stars

verb advocate; promote; encourage; recommend 提倡奉獻精神 tíchàng fèngxiàn jīngshén encourage a spirit of service (or devotion) 提倡勤儉建國 tíchàng qínjiǎn jiànguó advocate building the country through diligence and thrift 提倡說普通話 tíchàng shuō Pǔtōnghuà promote the use of putonghua 提倡晚婚和計劃生育 tíchàng wǎnhūn hé jìhuà shēngyù advocate late marriage and family planning 這種做法值得提倡。 Zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ zhíde tíchàng. This method is highly recommended. or This method should be promoted.
verb swim 去游泳 qù yóuyǒng go for a swim; go swimming 參加游泳比賽 cānjiā yóuyǒng bǐsài take part in a swimming contest 在游泳中學習游泳 zài yóuyǒng zhōng xuéxí yóuyǒng learn to swim by swimming noun sports swimming
noun 1 mother tongue 2 linguistics parent language; linguistic parent

verb tear; rip 撕成兩半 sī chéng liǎngbàn tear in two 撕得粉碎 sī de fěnsuì tear to shreds 撕下假面具 sī xià jiǎmiànjù tear off the mask; unmask 把信撕開 Bǎ xìn sīkāi rip open a letter 從日曆上撕下一頁 cóng rìlì shàng sī xià yī yè tear a page from the calendar 上衣撕了。 Shàngyī sī le. The jacket is torn.
noun words of a song; libretto (of an opera)
noun 1 individual 個體農業經營 gètǐ nóngyè jīngyíng individual farming 2 individual or household engaged in small-scale business 幹了幾年個體 gànle jǐ nián gètǐ run one’s business for several years

verb satisfied; feel pleased; content 大家對他的工作很滿意。 Dàjiā duì tā de gōngzuò hěn mǎnyì. Everyone was pleased with his work. 雙方對會談的結果表示滿意。 Shuāngfāng duì huìtán de jiéguǒ biǎoshì mǎnyì. Both sides are satisfied (or expressed satisfaction) with the results of the talks. adjective satisfactory; gratified 她滿意地笑了。 Tā mǎnyì de xiào le. She smiled with content. 他給了我一個滿意的答復。 Tā gěi le wǒ yī ge mǎnyì de dáfù. He gave me a satisfactory reply.
noun railing; banisters; balustrade 橋欄杆 qiáolángān railing of a bridge 靠著欄杆 kàozhelángān lean against the fence 越過欄杆 yuèguò lángān clear (or jump over) the fence

verb 1 give; offer; grant 務必交與本人 wùbì jiāo yǔ běnrén make sure to give to the person concerned 2 literary get along with; be on good terms with 與國 yǔguó friendly country; allied state 此人易與。 Cǐ rén yì yǔ. He is easy to get along with. or He is not difficult to approach. 3 help; support; commend 與人消災 yǔrénxiāozāi save sb. from disaster 4 literary await 時不我與。 shí bù wǒ yǔ. Time and tide wait for no man. preposition 1 [indicating involvement, relationship, etc.] with 與此同時 yǔcǐtóngshí at the same time; meanwhile 與此相反 yǔcǐxiāngfǎn on the contrary; in contrast 他與此事有關。 Tā yǔ cǐ shì yǒuguān. He has something to do with the matter. 2 [introducing the recipient of an action] 與國際接軌 yǔ guójì jiēguǐ acting on international convention; in line with international norms 與人民為敵 yǔ rénmín wéi dí hostile to the people; set oneself against the people 與日月同輝 yǔ rìyuè tóng huī shine like the sun and the moon—equal with the sun and the moon in glory; achieve glorious success 與困難作鬥爭 Yǔ kùnnan zuò dòuzhēng strive to overcome difficulties 與君一夕話, 勝讀十年書 yǔ jūn yī xī huà, shèng dú shí nián shū I have learnt much more from this evening’s talk with you than I could have learnt from ten years of study conjunction and; together with 工業與農業 gōngyè yǔ nóngyè industry and agriculture 批評與自我批評 pīpíng yǔ zìwǒ pīpíng criticism and self-criticism
noun 1 stomach 2 archaic astronomy wei (seventeenth of the twenty-eight constellations (二十八宿) into which the celestial sphere was divided, consisting of three stars in Musca Borealis)

adverb at (long) last; in the end; finally 她終於到了, 晚了將近半小時。 Tā zhōngyú dào le, wǎn le jiāngjìn bàn xiǎoshí. She finally arrived about half an hour late. 他們終於登上了珠峰。 tāmenzhōngyú dēngshàng le Zhūfēng. They finally succeeded in scaling Mount Everest.
noun shellfish; molluscs
adjective 1 worth seeing 這齣戲大有可觀。 Zhè chū xì dà yǒu kěguān. This play is well worth seeing. 2 considerable; impressive; sizable 這個數目相當可觀。 Zhège shùmù xiāngdāng kěguān. This is a considerable figure.
noun Taiwan dollar 新臺幣 Xīntáibì New Taiwan dollar (NT dollar)

adverb 1 each other; one another; mutually 相見 xiāngjiàn meet (each other) 相聚 xiāngjù get together 相視而笑 xiāngshì'érxiào look and smile at each other 不相符合 bù xiāng fúhé not tally with each other; not match 理論要與實際相聯繫。 Lǐlùn yào yǔ shíjì xiāng liánxì. Theory must be integrated with practice. 這裡的山水和我老家的相仿佛。 Zhèlǐ de shānshuǐ hé wǒ lǎojiā de xiāng fǎngfú. The scenery here looks much the same as in my home town. 2 [for an action performed by one person toward another] 實不相瞞 shíbùxiāngmán to tell you the truth 他既然不願意去, 就不要相強。 Tā jìrán bù yuànyi qù, jiù bùyào xiāng qiáng. Since he doesn’t want to go, don’t insist. 連日承友好相邀, 遍遊京都名勝古跡。 Liánrì chéng yǒuhǎo xiāng yāo, biàn yóu jīngdū míngshènggǔjì. For days, friends invited me to visit the historical sites and scenic spots in the capital. noun (Xiāng) a surname verb see for oneself (whether sb. or sth. is to one's liking) 相女婿 xiāng nǚxu take a look at one’s prospective son-in-law
noun good deeds done in secret; hidden acts of merit 積陰德 jī yīndé accumulate hidden merit

noun appearance (of things); phenomenon 社會現象 shèhuì xiànxiàng social phenomenon 與不良現象作鬥爭 yǔ bùliáng xiànxiàng zuò dòuzhēng combat unhealthy phenomena 看事情不要只看現象, 要看本質。 Kàn shìqing bùyào zhǐ kàn xiànxiàng, yào kàn běnzhì. Do not judge things simply by their appearance, but grasp their essence.
noun one kind 別有一般滋味 bié yǒu yībān zīwèi have some indescribable taste
1 therefore 2 thus 3 so
verb classify 按題材分類 àn tícái fēnlèi classify according to subjects 把這些資料分類 bǎ zhèxiē zīliào fēnlèi classify the data 分成五類 fēnchéng wǔ lèi divide into five classes

adjective 1 dense; thick; concentrated (opp. 淡) 濃茶 nóngchá strong tea 濃墨 nóngmò thick, dark ink 濃煙 nóngyān dense smoke; thick smoke 濃硫酸 nóng liúsuān concentrated sulphuric acid 濃雲密布 nóngyúnmìbù overcast with heavy clouds 2 (of degree or extent) great; strong 興趣很濃 xìngqù hěn nóng take a great interest in sth. 玫瑰花香味很濃。 Méiguihuā xiāngwèi hěn nóng. The rose has a heavy fragrance. 這幅畫顏色太濃。 Zhè fú huà yánsè tài nóng. The colours in this painting are too strong.

adverb once in a while; occasionally 我們偶爾見面。 Wǒmen ǒu'ěr jiànmiàn. We see each other once in a while. 她擅長山水畫, 偶爾也畫畫油畫。 Tā shàncháng shānshuǐhuà, ǒu'ěr yě huà huà yóuhuà. She is especially good at traditional Chinese landscape painting, but occasionally she does oils too.
noun 1 route of travel 2 itinerary

verb 1 make; manufacture 中國製造的飛機 Zhōngguó zhìzào de fēijī China-made aircraft 這臺設備是我們自己製造的。 zhè tái shèbèi shì wǒmen zìjǐ zhìzào de. The equipment is of our own manufacture. 2 pejorative create; fabricate 製造分裂 zhìzào fēnliè foment splits 製造假象 zhìzào jiǎxiàng put up a false front 製造糾紛 Zhìzào jiūfēn stir up trouble; sow dissension 製造內亂 zhìzào nèiluàn stir up internal strife 製造煙幕 zhìzào yānmù spread a smoke screen 製造謠言 zhìzào yáoyán fabricate rumours (or lies) 製造輿論 zhìzào yúlùn mould public opinion 製造重重障礙 zhìzào chóngchóng zhàng'ài raise one obstacle after another 製造緊張局勢 zhìzào jǐnzhāng júshì create tension

noun style; manner; mode 風格高 fēnggé gāo behave in a generous manner 發揚風格 fāyáng fēnggé go out of one’s way to help others 京劇有其獨特的藝術風格。 Jīngjù yǒu qí dútè de yìshù fēnggé. Beijing opera has a distinctive artistic style. 運動員們賽出了水平, 賽出了風格。 Yùndòngyuán men sài chū le shuǐpíng, sài chū le fēnggé. The athletes gave a good account of themselves and displayed fine sportsmanship.
noun literary 1 person or event associated with evil or misfortune 2 monster; evil spirit; bogy; demon 3 evildoer

adjective compunction; guilty; conscience-stricken 內疚於心 nèijiù yú xīn feel compunction; have qualms of conscience; be conscience-stricken 她托我的事沒辦成, 我深感內疚。 Tā tuō wǒ de shì méi bànchéng, wǒ shēngǎn nèijiù. I feel very bad because I failed to do what she wanted.
sunflower seeds

noun function 功能鍛煉 gōngnéng duànliàn functional training 功能齊全 gōngnéng qíquán be all-purpose 功能食品 gōngnéng shípǐn functional food linguistics 功能語法 gōngnéng yǔfǎ functional grammar 功能性障礙 gōngnéng xìng zhàng'ài functional disorder 肝功能正常。 Gāngōngnéng zhèngcháng. The liver is functioning normally. 這種機器具有多種功能。 Zhèzhǒng jīqì jùyǒu duōzhǒng gōngnéng. This gadget can perform many different functions.
noun relative 一門親戚 Yī mén qīnqi a set of relatives 我們兩家是親戚。 Wǒmen liǎng jiā shì qīnqi. Our two families are relatives.

noun interval; intermission 兩次會議間隔才二十天。 Liǎng cì huìyì jiàngé cái èrshí tiān. There was an interval of only twenty days between the two conferences. 每兩行樹苗間隔三米。 Měi liǎng háng shùmiáo jiàngé sān mǐ. There is a space of three metres between each two rows of saplings. 幼苗間隔勻整。 Yòumiáo jiàngé yúnzhěng. The seedlings are evenly spaced.
noun medicinal herbs
verb name (sb. or sth.); bestow a name on 以白求恩醫生的名字命名的醫院 yǐ bái qiú ēn yīshēng de míngzimìngmíng de yīyuàn hospital named after Dr. Norman Bethune
adjective out of the ordinary; outstanding 成績出眾 chéngjì chūzhòng get outstanding results in what one engages in 人才出眾 réncáichūzhòng person of exceptional ability
verb ask (or inquire) about; interrogate 詢問病狀 xúnwèn bìngzhuàng inquire about sb.’s illness 詢問他的學習情況 xúnwèn tā de xuéxí qíngkuàng ask him about his studies

verb 1 rinse; wash 用消毒藥水沖洗傷口 Yòng xiāodú yàoshuǐ chōngxǐ shāngkǒu wash a wound with disinfectant 2 photography develop 沖洗照片 chōngxǐ zhàopiàn develop photographs 沖洗放大 chōngxǐ fàngdà develop and enlarge (a film)

noun 1 circle; ring 畫個圈兒 huà ge quānr draw a circle 繞跑道跑兩圈 rào pǎodào pǎo liǎng quān run around the track twice 孩子們圍成一圈。 Háizi men wéi chéng yī quān. The children gathered around in a circle. 我到外面轉了一圈。 Wǒ dào wàimian zhuǎn le yī quān. I’ve been out for a walk. 飛機降落前在機場上空繞圈兒。 fēijī jiàngluò qián zài jīchǎng shàngkōng rào quān r. The plane circled the airport before landing. 這是他一千五百米賽跑的最後一圈。 Zhè shì tā yīqiān wǔbǎi mǐ sàipǎo de zuìhòu yī quān. This is his last lap in the 1,500-metre race.

verb take the place of; replace; substitute for; stand-in for 假日期間他替趙大夫值班。 Jiàrì qījiān tā tì Zhào dàifu zhíbān. He’ll stand-in for Dr. Zhao during the holidays. 今天老王沒來, 誰替他？ Jīntiān lǎo wáng méi lái, shuí tì tā？ Lao Wang is absent today. Who’ll take his place? 你歇會兒, 我替你幹。 Nǐ xiē huìr, wǒ tì nǐ gàn. Have a rest. Let me take over. 三號上場, 替下五號。 Sān hào shàngchǎng, tì xià wǔ hào. Player No. 3 for No. 5. 他身體不好, 快去把他替下來。 Tā shēntǐ bù hǎo, kuài qù bǎ tā tì xià lái. He’s ill, go and replace him at once. 這裡的工作誰也替不了誰。 Zhèlǐ de gōngzuò shuí yě tìbuliǎo shuí. No one can substitute for anyone else here. preposition for 替顧客著想 tì gùkè zhuóxiǎng consider the interests of the customers 替別人買火車票 Tì biéren mǎi huǒchēpiào buy a train ticket for sb. 大家都替你高興。 Dàjiā dōu tì nǐ gāoxìng. We are all happy for you. 別替我擔心。 Bié tì wǒ dānxīn. Don’t worry about me. 你能替小王也畫一張像嗎？ Nǐ néng tì xiǎo wáng yě huà yī zhāng xiàng ma？ Will you also draw Xiao Wang’s portrait? 他們都到機場替她送行。 Tāmen dōu dào jīchǎng tì tā sòngxíng. They all went to see her off at the airport. verb literary decline 興替 xīngtì rise of a power and its supersession by another; rise and fall
adjective piercingly cold; bone-chilly 北風凜冽, 大雪紛飛。 Běifēng lǐnliè, dàxuěfēnfēi. The north wind was blowing cold; the snow was falling in thick flakes.

adjective complete; perfect 設施完備 shèshī wánbèi equipped with all necessary facilities; fully equipped 一套完備的工具 yī tào wánbèi de gōngjù a complete set of tools 指出不完備之處 zhǐchū bù wánbèi zhī chù point out the imperfections

adjective 1 independent; on one's own 獨立分析問題和解決問題的能力 dúlì fēnxi wèntí hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì ability to analyse and solve problems on one’s own 2 separate; respective 這是兩個獨立的問題。 Zhè shì liǎng ge dúlì de wèntí. These are two separate issues. verb 1 stand alone 獨立山巔的蒼松 dúlì shāndiān de cāngsōng a solitary pine tree standing alone on a mountain peak 2 become independent; win independence 墨西哥獨立於一八二一年。 Mòxīgē dúlì yú yī bā èr yī nián. Mexico achieved independence in 1821.

verb 1 ask; entrust 托人買書 tuō rén mǎi shū ask sb. to buy books for one 托人照看孩子 tuō rén zhàokàn háizi leave a child in sb.’s care 這事就托給她吧。 Zhè shì jiù tuō gěi tā ba. Let’s leave the matter to her. 我想托你給他捎點兒東西。 Wǒ xiǎng tuō nǐ gěi tā shāo diǎnr dōngxi. I’d like you to take something to him. 2 plead; give as a pretext See 31889152托病tuo1bing4托病 3 rely upon; owe to See 31888896托庇tuo1bi4托庇
noun ruler
verb reasonable; there is truth in; be well founded 她說的有點兒道理。 Tā shuō de yǒudiǎnr dàolǐ. She is quite right in saying so. See 19749632道理dao4li5道理

verb calculate; forecast 預測日蝕 Yùcè rì shí calculate an eclipse of the sun 預測颱風 yùcè táifēng detect (or forewarn) a typhoon 市場預測 shìchǎng yùcè market forecasting 價格預測 jiàgé yùcè price projection 證實預測 zhèngshí yùcè support the prognosis
noun literary rapids; torrent; swift current
noun height (of a person) 他身高一米八。 Tā shēngāo yī mǐ bā. He is 180 centimetres in height.

noun 1 magazine; journal 訂一份雜誌 dìng yī fèn zázhì subscribe to a magazine 2 [often in book titles] miscellaneous notes; notes 王念孫《讀書雜誌》 wáng niàn sūn 《Dúshū Zázhì》 Wang Niansun’s Miscellaneous Reading Notes
verb literary loudly rebuke; shout at
noun forest 森林保護 sēnlín bǎohù forest conservancy 森林火災 sēnlín huǒzāi forest fire 森林警察 sēnlín jǐngchá forest ranger; forest policeman 森林破壞 sēnlín pòhuài deforestation
verb antibiotic

adjective 1 mad; insane; crazy 你瘋啦！ nǐ fēng la! Are you crazy? 他瘋了。 Tā fēng le. He’s gone mad. 2 silly; light-minded; foolish 瘋丫頭 fēng yātou light-minded (or silly) girl 3 (of a plant, grain crop, etc.) spindly and not likely to bear much fruit or seed 棉花長瘋了。 Miánhua zhǎng fēng le. The cotton plants are growing too tall and spindly (or are overgrowing). 4 with all one's might; do one's utmost 瘋跑 fēngpǎo run like mad verb play without restraint 這孩子在外面瘋到很晚才回家。 Zhè háizi zài wàimianfēng dào hěn wǎn cái huíjiā. The boy didn’t go home until he played very late outside.

noun 1 prison; jail 下大牢 xià dà láo send sb. to prison; (be) put behind bars 打入死牢 dǎrù sǐ láo be sent to a condemned cell (or be put on death row) 坐三個月牢 zuò sān ge yuè láo spend three months in jail 2 literary (enclosure for animals) pen; fold; stable 豕牢 shǐláo pigpen; sty 3 archaic sacrificial animal 太牢 tàiláo sacrificial ox adjective firm; fast; durable 記牢 jìláo remember well 繫牢 xì láo tie fast 扎牢 zhā láo fasten down
verb plaster 糊一層泥 hū yī céng ní spread a layer of mud 用灰把牆縫糊上 Yòng huī bǎ qiáng féng hū shàng plaster up cracks in the wall
verb arrive; reach 總理一行於昨晚抵達巴黎。 zǒnglǐ yīxíng yú zuówǎn dǐdá Bālí. The Premier and his party arrived in Paris last night.
noun the other (or opposite) side; the other party

noun 1 name 以改革的名義 Yǐ gǎigé demíngyì in the name of the reforms 以會議執行主席的名義 yǐ huìyì zhíxíng zhǔxí de míngyì in one’s capacity as executive chairman of the conference 2 [usu. followed by 上] nominal; titular; in name 名義上裁軍, 實際上擴軍 míngyì shàng cáijūn, shíjìshang kuòjūn disarmament in name, military expansion in reality 他只是名義上的隊長罷了。 Tā zhǐshì míngyì shàng de duìzhǎng bàle. He was the captain of the team in name only.
noun Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), leader of China's modern democratic revolution

idiom (let's) not leave without seeing each other (said when making an appointment); be there or be square 兩點左右在大門口碰頭, 不見不散。 liǎng diǎn zuǒyòu zài dàménkǒu pèngtóu, bùjiànbùsàn. Be sure to be at the gate around two o’clock.
noun 1 ball; pellet 泥丸 níwán mud ball 2 pill; bolus measure word [for pills or boluses] 每次服兩丸 Měi cì fú liǎng wán take two pills each time

adjective absolute (opp. 相對) 絕對多數 juéduì duōshù absolute majority; overwhelming majority 絕對優勢 juéduì yōushì absolute predominance; overwhelming superiority 防止思想上的絕對化 fángzhǐ sīxiǎng shàng de juéduì huà avoid thinking in terms of absolutes adverb absolutely; perfectly; definitely 絕對可靠 juéduì kěkào absolutely reliable 那事絕對真實。 Nà shì juéduì zhēnshí. That account is definitely true. 你絕對不能去。 Nǐ juéduì bù néng qù. You must absolutely not go. 我絕對有把握。 Wǒ juéduì yǒu bǎwò. I’m absolutely sure. 這件事要絕對保密。 Zhè jiàn shì yào juéduì bǎomì. This must be kept absolutely secret. or This is strictly confidential.

verb 1 fall behind the ranks; straggle; drop behind; drop out 跟上其他人, 別落伍。 gēnshang qítā rén, bié luòwǔ. Keep up with the others and don’t straggle. 2 out of date; behind the times; backward 他的思想落伍了。 Tā de sīxiǎng luòwǔ le. His way of thinking is out of date (or behind the times).

noun strike; industrial action 號召罷工 Hàozhào bàgōng call a strike 鎮壓罷工 zhènyā bàgōng suppress (or put down) a strike 舉行為期一周的罷工 jǔxíng wéiqī yī zhōu debàgōng stage a one-week walkout verb (-//-) strike; go on strike 為增加工資而罷工 wèi zēngjiā gōngzī ér bàgōng strike for better pay 為抗議惡劣工作條件而罷工 wèi kàngyì èliè gōngzuò tiáojiàn ér bàgōng strike against bad working conditions 工人已經罷了三天工。 gōngrén yǐjing bàle sān tiāngōng. The workers have been on strike for three days now.
literary verb just as; like 雖死猶生 suīsǐyóushēng live on in spirit adverb still 猶未定奪 yóu wèi dìngduó still undecided; not decided yet 猶有可為 yóuyǒukěwéi can still do something about it
verb be wounded; be injured 負重傷 fù zhòngshāng be badly wounded 光榮負傷 guāngróng fùshāng be wounded in action
conjunction accordingly; so; then; thereupon; hence; as a result
noun detective; spy 私人偵探 sīrén zhēntàn private detective verb do detective work

noun 1 piece; lump; chunk 塊煤 kuàiméi lump coal 糖塊兒 Táng kuàir hard candy; fruit drops; lumps of sugar 把肉切成塊兒 bǎ ròu qiē chéng kuàir cut the meat into cubes 2 computing block 塊複製 kuài fùzhì block copy 數據塊 shù jù kuài data block measure word 1 piece; lump 兩塊肥皂 liǎng kuài féizào two cakes of soap 一塊麵包 yī kuài miànbāo a piece (or hunk) of bread 一塊手錶 yī kuài shǒubiǎo a wrist watch 一塊桌布 yī kuài zhuōbù a table cloth 2 colloquial [for gold or silver dollars, Renminbi, and certain paper money] 三塊錢 sān kuài qián three yuan 塊兒八毛 kuàirbāmáo one yuan or slightly less 兩塊銀洋 liǎng kuài yínyáng two silver dollars 一千塊港幣 yīqiān kuài Gǎngbì 1, 000 1,000 Hong Kong dollars
muffin (loanword)
Grand Hyatt (hotel brand)
noun order; arrange; sequence verb arrange in a certain order

adjective astonishing; amazing; alarming 驚人的成就 Jīngrén de chéngjiù astonishing (or amazing) achievements 驚人的毅力 jīngrén de yìlì amazing willpower 交通事故多得驚人。 Jiāotōng shìgù duō de jīngrén. There is a shocking number of traffic accidents. 語不驚人死不休。(杜甫《江上值水如海勢聊短述》) Yǔ bù jīngrén sǐ bùxiū. If my lines don’t startle others, in death I’ll find no rest.
noun stove; oven; furnace 新出爐的燒餅 xīn chūlú de shāobing baked sesame buns fresh out of the oven measure word metallurgy heat 一爐鋼 yī lú gāng a heat of steel
1 airport 2 (shipping) port

adjective 1 bad breath 抽煙讓人嘴臭。 Chōuyān ràngrén zuǐchòu. Smoking gives one bad breath. 2 figurative rude; impolite; swear a lot; foul-mouthed 他就是嘴臭, 心倒是不壞。 Tā jiùshì zuǐchòu, xīn dàoshi bù huài. He swears a lot, but is not really bad-natured.
the left side

verb not discuss; not argue 存而不論 cún'érbùlùn put the matter aside for the time being conjunction [often used correlatively with 都 or 總] no matter (what, who, how, etc.); whether...or...; regardless of 不論性別年齡 bùlùn xìngbié niánlíng regardless (or irrespective) of sex and age 不論他來不來, 我們都得做。 Bùlùn tā lái bù lái, wǒmen dōu děi zuò. Whether he comes or not, we’ll have to do it. 全村不論男女老幼, 都參加了抗旱鬥爭。 Quáncūn bùlùn nán-nǚ-lǎo-yòu, dōu cānjiā le kànghàn dòuzhēng. All the villagers, men and women, old and young, took part in the battle against the drought.
1 to unlock 2 to release

verb think of a way; try; do what one can 設法弄點兒吃的 shèfǎ nòng diǎnr chī de try and get something to eat 我們樂隊正在設法找個小提琴手。 Wǒmen yuèduì zhèng zài shèfǎ zhǎo ge xiǎotíqínshǒu. Our orchestra is trying to find a violinist.

noun main points; essentials 擇要記錄 Zéyào jìlù note down the essential points adjective important; essential 要法 yào fǎ important method; necessary way 上述規定希嚴格執行為要。 Shàngshù guīdìng xī yángé zhíxíng wéi yào. It is imperative that the above rules be strictly observed. verb 1 want; ask for; wish; desire 誰沒有票, 問她要。 Shuí méi yǒu piào, wèn tā yào. Anyone without a ticket can ask her for one. 他要一架手風琴。 Tā yào yī jià shǒufēngqín. He wants an accordion. 我要了兩個菜。 Wǒ yào le liǎng ge cài. I ordered two dishes. 這雙鞋我還要呢。 Zhè shuāng xié wǒ háiyào ne. I want to keep these shoes. 2 ask (or want) sb. to do sth. 不是你要我來的嗎？ Bù shì nǐ yào wǒ lái de ma？ Wasn’t it you who asked me to come? 3 need; take 這活兒要不了這麼多人。 Zhè huór yàobuliǎo zhème duō rén. You don’t need so many people for this job. 這項任務要十天才能完成。 Zhè xiàng rènwu yào shí tiān cái néng wánchéng. It will take ten days to get the work done. verb 1 must; should; it is necessary (or imperative, essential) 借東西要還。 Jiè dōngxi yào huán. One should return what one borrows. 我要不要留下來？ Wǒ yào bù yào liú xià lái？ Shall I stay? 這個問題要仔細考慮。 Zhège wèntí yào zǐxì kǎolǜ. This question calls for careful consideration. 2 shall; will; be going to 要下雨了。 Yào xià yǔ le. It’s going to rain. 他快要回來了。 Tā kuàiyào huílai le. He will soon be back. 天要黑了, 快走吧。 Tiān yào hēi le, kuài zǒu ba. It’s getting dark. Let’s hurry up! 會議要到月底才能結束。 Huìyì yào dào yuèdǐ cái néng jiéshù. The conference will not end till the end of the month. 3 want to; wish to 他要學游泳。 Tā yào xué yóuyǒng. He wants to learn swimming. 我還有幾句話要說。 Wǒ háiyǒu jǐ jù huà yào shuō. I’d like to say a few more words. 4 [in comparisons to indicate an estimate] 樹蔭底下比屋子裡要涼快些。 shùyīn dǐxia bǐ wūzi lǐ yào liángkuai xiē. It is cooler under the tree than in the room. conjunction 1 if; suppose; in case 明天要下雨, 我們就不去了。 Míngtiān yào xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù bù qù le. If it rains tomorrow, we won’t go. 他要來不了呢？ Tā yào láibuliǎo ne？ Suppose he can’t come? 我要趕不回來, 你替我說一聲。 Wǒ yào gǎn bù huílai, nǐ tì wǒ shuō yī shēng. In case I can’t get back in time, please apologize for me. 這有什麼可怕的, 要我就不怕。 Zhè yǒu shénme kěpà de, yào wǒ jiù bù pà. What is there to be afraid of? I wouldn’t be afraid if I were you. 2 [usu. with 就 or 就是] or; either... or... 要就去跳舞, 要就去聽音樂, 別處我不去。 Yào jiù qù tiàowǔ, yào jiù qù tīng yīnyuè, biéchù wǒ bù qù. Let’s go either to the dance or to the concert. I won’t go anywhere else.

adjective 1 smelly; foul; stinking 臭味兒 chòu wèir stink; offensive odour; foul smell 臭雞蛋 chòu jīdàn rotten egg 2 disgusting; disgraceful 他的名聲早就臭了。 Tā de míngshēng zǎojiù chòu le. He has long been discredited. 3 colloquial poor; bad; lousy 臭招 chòuzhāo lousy move verb dialect fail to detonate 這顆子彈臭了。 Zhè kē zǐdàn chòu le. This bullet is a dud. adverb severely 被臭罵了一頓 Bèi chòumà le yī dùn get a tongue-lashing; get a dressing down 挨了一頓臭打 ái le yī dùn chòu dǎ get a good beating
verb literary brave; defy 不畏風暴 bùwèi fēngbào brave a storm 不畏嚴寒 bùwèi yánhán defy severe cold
noun miser
noun iron plate; sheet iron
verb kneel 跪下 guìxia kneel down; go (or get) down on one’s knees 單腿跪地 Dān tuǐ guì dì go down on one knee 他的腿都跪麻了。 Tā de tuǐ dōu guì má le. His legs were numb from kneeling.
onomatopoeia click 咔嗒一聲掛上電話 kādā yī shēng guàshang diànhuà hang up with a click

adjective general; usual; normal 通常的方法 Tōngcháng de fāngfǎ the usual way; usually 通常情況下 tōngcháng qíngkuàng xià under normal conditions; normally adverb generally; usually; ordinarily; as a rule 通常消息可靠人士 Tōngcháng xiāoxi kěkào rénshì usually reliable sources 晚間我通常不外出。 Wǎnjiān wǒ tōngcháng bù wàichū. As a rule I don’t go out in the evening. 我通常六點鐘起床。 Wǒ tōngcháng liù diǎn zhōng qǐchuáng. I generally get up at six o’clock.

noun 1 composition; component part; ingredient; element 化學成分 Huàxué chéngfen chemical composition 句子成分 jùzi chéngfen sentence element 調味料的主要成分 Tiáowèiliào de zhǔyào chéngfen chief ingredients of the seasoning 語言中的外來成分 yǔyán zhòngdì wàilái chéngfen foreign elements in the language 2 one's class status; one's profession or economic status 定成分 dìng chéngfen determine sb.’s class status

verb 1 throw; fling; hurl 投手榴彈 tóu shǒuliúdàn throw a hand grenade 2 put in; drop 把信投進郵筒 bǎ xìn tóu jìn yóutǒng drop a letter into the pillar-box 3 throw oneself into (a river, well, etc. to commit suicide) See 31720960投河tou2he2投河 4 project; cast 把眼光投到來訪者身上 Bǎ yǎnguāng tóu dào láifǎng zhě shēnshang cast one’s eyes on the visitor 樹影投在窗戶上。 Shù yǐng tóu zài chuānghu shàng. The tree cast its shadow on the window. 5 send; deliver See 31729152投書tou2shu1投書 6 go to; join See 31719424投店tou2dian4投店 7 fit in with; agree with; cater to 脾性相投 píxìng xiāngtóu be alike in temperament 8 literary before; prior to 投明 tóumíng before daybreak 投暮 tóumù towards dusk verb colloquial rinse 把衣服再投一遍。 bǎ yīfu zài tóu yī biàn. Rinse the laundry again.
1 poker (card game) 2 playing card M: 副fù [副]

noun 1 teacher; tutor; master 師者, 所以傳道受業解惑也。(韓愈《師說》) shī zhě, suǒyǐ chuándào shòuyè jiěhuò yě. It takes a teacher to transmit wisdom, impart knowledge, and resolve doubts. 2 model; example See 29981184師表shi1biao3師表 3 [term of respect for a monk or nun] master; mother 法師 fǎshī Master of the Law 4 of one's master or teacher 師風 shīfēng teacher’s style 5 (Shī) a surname affix person skilled in a certain profession 廚師 chúshī cook 工程師 gōngchéngshī engineer verb literary learn; imitate 師古 shīgǔ learn from the past noun 1 military division 師部 shībù division headquarters 師指揮所 shī zhǐhuīsuǒ division command post 步兵師 bùbīng shī infantry division 2 troops; army 正義之師 zhèngyìzhīshī army fighting for a just cause

noun match; game; competition; contest 足球賽 zúqiúsài football match (or game) verb 1 have a competition 賽龍舟 sàilóngzhōu hold a dragon-boat race 咱倆賽一賽看。 Zán liǎ sài yī sài kàn. Let’s have a competition. 要賽出水平, 也要賽出風格。 Yào sài chū shuǐpíng, yě yào sài chū fēnggé. We must give a good account of ourselves and display fine sportsmanship as well. 2 be comparable to; surpass 我這蘿卜的味道賽過梨。 wǒ zhè luóbo de wèidaosài guò lí. These radishes of mine taste as good as pears.
verb wait a minute
verb modulate; fine-tune; adjust to; adapt 到了新的環境, 就得調適自己的心態。 dàoliǎo xīn de huánjìng, jiùděi tiáoshì zìjǐ de xīntài. When we come to a new environment, we have to adapt our psychology.

verb transfer; shift; move 她調到這個小組來了。 Tā diào dào zhège xiǎozǔ lái le. She has been transferred to this group. noun 1 accent 這人說話帶山東調兒。 Zhè rén shuōhuà dài Shāndōng diàor. This person speaks with a Shandong accent. 2 music key Ｃ調 Cdiào the key of C 3 air; tune; melody 調寄《沁園春》 diào jì 《Qìn Yuán Chūn》 to the tune of Qinyuanchun 4 linguistics tone; tune 降調 jiàngdiào falling tone 升調 shēngdiào rising tone 5 opinion; view; tone (of one's words) 唱高調 chànggāodiào utter high-sounding words

noun taste; flavour 嘗嘗艱苦生活的滋味 chángchang jiānkǔ shēnghuó de zīwèi have a taste of hard life 唱得有滋有味 chàng de yǒuzīyǒuwèi sing with great gusto 心裡不是滋味 xīnli bù shì zīwèi feel bad; disturbed; upset 這個菜很有滋味。 zhège cài hěn yǒu zīwèi, This dish is very tasty.

adverb mutually; each other 互相掣肘 hùxiāng chèzhǒu hold each other back 互相勾結 hùxiāng gōujié work in collusion 互相利用 hùxiāng lìyòng each using the other for his own ends 互相排斥 hùxiāng páichì be mutually exclusive 互相配合 hùxiāng pèihé work in coordination 互相依存 hùxiāng yīcún depend on each other for existence; be interdependent

verb accumulate 累積資料 lěijī zīliào accumulate data 累積經驗 lěijī jīngyàn accumulate experience 累積大量財富 lěijī dàliàng cáifù accumulate a large fortune 頭八個月完成的工程量累積起來, 已達到全年任務的百分之九十。 Tóu bā ge yuè wánchéng de gōngchéng liàng lěijī qǐlai, yǐ dádào quánnián rènwu de bǎifēn zhī jiǔshí. The work done in the first eight months amounts to ninety percent of the year’s quota.

adjective contrary; opposite 我的意思跟你正相反。 Wǒ de yìsi gēn nǐ zhèng xiāngfǎn. My opinion is contrary to yours (or is just the opposite of yours). 結果與我們的願望恰好相反。 Jiéguǒ yǔ wǒmen de yuànwàng qiàhǎo xiāngfǎn. The result turned out contrary to our expectations. 他們朝著相反的方向開走了。 Tāmen cháozhe xiāngfǎn de fāngxiàng kāi zǒu le. They drove off in opposite directions. 他跟他弟弟對政治持相反的觀點。 Tā gēn tā dìdi duì zhèngzhì chí xiāngfǎn de guāndiǎn. He and his brother have opposite views on politics. conjunction on the contrary 他們根本不是好朋友, 恰恰相反, 是死對頭。 Tāmen gēnběn bù shì hǎo péngyou, qiàqià xiāngfǎn, shì sǐduìtou. Far from being good friends, they are bitter enemies. 他一點兒也不吝嗇, 相反, 沒有比他更大方的了。 Tā yīdiǎnr yě bù lìnsè, xiāngfǎn, méiyǒu bǐ tā gèng dàfang de le. He is not stingy at all; on the contrary, no one could be more generous.

noun 1 wheel 十輪卡車 shí lún kǎchē ten-wheel truck 2 sth. resembling a wheel; disc; ring 光輪 guānglún halo 3 steamboat; steamer 漁輪 yúlún fishing vessel verb take turns 一個人輪一天 Yī ge rén lún yī tiān each person takes their turn for a day 今天輪到我值班。 Jīntiān lún dào wǒ zhíbān. It’s my turn to be on duty today. 下一個就輪到你了。 Xià yī ge jiù lún dào nǐ le. It will be your turn next. measure word 1 [for the sun, the moon, etc.] 一輪紅日 yī lún hóngrì a red sun 一輪明月 yī lún míngyuè a bright moon 2 round 第一輪比賽 dì-yī lún bǐsài the first round of the match 新的一輪會談 xīn de yī lún huìtán a new round of talks 3 [a circle of 12 years] 我比你大一輪兒。 Wǒ bǐ nǐ dàyī lún r. I’m twelve years your senior.

noun kind; type; class; category 兔類 tùlèi the rabbit species 各類蝴蝶 gèlèi húdié butterflies of various species 諸如此類 zhūrúcǐlèi things of that sort 這是另一類問題。 Zhè shì lìng yī lèi wèntí. I called but you were out. 2 not 未知可否 wèizhīkěfǒu not know whether sth. can be done auxiliary classical [at the end of questions, indicating doubt] or not 今可以言未？ jīn kěyǐ yán wèi? noun 1 thick sauce made from soya beans, flour, etc. 2 sauce; paste; jam 黃醬 huángjiàng salted and fermented soya paste 豆瓣醬 dòubànjiàng soybean paste 花生醬 huāshēngjiàng peanut butter 蘋果醬 píngguǒjiàng apple jam verb cook or pickle in soy sauce 醬姜 jiàng jiāng soy preserved ginger 醬鴨 jiàng yā marinated duck 醬牛肉 jiàngniúròu beef stewed in soy sauce 醬豬蹄 jiàng zhūtí trotter cooked in soy sauce 把雞翅醬一下。 bǎ jī chì jiàng yīxià. Have the chicken wings cooked in soy sauce.

noun foundation 人民是國家的基本。 Rénmín shì guójiā de jīběn. The people are the foundation of a nation. adjective main; essential; basic; fundamental; elementary 具備生產的基本條件 Jùbèi shēngchǎn dejīběn tiáojiàn have the basic conditions necessary for production 他們之間存在著基本分歧。 Tāmen zhījiān cúnzài zhe jīběn fēnqí. Fundamental differences exist between them. adverb basically; in the main; on the whole; by and large 情況基本屬實。 Qíngkuàng jīběn shǔshí. It has been found to be basically true. 那項工程已基本完工。 Nà xiàng gōngchéng yǐ jīběn wángōng. The project has been basically completed.
to lift up

adjective 1 fragile; brittle (opp. 韌) 脆金屬 Cuì jīnshǔ brittle metal 這紙太脆。 Zhè zhǐ tài cuì. This kind of paper is too delicate. 2 crisp 這種梨又甜又脆。 Zhèzhǒng lí yòu tián yòu cuì. These pears are sweet and crisp. 3 (of voice) clear; crisp 聽她的嗓音多脆！ Tīng tā de sǎngyīn duō cuì! What a crisp voice she has! 4 dialect neat 這件事辦得很脆。 Zhè jiàn shì bàn de hěn cuì. That was a neat job.

adjective 1 short (of stature) 我個子矮。 Wǒ gèzi ǎi. I’m short. 他比他哥哥矮一頭。 Tā bǐ tā gēge ǎi yī tóu. He’s a head shorter than his brother. 2 low 矮牆 ǎiqiáng low wall 3 low in rank (or grade) 她比我矮一級。 tā bǐ wǒ ǎi yījí. She is a grade lower than me.

preposition 1 in the interest of; for 為大多數人謀利益 Wèi dàduōshù rén móu lìyì work in the interests of the vast majority 2 because of 為勝利而歡呼 Wèi shènglì ér huānhū hail a victory 為我們的友誼乾杯！ Wèi wǒmen de yǒuyì gānbēi! A toast to our friendship! 3 for the purpose of; for the sake of 為方便起見 wèi fāngbiàn qǐjiàn for the sake of convenience 不為名, 不為利 bù wèi míng, bù wèi lì seek no personal fame or gain 讓我們為實現這一宏偉目標而共同努力。 Ràng wǒmen wèi shíxiàn zhè yī hóngwěi mùbiāo ér gòngtóng nǔlì. Let us strive together to attain this splendid goal. 4 to; towards 他為我送來一份請帖。 Tā wèi wǒ sòng lái yī fèn qǐngtiě. He’s sent me an invitation. 且為諸君言之。 Qiě wèi zhūjūn yán zhī. I’ll let you know. verb literary stand for; support

verb (of ice, snow, etc.) melt; thaw 雪已開始融化。 Xuě yǐ kāishǐ rónghuà. The snow is beginning to thaw. 陽光下冰雪融化。 yángguāng xià bīng-xuě rónghuà. The sun thawed the ice and melted the snow. 湖上的冰已經融化了。 Hú shàng de bīng yǐjing rónghuà le. The ice on the lake has already melted.

noun 1 god; deity; divinity; immortal 神鬼 shén-guǐ gods and ghosts 諸神 Zhū shén gods 命運之神 mìngyùn zhī shén the god of fortune 2 spirit; mind 耗神 hào shén take up one’s energy 雙目有神 shuāngmù yǒushén have a pair of piercing eyes 3 expression; look 眼神 yǎnshén expression in one’s eyes adjective 1 supernatural; magical; miraculous 神投手 shén tóushǒu sharpshooter (in basketball); superb shooter (or scorer) 2 dialect smart; clever 這孩子真神！ Zhè háizi zhēn shén! What a smart child! 這家伙神了！ Zhè jiāhuo shén le! This fellow is incredible!

noun 1 mechanics mechanism 傳動機構 chuándòng jīgòu transmission mechanism 分離機構 fēnlí jīgòu disengaging mechanism 2 institution; organization; setup 國家機構 guójiā jīgòu state institution 金融機構 jīnróng jīgòu financial setup 科研機構 kēyán jīgòu scientific research institution 領事機構 lǐngshì jīgòu consular mission 民間機構 mínjiān jīgòu non-governmental institution 權力機構 quánlì jīgòu organ of power 商務機構 shāngwù jīgòu commercial organization 宣傳機構 xuānchuán jīgòu organ in charge of publicity or information 政府機構 zhèngfǔ jīgòu government organization 外交代表機構 wàijiāo dàibiǎo jīgòu diplomatic mission 3 internal structure of an organization 機構重疊 jīgòuchóngdié organizational overlapping 機構龐大 jīgòu pángdà with unwieldy organizations 機構臃腫 jīgòu yōngzhǒng organizational overstaffing 調整機構 tiáozhěng jīgòu adjust the organizational structure
verb reduce (or cut) staff; lay off employees 裁員一半 cáiyuán yībàn cut the workforce by half 這家飯店已裁員二十人。 Zhè jiā fàndiàn yǐ cáiyuán èrshí rén. The hotel has dismissed twenty people from its staff.

noun life 學習古人語言中有生命的東西 Xuéxí gǔrén yǔyán zhōng yǒu shēngmìng de dōngxi learn whatever is alive in the classical Chinese language 生命不息, 希望長在。 shēngmìng bùxī, xīwàng cháng zài. Where there is life, there is hope. 政策和策略是黨的生命。 Zhèngcè hé cèlüè shì dǎng de shēngmìng. Policy and tactics are the life of the Party. 貪污受賄斷送了他的政治生命。 Tānwū shòuhuì duànsòng le tā de zhèngzhì shēngmìng. Corruption and bribe-taking cost him his political career.

pronoun all the other (persons or things); the rest; the remainder 其餘的人馬上就來。 Qíyú de rén mǎshàng jiù lái. The others will be here in a minute. 隊裡只有三名男的, 其餘都是女同志。 Duì lǐ zhǐyǒu sān míng nánde, qíyú dōu shì nǚtóngzhì. There are only three men on the team; the rest are women. 只有一間屋子亮著燈, 其餘都是黑的。 Zhǐyǒu yī jiān wūzi liàng zhe dēng, qíyú dōu shì hēi de. There’s a light on in only one room; the others are all dark. 這個箱子我隨身帶, 其餘的行李托運。 Zhège xiāngzi wǒ suíshēn dài, qíyú de xíngli tuōyùn. I’ll carry this suitcase with me and check in all the other baggage.
noun 1 eyebrow; brow 眉如新月 méi rú xīn yuè eyebrows were curved like sickle of the new moon—delicate arched eyebrows 2 top margin of a page 書眉 shūméi upper page margin

verb 1 link up 溝通南北的新鐵路 gōutōng nán-běi de xīn tiělù a new railway that links up the south and the north 2 communicate 溝通思想 gōutōng sīxiǎng communicate thoughts and ideas
verb 1 handle a legal case 嚴格依法辦案 Yángé yīfǎ bàn'àn handle cases strictly in accordance with the law 2 apprehend (a criminal)

noun literary door of one's heart 我願敞開心扉, 向你傾訴一切。 wǒ yuàn chǎngkāi xīnfēi, xiàng nǐ qīngsù yīqiè. I wish to open my heart and tell you everything.

noun wisdom; intelligence 勤勞智慧的人民 qínláo zhìhuì de rénmín the industrious and ingenious people 吸取群眾的智慧 Xīqǔ qúnzhòng de zhìhuì draw on the wisdom of the masses 這些壯麗的古代建築顯示了勞動人民的高度智慧。 Zhèxiē zhuànglì de gǔdài jiànzhù xiǎnshì le láodòng rénmín de gāodù zhìhuì. These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the working people.

noun machinery; machine; mechanism 機械雕塑 jīxiè diāosù machine sculpture 機械故障 jīxiè gùzhàng mechanical failure (or breakdown) adjective mechanical; inflexible; rigid 別人的經驗不能機械地照搬。 Biéren de jīngyàn bù néng jīxiè de zhàobān. Other people’s experience should not be applied mechanically. 你這樣來理解他的話就太機械了。 Nǐ zhèyàng lái lǐjiě tā de huà jiù tài jīxiè le. You’re taking his words too literally.

noun 1 evidence; proof; testimony 以此為證 yǐ cǐ wéi zhèng use as evidence 2 certificate; card 工作證 gōngzuòzhèng employee’s card; ID card verb prove; demonstrate 證幾何定理 zhèng jǐhé dìnglǐ demonstrate (or prove) a geometric theorem

rice cake (typically made with glutinous rice flour and steamed)

noun 1 expression; manifestation; display 這是他無知的又一表現。 Zhè shì tā wúzhī de yòu yī biǎoxiàn. This is yet another manifestation of his ignorance. 政治是經濟的集中表現。 Zhèngzhì shì jīngjì de jízhōng biǎoxiàn. Politics is the concentrated expression of economics. 2 behaviour; performance 他在工作中的表現很好。 Tā zài gōngzuò zhōng de biǎoxiàn hěn hǎo. He is doing very well in his work. verb 1 show; display; manifest 表現得好 biǎoxiàn de hǎo behave oneself well; perform well 表現出極大的勇敢和智慧 Biǎoxiàn chū jí dà de yǒnggǎn hé zhìhuì display immense courage and wisdom 一貫表現積極 yīguàn biǎoxiàn jījí consistently active; always show great initiative 他心裡很不高興, 可是沒有表現出來。 Tā xīnli hěn bù gāoxìng, kěshì méiyǒu biǎoxiàn chūlai. He was displeased, but didn’t show it. 2 show off 愛表現(自己) Ài biǎoxiàn like to show off 3 describe; express 表現戰爭的文學作品 biǎoxiàn zhànzhēng de wénxué zuòpǐn literary works depicting war

(or sth.) is 這是我們的力量所在。 Zhè shì wǒmen de lìliang suǒzài. That is where our strength lies. or Herein lies our strength.

noun sadness; grief; sorrow 克服悲傷 kèfú bēishāng get over one’s sorrow 人生的歡樂和悲傷 Rénshēng de huānlè hé bēishāng the joys and sorrows of life 她滿懷悲傷。 Tā mǎnhuái bēishāng. She was full of sadness. adjective sad; grieved; sorrowful (opp. 快樂) 過分悲傷 guòfèn bēishāng overcome by grief; excessive grief 為無法避免的事情悲傷, 又有何用。 wèi wúfǎ bìmiǎn de shìqingbēishāng, yòu yǒu héyòng. It’s no good grieving over things that cannot be helped.

conjunction since; as; now that 既然如此 jìránrúcǐ since it is so; such being the case 你既然表示了決心, 就應該見之於行動。 Nǐ jìrán biǎoshì le juéxīn, jiù yīnggāi jiàn zhī yú xíngdòng. Now that you have expressed your determination, you should act. 既然事前提醒過他們, 他們就沒什麼可埋怨的。 Jìrán shìqián tíxǐng guò tāmen, tāmen jiù méi shénme kě mányuàn de. Since they had a fair warning, they have no reason to complain. 既然你沒準備好, 我們只能先走了。 Jìrán nǐ méi zhǔnbèi hǎo, wǒmen zhǐnéng xiān zǒu le. As you are not ready, we must go without you.

noun 1 coming; approaching; next; future 在未來的歲月中 zài wèilái de suìyuè zhōng in the years to come 未來二十四小時內將有暴雨。 Wèilái èrshísì xiǎoshí nèi jiāng yǒu bàoyǔ. There will be a rainstorm within 24 hours. 2 future; tomorrow 美好的未來 Měihǎo de wèilái glorious future 展望未來 zhǎnwàng wèilái look to the future 3 future; hope 兒童是祖國的未來。 Értóng shì zǔguó dewèilái. Children are the hope of the country.

conjunction [correlatively with 不如 or 毋寧] rather than; better than 與其你去, 不如我去。 Yǔ qí nǐ qù, bù rú wǒ qù. Rather than having you go, it’d be better if I went. 你與其坐車, 不如坐船。 Nǐ yǔ qí zuò chē, bùrú zuòchuán. It’s better for you to go by boat than by train. 與其說是粗心大意, 不如說是不負責任。 Yǔqí shuō shì cūxīndàyì, bùrú shuō shì bù fù zérèn. It’s not so much carelessness as irresponsibility.
