pineapple cake, traditional Taiwanese sweet pastry

verb literary go; leave for 由京之渝 Yóu jīng zhī yú leave Beijing for Chongqing 君將何之？ Jūn jiāng hé zhī？ Where are you bound for? pronoun literary 1 [in place of an objective noun or pronoun] 將如之何？ Jiāng rú zhī hé？ What is to be done? 影片情節十分悲慘, 觀眾無不為之感動。 Yǐngpiàn qíngjié shífēn bēicǎn, guānzhòng wúbù wèi zhī gǎndòng. The film was so sad that everyone was moved. 2 [in certain set phrases without definite designation] 手之舞之, 足之蹈之 Shǒu zhī wǔ zhī, zú zhī dǎo zhī dance with joy 我們三個人我最年長, 李次之, 張又次之。 Wǒmen sān ge rén wǒ zuì niánzhǎng, lǐ cìzhī, zhāng yòu cì zhī. Of the three of us, I am the eldest, Li is younger, and Zhang is the youngest. 3 this; that 之子于歸。 Zhīzǐyúguī. The maiden goes to her future home. auxiliary 1 [between an attribute and the word it modifies] 寶中之寶 Bǎozhōngzhībǎo the treasure of treasures; the most precious 抱歉之至 bàoqiàn zhī zhì awfully sorry 得意之極 déyì zhī jí very pleased with oneself 感激之至 gǎnjī zhī zhì deeply grateful 三分之一 sānfēn zhīyī one-third 一水之隔 yīshuǐzhīgé separated only by a river 以我之長, 攻敵之短 yǐ wǒ zhī cháng, gōng dí zhī duǎn utilize our strong points to attack the enemy at his weak points 原因之一 yuányīn zhīyī one of the reasons 鐘鼓之聲 Zhōng-gǔ zhī shēng the sound of drums and bells 百分之八十 bǎifēn zhī bāshí eighty per cent 非常之需要 fēicháng zhī xūyào highly necessary 非常之正確 fēicháng zhī zhèngquè absolutely right 急群眾之急 jí qúnzhòng zhī jí eager to meet the needs of the populace 五千年之久 wǔqiān nián zhī jiǔ as long as five thousand years 不勝榮幸之至 bù shèng róngxìng zhī zhì feel greatly honoured 我之所以討厭他是因為他的嘴太貧。 Wǒ zhīsuǒyǐ tǎoyàn tā shì yīnwèi tā de zuǐ tài pín. I dislike him because he is too garrulous. 弦樂器是指琵琶, 二胡, 小提琴之類。 xiányuèqì shì zhǐ pípa, èrhú, xiǎotíqín zhī lèi. Stringed instruments refer to the pipa, erhu, and violin, etc. 2 literary [between the subject and the predicate in an S-P structure so as to make it nominalized] 如因勢利導, 則如水之就下, 極為自然。 Rú yīnshìlìdǎo, zé rú shuǐ zhī jiù xià, jíwéi zìrán. If we guide the matter along their course of development, it will proceed as naturally as water flows downwards.

I appreciate your kindness (but can not accept your gift or invitation). 4 understand; comprehend; grasp See 26021888領會ling3hui4領會 measure word literary [classifier for mats, gowns or coats] 一領席 Yī lǐng xí a mat 一領裘皮大衣 Yī lǐng qiúpí dàyī a fur coat

The soil here is very loose. 2 not be hard up 現在手頭鬆些 xiànzài shǒutóu sōng xiē be better off 3 light and flaky; soft 這點心鬆脆可口。 Zhè diǎnxin sōngcuì kěkǒu. The pastry is light and crisp. 這種木料很鬆, 做家具不合適。 zhèzhǒng mùliào hěn sōng, zuò jiāju bù héshì. adjective 1 slow-witted; dull 呆頭呆腦 dāitóu-dāinǎo stupid-looking 這孩子大病之後變呆了。 Zhè háizi dà bìng zhīhòu biàn dāi le. After recovering from a serious illness, the child became slow-witted. 這人怎麼那麼呆！ Zhè rén zěnme nàme dāi! auxiliary 1 [added to a verb or adjective to indicate a continued action or state, often with the particle 呢 at the end of the sentence] 大門敞著。 Dàmén chǎngzhe. The gate is wide open. 雪正下著呢。 Xuě zhèng xià zhe ne. It’s snowing. 別站著, 坐下吧。 Bié zhànzhe, zuòxia ba. No need to stand, please sit down. 他穿著一身新衣服。 Tā chuānzhe yī shēn xīn yīfu. He is wearing new clothes. 夜深了, 屋裡的燈卻還亮著。 Yèshēn le, wū lǐ de dēng què hái liàng zhe. It was late at night, but the lights in the room were still on. 他們正談著話呢, 請你在外頭等幾分鐘吧。 Tāmen zhèng tán zhe huà ne, qǐng nǐ zài wàitou děng jǐ fēnzhōng ba. They are talking just now, please wait outside a few minutes. 2 [in sentences beginning with a place word, added to the verb to indicate a resultant state, the verb plus 著 having the force of “there is”] 牆上掛著一幅山水畫。 Qiáng shàng guà zhe yī fú shānshuǐhuà. On the wall hangs a landscape painting. 桌上放著好些東西。 Zhuō shàng fàng zhe hǎoxiē dōngxi. There are a lot of things on the table. 3 [verb plus 著 placed before another verb, indicating an accompanying action or state] a [verb plus 著 serving as an adverbial modifier] 他愛吃著飯看報。 Tā ài chī zhe fàn kànbào. He likes to read the newspaper while eating. 他老低著頭走路。 Tā lǎo dī zhe tóu zǒulù. He always walks with his head bent. 他正忙著準備考試。 Tā zhèng mángzhe zhǔnbèi kǎoshì. He is busy preparing for the examination. 孩子們急著要出去玩兒。 Háizi men jí zhe yào chūqu wánr. The children are in a hurry to go outside and play. 路不遠, 咱們走著去吧。 Lù bù yuǎn, zánmen zǒu zhe qù ba. It’s quite near, let’s go on foot. 探險隊冒著大雪上山。 Tànxiǎnduì mào zhe dàxuě shàngshān. The expedition climbed the mountain in spite of the heavy snow. b [verb plus 著 repeated, indicating that while one action is in progress another is expected] 她想著想著笑了起來。 Tā xiǎng zhe xiǎng zhe xiào le qǐlai. She thought for a while and then burst out laughing. 走著走著天色暗了下來。 Zǒu zhe zǒu zhe tiānsè àn le xiàlai. As we walked along, it began to grow dark. 4 [in imperative sentences, used after verbs or adjectives for emphasis, often with 點兒 added] 等著！ Děngzhe! Wait! 慢著！ Mànzhe! Hold it! 快著點兒。 Kuài zhe diǎnr. Hurry! 你聽著。 Nǐ tīngzhe. Listen! 過馬路看著點兒。 Guò mǎlù kànzhe diǎnr. Mind when you cross the street. 這事你記著點兒。 Zhè shì nǐ jì zhe diǎnr. Be sure to remember this. or Don’t forget! 5 [in forming a preposition] 向著 xiàngzhe towards 沿著馬路 Yán zhe mǎlù along the road
verb splash; spatter 火花四濺 Huǒhuāsìjiàn sparks flying in all directions 被車濺了一身泥 bèi chē jiàn le yīshēn ní be spattered with mud by a passing car

interjection 1 [expressing surprise or amazement] 哎呀, 好大的雨呀！ Āiyā, hǎo dà de yǔ ya! Heavens, it’s raining buckets! or It’s pouring! 哎呀, 這果汁真甜哪！ āiyā, zhè guǒzhī zhēn tián nǎ! Ah, this juice is really sweet! 2 [expressing complaint or impatience] 哎呀, 你又忘啦！ Āiyā, nǐ yòu wàng la! Oh dear, you’ve forgotten again! 哎呀, 你怎麼來得這麼晚呢！ Āiyā, nǐ zěnme lái de zhème wǎn ne! Goodness, why are you so late?

adjective at ease; natural; free from affectation 態度非常自然 Tàidu fēicháng zìran be quite at ease 他不自然地笑了一笑。 Tā bù zìran de xiào le yī xiào. He forced a smile. 拍照時表情要自然些。 Pāizhào shí biǎoqíng yào zìran xiē. Try to look natural for your photograph. 她雖是初次演出, 但是演得很自然。 Tā suī shì chūcì yǎnchū, dànshì yǎn de hěn zìran. Her acting was very natural although this was her first appearance on stage. 像他這樣年齡的孩子對女孩兒產生興趣是很自然的。 Xiàng tā zhèyàng niánlíng de háizi duì nǚ hái'ér chǎnshēng xìngqù shì hěn zìran de. It’s natural for a boy his age to be interested in girls.
noun literature haiku (a form of Japanese verse)
noun shorts

verb 1 solve; resolve; settle 解決困難 jiějué kùnnan overcome a difficulty; find a way out of a difficulty 解決問題 jiějué wèntí solve a problem; settle a question (or an issue); work out a solution 解決爭端 jiějué zhēngduān settle a dispute 迅速解決戰鬥 Xùnsù jiějué zhàndòu quick decisive battle 不同的矛盾, 只有用不同的方法才能解決。 bùtóng de máodùn, zhǐyǒu yòng bùtóng de fāngfǎ cáinéng jiějué. Different problems can only be resolved by using different methods. 2 dispose of; finish off 把剩菜解決了 bǎ shèngcài jiějué le finish off leftovers 這一仗把敵人全部解決了。 zhè yī zhàng bǎ dírén quánbù jiějué le. That battle finished off all the enemy troops.
noun 1 botany cinnamon (tree) (Cinnamomum cassia) 2 dried bark of this tree; cinnamon (an aromatic spice)

verb step on; trample; stamp 踩油門 Cǎi yóumén step on the gas 踩著同事往上爬 cǎi zhe tóngshì wǎng shàng pá climb at the expense of one’s colleagues 踩在凳子上掛窗簾 cǎi zài dèngzi shàng guà chuānglián stand on a stool to hang the curtains 千難萬險腳下踩 figurative qiānnánwànxiǎn jiǎoxià cǎi trample over innumerable dangers and hardships 當心(別)踩壞了草坪。 dāngxīn cǎi huài le cǎopíng. Mind you don’t tread on the grass. 對不起, 踩了您的腳。 Duìbuqǐ, cǎi le nín de jiǎo. Sorry for stepping on your toe! 不小心一腳踩到爛泥裡了。 Bù xiǎoxīn yī jiǎo cǎi dào lànní lǐ le. I was careless and stepped in the mud.

verb resemble; similar; alike 兄弟倆面貌相似。 Xiōng-dì liǎ miànmào xiāngsì. The two brothers look alike. or The two brothers resemble each other. 歷史往往有驚人的相似之處。 Lìshǐ wǎngwǎng yǒu jīngrén de xiāngsì zhī chù. History often shows astonishing parallels.

conjunction 1 in a word; in short; in brief 我是既沒工夫又沒興趣, 總之, 我不幹。 Wǒ shì jì méi gōngfu yòu méi xìngqù, zǒngzhī, wǒ bù gàn. I have neither the time nor the inclination; in short, I refuse to do it. 2 anyway; anyhow 確切地址我記不清了, 總之是在頤和園附近。 Quèqiè dìzhǐ wǒ jìbuqīng le, zǒngzhī shì zài Yíhéyuán fùjìn. I can’t remember the exact address, but it’s somewhere near the Summer Palace.
adjective pitch-dark 黑黢黢的夜晚 hēiqūqū de yèwǎn a pitch-dark night

noun 1 order; command; decree 按令行事 Àn lìng xíngshì act on orders 2 drinking game 猜拳行令 cāiquánxínglìng play a finger-guessing drinking game 3 archaic an official title 縣令 xiànlìng county magistrate verb 1 order; command 令即返家 Lìng jí fǎn jiā order sb. to return home at once 通令全軍 tōnglìng quánjūn issue a general order throughout the army 2 cause sb. to 令我深思 lìng wǒ shēnsī set me thinking See 65900515令人ling4ren2令人 noun season 當令 dānglìng in season 夏令 xiàlìng summertime adjective literary 1 good; excellent 令望 lìng wàng good reputation; fame 2 courteous referring to a member of a friend's family 令妹 lìngmèi your younger sister 令兄 lìngxiōng your elder brother noun abbreviation VARIANT OF 33191936小令xiao3ling4小令 1 short metre for ci (詞) poem containing relatively few syllables (say 62 or fewer) 2 single sanqu (散曲) song (i.e. not in a sequence, corresponding to one aria in the drama) 1 [usu. in tune titles] 《叨叨令》 " 《Tāo Tāo Lìng》 Chattering Song" 《如夢令》 " 《Rú Mèng Lìng》 Like a Dream"

noun spare (or free) time; leisure 今天她不得閒。 Jīntiān tā bù déxián. She has no time to spare today. adjective 1 not busy; idle; unoccupied (opp. 忙) 我這兩天閒著沒事。 Wǒ zhè liǎng tiān xián zhe méi shì. I had nothing to do the last couple of days. 媽媽老是這麼忙, 沒閒過一天。 Māma lǎo shì zhème máng, méi xián guò yī tiān. Mother is always so busy; she’s never had a single free day. 2 not in use; unoccupied; lie idle 別讓機器閒著。 Bié ràng jīqì xián zhe. Don’t let the machine stand idle. 沒有一輛車閒著。 Méiyǒu yī liàng chē xián zhe! Not a single vehicle is free. or All the vehicles are in use. 3 not official; not serious 閒談 xiántán chat; chit-chat; idle talk

noun 1 stage; phase 階段考試 jiēduàn kǎoshì progress test 過渡階段 guòdù jiēduàn transitional stage 戰役的最後階段 zhànyì de zuìhòu jiēduàn final phase of the campaign 2 mining level 階段高度 jiēduàn gāodù level interval

verb distinguish; differentiate; tell 分辨真假 Fēnbiàn zhēn-jiǎ distinguish truth from falsehood 很難分辨誰是誰非。 Hěn nán fēnbiàn shuíshìshuífēi. It’s hard to tell who is right and who is wrong. 他分辨不出人家奏的是什麼曲子。 Tā fēnbiàn bù chū rénjia zòu de shì shénme qǔzi. He couldn’t tell what tune they were playing. noun physics resolution 分辨率 fēnbiànlǜ physics resolving power

verb 1 explain; elucidate 解釋 jiěshì explain; expound 2 clear up; dispel 釋怨 shì yuàn clear up enmity 3 let go; be relieved of; relief 如釋重負 rúshìzhòngfù (feel) relieved; relief 4 release; set free 釋俘 shìfú set prisoners free; release prisoners noun 1 abbreviation VARIANT OF 30266368釋迦牟尼shi4jia1mou2ni2釋迦牟尼 Sakyamuni (c. 565-486 BC, the founder of Buddhism) 2 Buddhism 釋典 shìdiǎn Buddhist Scripture
raw oyster

noun 1 bright flowers of herbaceous plants 2 playing cards club
verb keep firmly in mind; remember well 牢記不忘 láojì bùwàng be embedded in memory; bear in mind 牢記教訓 láojì jiàoxun well remember the lessons 牢記歷史 láojì lìshǐ keep history in mind
have only a hazy notion; not quite understand

noun 1 type; style 西式 xīshì Western style 雷鋒式的人物 Léi Fēng shì de rénwù people like Lei Feng 2 pattern; form 程式 chéngshì form; pattern 3 ceremony; ritual 開幕式 kāimùshì opening ceremony 4 formula 分子式 fēnzǐshì molecular formula 5 linguistics mood; mode 敘述式 xùshùshì indicative mood
photo album
noun Thanksgiving (Day)
noun 1 house 一座小屋 yī zuò xiǎowū a small house 2 room 請屋裡坐。 qǐng wū lǐ zuò. Please come in and sit down.
noun physics synchronism verb at the same step with; in pace with 同步增長 tóngbù zēngzhǎng grow in step with; grow at the same pace

verb show; display; demonstrate; manifest 顯示力量 Xiǎnshì lìliang make a show of force; display one’s strength 我們在戰勝自然災害中顯示了巨大威力。 Wǒmen zài zhànshèng zìrán zāihài zhōng xiǎnshì le jùdà wēilì. We have shown our tremendous strength in overcoming natural calamities. 這些文物顯示出中國古代勞動人民的高度智慧。 Zhèxiē wénwù xiǎnshì chū Zhōngguó gǔdài láodòng rénmín de gāodù zhìhuì. These cultural relics demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people of ancient China. noun petrochemical show; indication 地面顯示 dìmiàn xiǎnshì surface indications 石油顯示 shíyóu xiǎnshì oil shows 天然氣顯示 tiānránqì xiǎnshì gas shows

adverb 1 approximately; about 大約一小時的路程。 Dàyuē yī xiǎoshí de lùchéng. It’s about an hour’s journey. 大約將有五百人出席。 Dàyuē jiāng yǒu wǔbǎi rén chūxí. There will be approximately 500 people present. 2 probably 他大約是到書店去了。 tā dàyuē shì dào shūdiàn qùle. He has probably gone to the bookstore.
noun original (or former) name
1 to set foot in 2 to tread (in or on) 3 to walk into

noun nerve 神經緊張 shénjīng jǐnzhāng be nervous; be jittery 神經堅強 shénjīng jiānqiáng have strong nerves; have iron nerves 發神經 fāshénjīng go mad; go insane 腦神經 nǎoshénjīng cranial nerve 感覺神經 gǎnjué shénjīng sensory nerve 交感神經 jiāogǎn shénjīng sympathetic nerve 刺激了他的神經 cìjī le tā de shénjīng got on his nerves; gave him the nerves 這家伙神經有點兒不正常。 zhè jiāhuoshénjīng yǒudiǎnr bù zhèngcháng. The fellow is not quite all there.

adjective sudden; abrupt; unexpected 突然死亡 Tūrán sǐwáng sudden (or unexpected) death 準備對付一切突然事變 Zhǔnbèi duìfu yīqiè tūrán shìbiàn prepare for all eventualities (or contingencies) 他病得太突然。 tā bìng de tài tūrán. His illness was very sudden. 聽到這消息我感到突然。 Tīngdào zhè xiāoxi wǒ gǎndào tūrán. The news took me by surprise. 這場冰雹突然極了。 Zhè cháng bīngbáo tūrán jíle. The hail was totally unexpected. adverb suddenly; abruptly; unexpectedly 突然哭起來 Tūrán kū qǐlai burst into tears 燈突然滅了。 Dēng tūrán miè le. Suddenly the lights went out. 突然間, 火車停住了, 許多乘客從座位上摔了下來。 Tūrán jiān, huǒchē tíng zhù le, xǔduō chéngkè cóng zuòwèi shàng shuāi le xiàlai. The train came to an abrupt stop, making many passengers fall off their seats.
noun (complimentary) gift; giveaway

noun 1 feeling; affection; sentiment 熱情 rèqíng enthusiasm 2 love; passion 他倆有過一段情。 tāliǎ yǒuguò yī duàn qíng. They once had a brief romance. 3 sexual passion; lust See 28662528情慾qing2yu4情慾 4 favour; kindness 求情 qiúqíng plead; ask for a favour 5 situation; circumstances; condition 軍情 jūnqíng military (or war) situation 6 reason; sense See 17968640不情之請bu4qing2zhi1qing3不情之請

adjective 1 horizontal; transverse (opp. 豎, 直) 橫線 héngxiàn a horizontal line 2 from east to west or from west to east (opp. 縱) See 22625024橫貫heng2guan4橫貫 3 at a right angle to (opp. 直, 縱) See 22628608橫剖面heng2pou1mian4橫剖面 4 unrestrained; turbulent 老淚橫流 lǎolèihéngliú tears flowing from aged eyes 蔓草橫生 màncǎo héng shēng overgrown with creepers 5 [meaning much the same as 橫 hèng 1, limited to use in idiomatic expressions] violent; fierce; flagrant See 22633472橫行霸道heng2xing2ba4dao4橫行霸道 verb 1 lie crosswise; be sideways 中文也能橫著寫。 Zhōngwén yě néng héng zhe xiě. Chinese can also be written across the page. 他橫在長沙發上看報。 Tā héng zài chángshāfā shàng kànbào. He reclined on the settee reading the newspaper. 一棵倒了的樹橫在馬路上。 Yī kē dǎo le de shù héng zài mǎlù shàng. A fallen tree lay across the road. 2 place sth. crosswise (or horizontally) 把扁擔橫過來。 Bǎ biǎndan héng guò lái. Put the carrying pole in a horizontal position. 把桌子橫過來。 bǎ zhuōzihéng guòlai. Turn this table and place it crosswise. noun horizontal stroke (in a Chinese character) adverb dialect 1 in any case; anyway 我橫不那麼辦！ Wǒ héng bù nàme bàn! I’m not going to do that anyway. 2 most likely; probably 今天下雨, 他橫不來了。 Jīntiān xiàyǔ, tā héng bù lái le. It’s raining today; he most likely won’t come.

noun 1 clan 合族 hézú all the members of a clan; the whole clan 2 race; ethnic group See 22356992漢族han4zu2漢族;26838272苗族miao2zu2 苗族 3 a class or group of things or people with common features 貓族 māo zú the cat family 持卡族 chíkǎzú those who use cards; card holders 鹼土族 jiǎn Tǔzú alkaline earth family verb archaic a death penalty, imposed on an offender and his whole family, or even the families of his mother and wife

noun 1 bat; racket 蒼蠅拍 cāngyingpāi flyswatter 網球拍 wǎngqiúpāi tennis racket 乒乓球拍 Pīngpāng qiúpāi ping-pong bat 2 music beat; time 一小節四拍 yī xiǎojié sì pāi four beats in (or to) a bar 這歌是幾拍的？——是四四拍的。 Zhè gē shì jǐ pāi de? ——Shì sì sì pāi de. What time is the song in? —It’s in four-four time. verb 1 clap; pat; beat 拍球 pāiqiú bounce a ball 拍拍翅膀 pāipāi chìbǎng flap wings; beat wings 拍拍他的肩膀 Pāipāi tā de jiānbǎng pat him on the shoulder 拍桌子大罵 pāi zhuōzi dà mà bang the table and curse loudly 拍掉身上的土 pāi diào shēnshang de tǔ pat one’s clothes to get the dust off; dust oneself off 驚濤拍岸 jīngtāo pāi àn mighty waves beating the shore 2 take (a picture); shoot 拍電影 Pāi diànyǐng shoot (or make) a film 這部小說已拍成電影。 Zhè bù xiǎoshuō yǐ pāi chéng diànyǐng. This novel has been made into a film. 今天天氣不好, 外景拍不成了。 Jīntiān tiānqì bù hǎo, wàijǐng pāi bù chéng le. We can’t shoot the outdoor scenes in this foul weather. 3 send (a telegram, etc.) 拍電報 pāi diànbào send a telegram 4 colloquial flatter; fawn on 一不會吹, 二不會拍 yī bù huì chuī, èr bù huì pāi not be given to bragging or toadying 5 colloquial abbreviation auction 拍出去五輛車 pāi chūqu wǔ liàng chē sold five cars by (or at) auction; auction five cars

verb look into; find out; investigate 追究事故的責任 Zhuījiū shìgù de zérèn investigate and determine the responsibility for an accident; find out who is to blame for an accident 凡是偽造證據的, 必須受法律追究。 Fánshì wěizào zhèngjù de, bìxū shòu fǎlǜ zhuījiū. Any falsification of evidence will be investigated under the law.
1 (of an animal) soft-bodied 2 (Tw) software

noun chestnut 糖炒栗子 táng chǎo lìzi sugar-roasted chestnuts
1 electrical lead; connecting line 2 (Tw) to connect (to a network, device etc); to go online; connection 3 (congressional) caucus

noun installation; unit; device; plant 防護裝置 fánghù zhuāngzhì protective equipment 減震裝置 jiǎnzhèn zhuāngzhì damping device 雷達裝置 léidá zhuāngzhì radar installation 配電裝置 pèidiàn zhuāngzhì power distribution unit 自停裝置 zì tíng zhuāngzhì automatic stop arrangement verb install; fit 儀器已經裝置好了。 Yíqì yǐjing zhuāngzhì hǎo le. The instrument has been installed.

noun rule; regulation; prescription; stipulation 遵守黨章的規定 zūnshǒu dǎngzhāng de guīdìng abide by the provisions of the Party Constitution 關於出國留學問題, 最近有了某些新規定。 Guānyú chūguó liúxué wèntí, zuìjìn yǒu le mǒuxiē xīn guīdìng. Certain new regulations concerning study abroad have been announced recently. verb stipulate; provide; prescribe 規定價格 guīdìngjiàgé fix a price 規定指標 guīdìng zhǐbiāo set a quota 規定的表格 guīdìng de biǎogé prescribed forms 規定的指標 guīdìng de zhǐbiāo a set quota 在規定的地點集合 Zài guīdìng de dìdiǎn jíhé assemble at an assigned spot 在規定的時間內 zài guīdìng de shíjiān nèi within the time limits 學校規定不許抽煙。 Xuéxiào guīdìng bù xǔ chōuyān. The school rules forbid smoking. 憲法規定婦女享有與男子完全相同的權利。 Xiànfǎ guīdìng fùnǚ xiǎngyǒu yǔ nánzǐ wánquán xiāngtóng de quánlì. The Constitution stipulates (or provides) that women enjoy exactly the same rights as men.

noun 1 crowd; group 人群 rénqún crowd; throng; multitude 2 (Qún) a surname measure word [for people or animals] group; herd; flock 一群狼 yī qún láng a pack of wolves 一群牛 yī qún niú a herd of cattle 一群人 yī qún rén a crowd of people 一群羊 yī qún yáng a flock of sheep 一群蜜蜂 yī qún mìfēng a swarm of bees 一群小孩 yī qún xiǎohái a group of children

noun 1 time 明天有工夫再來吧。 Míngtiān yǒu gōngfu zài lái ba. Come again tomorrow if you have time. 他三天工夫就學會了滑冰。 Tā sān tiān gōngfu jiù xuéhuì le huábīng. It took him only three days to learn to skate. 她去了沒多大工夫就回來了。 Tā qù le méi duō dà gōngfu jiù huílai le. She didn’t take long to get there and come back. 2 spare (or free) time 你有工夫旅遊嗎？ nǐ yǒu gōngfu lǚyóu ma? Do you have time for travelling? 3 dialect period of time 我們說話那工夫他還在這兒。 Wǒmen shuōhuà nà gōngfu tā hái zài zhèr. He was still here when we were talking. 4 effort; work 費工夫 fèi gōngfu consume time 花了好大工夫 Huā le hǎo dà gōngfu put in a lot of work
adjective calm; cool; composed; unruffled 努力鎮靜下來 Nǔlì zhènjìng xiàlai compose oneself with an effort 遇到緊急情況要鎮靜。 Yùdào jǐnjí qíngkuàng yào zhènjìng. Keep calm in an emergency.
noun posture; gesture 姿勢優美 zīshì yōuměi graceful carriage; graceful bearing 直立的姿勢 zhílì de zīshì an erect posture
verb 1 act in a play 演一齣戲 yǎn yī chū xì put on a play 2 playact; pretend 別再演戲了。 Bié zài yǎnxì le. Stop playacting.

verb belittle; make light of See 28577024輕財重義qing1cai2zhong4yi4輕財重義 adjective 1 of little weight; light (opp. 重) 身輕如燕 shēnqīngrúyàn (of a high jumper, gymnast, etc.) as light as a swallow 油比水輕。 Yóu bǐ shuǐ qīng. Oil is lighter than water. 2 (of load, equipment, etc.) small; simple See 28592640輕武器qing1wu3qi4輕武器 3 small in number, degree, etc. 工作很輕 Gōngzuò hěn qīng have a light workload 傷勢較輕 shāngshì jiào qīng have a slight injury 他年紀很輕。 Tā niánjì hěn qīng. He is very young. 她的病很輕。 Tā de bìng hěn qīng. Her illness is not at all serious. 她睡覺輕。 Tā shuìjiào qīng. She is a light sleeper. 4 not serious; relaxing; light See 28594944輕音樂qing1yin1yue4輕音樂 5 not important 責任輕 Zérèn qīng carry a light responsibility 關係不輕 guānxi bù qīng have an important bearing on sth. 6 gentle; soft 輕輕地說 qīngqīng de shuō speak in a soft voice; whisper 輕拿輕放。 Qīng ná qīng fàng. Handle with care. 她輕輕地拍著孩子。 Tā qīngqīng de pāi zhe háizi. She was gently patting the baby. 她走路腳步輕。 Tā zǒulù jiǎobù qīng. She walks with a light step. 病人睡著了, 輕點兒！ Bìngrén shuìzháo le, qīng diǎnr! Be quiet! The patient is asleep. 我只是輕輕推了他一下。 Wǒ zhǐshì qīngqīng tuī le tā yīxià. I just gave him a light push. 7 rash See 28593664輕信qing1xin4輕信

number ten million; millions upon millions adverb be sure to; must 千萬要小心啊！ Qiānwàn yào xiǎoxīn a! Do be careful! 到達後千萬來信。 Dàodá hòu qiānwàn láixìn. We must under no circumstances take this lightly. 這種藥沒有醫囑不能服用, 千萬千萬。 Zhèzhǒng yào méiyǒu yīzhǔ bù néng fúyòng, qiānwàn qiānwàn. This kind of medicine can’t be taken except under doctor’s orders. You must be very careful!

adjective 1 pure; unmixed 純白 chúnbái pure white 純黑 chúnhēi all black 純毛 Chúnmáo pure wool 2 skillful; practised; well versed 功夫不純 gōngfu bù chún not skillful enough adverb purely; sheerly; wholly 本故事純屬虛構。 běn gùshi chún shǔ xūgòu. The story is purely fictional. 這件事的發生純屬偶然。 Zhè jiàn shì de fāshēng chúnshǔ ǒurán. It all happened by sheer chance.

noun literary spirit, character, tone, or style (in the broadest sense) of a work of art or literature 人品既已高矣, 氣韻不得不高。(郭若虛《圖畫見聞志》) rénpǐn jì yǐ gāo yǐ, qìyùn bùdébù gāo. If a man’s character is high, the tone of his work must inevitably be high. “氣韻生動”論是中國藝術理論的基礎。 “qìyùn shēngdòng” lùn shì Zhōngguó yìshù lǐlùn de jīchǔ. The idea of “spirit-resonance life-movement” is the cornerstone of Chinese art theory.
verb return to the original state

adjective 1 bored 整天呆在家裡, 他感到無聊透了。 Zhěngtiān dāi zài jiālǐ, tā gǎndào wúliáo tòu le. He felt very bored at home all day long. 2 senseless; silly; stupid 不要講這種無聊的話。 Bùyào jiǎng zhèzhǒng wúliáo de huà. Don’t make such silly remarks.

noun 1 square 這塊板子是方的。 Zhè kuài bǎnzi shì fāng de. This is a square board. 2 mathematics involution; power 二的四次方是十六。 Èr de sì cì fāng shì shíliù. This prescription is especially good for backaches. adverb literary 1 just when; at the time when See 20781824方今fang1jin1方今 2 only; just 年方二十 Nián fāng èrshí be just twenty years old

noun 1 smoke 2 mist; vapour 雲煙 yúnyān cloud and mist; mist 3 cigarette or pipe tobacco 抽支煙 Chōu zhī yān have a cigarette (or a smoke) 一袋煙的功夫 yī dài yān de gōngfu time enough to smoke a pipeful of tobacco 4 opium 煙膏 yāngāo prepared opium paste 5 soot 松煙 sōngyān pine (or turpentine) soot verb (of eyes) be irritated by smoke 誰在這裡生火啊？都煙得睜不開眼了。 Shuí zài zhèlǐ shēnghuǒ a？ Dōu yān de zhēng bù kāi yǎn le. Who’s lighting the stove here? I can’t even open my eyes for the smoke. noun tobacco plant 烤煙 kǎoyān flue-cured tobacco

The autumn wind sprang up, and there was a slight chill in the air.

verb direct against; aim; counter 這個講話針對性很強。 Zhège jiǎnghuà zhēnduìxìng hěn qiáng. There was no mistaking thrust of the talk. or The talk was highly relevant. 本條約不針對任何第三國。 běn tiáoyuē bù zhēnduì rènhé dì Sānguó. This treaty is not directed against any third country. 針對這種傾向, 我們需要加強自然科學基礎理論的研究。 zhēnduì zhèzhǒng qīngxiàng, wǒmen xūyào jiāqiáng zìrán kēxué jīchǔ lǐlùn de yánjiū. To counter this tendency, we must increase research in basic theories of natural science. preposition in light of; in accordance with; in connection with 針對這種情況 zhēnduì zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng in view of this situation; in light of this state of affairs 針對兒童的特點進行教育 Zhēnduì értóng de tèdiǎn jìnxíng jiàoyù children’s education that suits children

auxiliary 1 [at the end of a special, alternative, or rhetorical question] 你剛纔到哪兒去了呢？ Nǐ gāngcái dào nǎr qù le ne？ Where were you just now? 你到底認不認得她呢？ Nǐ dào dǐ rèn bù rèn de tā ne？ Do you know her or not? 你對這件事是贊成呢, 還是反對呢？ Nǐ duì zhè jiàn shì shì zànchéng ne, hái shì fǎnduì ne？ Are you for or against this? 他們都有任務了, 我呢？ Tāmen dōu yǒu rènwu le, wǒ ne? They’ve got assignments, what about me? 我錯在哪兒呢？ Wǒ cuò zài nǎr ne？ What is my mistake? 我怎麼能不記得呢？ Wǒ zěnme néng bù jìde ne？ How could I forget this? 這點子事, 何必大驚小怪呢？ Zhè diǎnzi shì, hébì dàjīngxiǎoguài ne？ Why get so excited over such a little thing? 2 [at the end of a declarative sentence to reinforce the assertion] 遠得很, 有好幾千里地呢。 Yuǎn de hěn, yǒu hǎo jǐqiān lǐ dì ne. It’s a long way off—thousands of li away. 3 [at the end of a declarative sentence to indicate the continuation of an action or a state] 他還在生氣呢。 Tā hái zài shēngqì ne. He’s still angry. 張先生, 有人找你呢。 Zhāng xiānsheng, yǒurén zhǎo nǐ ne. Mr Zhang, somebody is looking for you. 4 [used to mark a pause] 不下雨呢, 就去;下雨呢, 就不去。 Bù xià yǔ ne, jiù qù ； xiàyǔ ne, jiù bù qù. If it doesn’t rain, we’ll go; if it does, we won’t. 如今呢, 可比以往任何時候都要強。 Rújīn ne, kě bǐ yǐwǎng rènhé shíhou dōu yào qiáng. As for the present, things are far better than at any time in the past.

verb reduce; cut down; drop; lower; degrade 降低標準 jiàngdī biāozhǔn reduce the rate 降低定額 jiàngdī dìng'é reduce the quota (or norm) 降低半個音 Jiàngdī bàn ge yīn. make the note a semitone lower 降低生產成本 jiàngdī shēngchǎn chéngběn reduce production costs; lower production costs 降低原料消耗 jiàngdī yuánliào xiāohào cut down the consumption of raw materials 氣溫降低了。 Qìwēn jiàngdī le. noun life span; life 電池的壽命 Diànchí deshòumìng life of a battery 中子壽命 zhōngzǐ shòumìng neutron lifetime 洗衣機的使用壽命 xǐyījī de shǐyòng shòumìng life time (or service life) of a washing machine 節省時間等於延長壽命。 Jiéshěng shíjiān děngyú yáncháng shòumìng. To save time is to prolong life. 現代醫學延長了人的壽命。 Xiàndài yīxué yáncháng le rén de shòumìng. Modern medicine has extended man’s life span.

noun 1 cause; reason 理由 lǐyóu reason; ground; argument 因由 yīnyóu reason; cause; origin 2 (Yóu) a surname verb 1 pass through; go by way of 必由之路 bìyóuzhīlù road one must follow (or take); only way 2 be up to sb.; rest with sb. 由著性子 Yóu zhe xìngzi do as one pleases 由她去吧。 Yóu tā qù ba. Let her do as she pleases. 事不由己。 Shì bù yóu jǐ. Things are beyond one’s control. or Things are getting out of hand. 花色很多, 由你挑選。 Huāsè hěn duō, yóu nǐ tiāoxuǎn. There’s a great variety of designs and colours for you to choose from. preposition 1 by; through; via 由水路而來 Yóu shuǐlù ér lái come by the water route 由此入內。 Yóucǐ rù nèi. This way in. or Entrance. 由邊門出去。 Yóu biānmén chūqu. Exit by the side door. 2 (done) by sb. 須由大會通過 Xū yóu dàhuì tōngguò be subject to acceptance by a general meeting 會議由老李主持。 Huìyì yóu lǎo lǐ zhǔchí. Lao Li will preside over the meeting. 這個錢該由我付。 Zhège qián gāi yóu wǒ fù. This money should be paid by me. 這件事由他處理。 Zhè jiàn shì yóu tā chǔlǐ. Leave it to him. 3 because of; due to 由粗心大意造成的錯誤 yóu cūxīndàyì zàochéng de cuòwù mistakes due to carelessness 4 by means of 句子是由詞組成的。 Jùzi shì yóu cí zǔchéng de. A sentence is made up of words. 水由氫與氧化合而成。 Shuǐ yóu qīng yǔ yǎnghuà hé ér chéng. Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen. 代表由民主協商選舉產生。 Dàibiǎo yóu mínzhǔ xiéshāng xuǎnjǔ chǎnshēng. The representatives were elected after democratic consultation. 5 from 由點到面 yóudiǎndàomiàn spread over a whole area from one point 由下而上 yóuxià'érshàng from bottom to top; from the lower level upward; from below 由銀川出發 Yóu Yínchuān chūfā set off from Yinchuan 由漢語譯成英語 yóu Hànyǔ yì chéng Yīngyǔ translate from Chinese into English 由儉入奢易, 由奢入儉難。(司馬光《訓儉示康》) yóu jiǎn rù shē yì, yóu shē rù jiǎn nán It is easy to go from frugality to extravagance, but difficult to go from extravagance to frugality.

verb use; employ; apply 使用種種手段 shǐyòng zhǒngzhǒng shǒuduàn resort to every possible means 使用起來很方便 shǐyòng qǐlai hěn fāngbiàn easy to use (or apply, operate) 使用漢語作為民族共同語 Shǐyòng Hànyǔ zuòwéi mínzú gòngtóng yǔ use Chinese as a common national language 禁止使用化學武器 jìnzhǐ shǐyòng huàxué wǔqì ban the use of chemical weapons 善於識別人和使用人 shànyú shíbié rén hé shǐyòng rén be a good judge of men and know how to use them 新機器已經開始使用。 Xīn jīqì yǐjing kāishǐ shǐyòng. The new machine is now in operation.

verb 1 compare; contrast 相較 xiāngjiào compare 2 literary dispute 錙銖必較 zīzhūbìjiào haggle over every penny; quibble over trifles adverb comparatively; relatively; fairly; quite; rather 較差 jiào chà relatively poor 較好 jiàohǎo fairly (or quite) good 有較大進步 Yǒu jiào dà jìnbù have made considerable progress preposition [comparing a difference in degree] 工作較前更為努力 gōngzuò jiào qián gèngwéi nǔlì work even harder than before adjective literary clear; obvious; marked 二者較然不同。 Èrzhě jiào rán bùtóng. She went out with her hair in curlers. verb 1 roll up 捲起竹簾 juǎn qǐ zhúlián roll up the bamboo screen 捲起袖子就幹 juǎn qǐ xiùzi jiù gàn roll up one’s sleeves and pitch in 2 sweep off; carry along 一個大浪把小船捲走了。 Yī ge dà làng bǎ xiǎo chuán juǎn zǒu le. A huge wave swept the skiff away. 汽車飛馳而過, 捲起一陣塵土。 Qìchē fēichí ér guò, juǎn qǐ yīzhèn chéntǔ. A car sped past, raising a cloud of dust. measure word roll; spool; reel 一捲鋪蓋 yī juǎn pūgai a roll of bedding 一捲軟片 yī juǎn ruǎnpiàn a roll of film 一捲手紙 Yī juǎn shǒuzhǐ a roll of toilet paper noun roll (a food) 花捲 huājuǎn steamed twisted roll

This is a more realistic way of doing things.

noun literary 1 the same day; this (or that) very day 本條例自即日起施行。 Běn tiáolì zì jírì qǐ shīxíng. The regulations come into force (or go into effect) as of today. 2 within the next few days 本片即日放映。 Běn piàn jírì fàngyìng. The film will be shown within the next few days.

adjective feel well (or comfortable) 我吃了藥以後好受多了。 Wǒ chī le yào yǐhòu hǎoshòu duō le. I felt much better after taking the medicine. 白天太熱, 夜裡還好受點兒。 Báitiān tài rè, yèli hái hǎoshòu diǎnr. It’s terribly hot during the day but a bit better at night. 你別說了, 他心裡正不好受呢！ Nǐ bié shuō le, tā xīnli zhèng bù hǎoshòu ne! Don’t say anything more; he’s feeling bad enough already.

pronoun usually literary how; what 進展如何？ jìnzhǎn rúhé How are things getting on? 此事如何辦理？ Cǐshì rúhé bànlǐ？ How are we to handle this matter? 他不知如何是好。 Tā bùzhī rúhé shì hǎo. He didn’t know what to do. 這個電影你覺得如何？ Zhège diànyǐng nǐ juéde rúhé？ What do you think of the film? adverb VARIANT OF 22508800何如he2ru2何如1 classical how about

verb call (or bring) to mind; recollect; recall 迴憶對比 huíyì duìbǐ recall the past and contrast it with the present 他的臉我還認得, 名字卻迴憶不起來了。 Tā de liǎn wǒ hái rènde, míngzi què huíyì bù qǐlai le. I remember his face, but not his name.

noun usually literary nowadays; now 如今很少有人用毛筆了。 Rújīn hěn shǎo yǒurén yòng máobǐ le. Few people use writing brushes nowadays. 如今咱們山村也有了自己的大學生。 Rújīn zánmen shāncūn yě yǒu le zìjǐ de dàxuéshēng. Now our mountain village has its own college students.

verb 1 invent 印刷術是中國人首先發明的。 Yìnshuāshù shì Zhōngguórén shǒuxiān fāmíng de. Printing was first invented by the Chinese. 2 literary expound; elucidate; explain 本書對《老子》的哲理頗多發明。 Běn shū duì 《Lǎo Zǐ》 de zhélǐ pō duō fāmíng. verb 1 be defeated; lose (a war, etc.) (opp. 勝利) 失敗之作 shībài zhī zuò box-office bomb 遭到了可恥的失敗 zāodào le kěchǐ de shībài meet with ignominious defeat 2 fail (opp. 成功) 試驗失敗了不止一次。 shìyàn shībài le bùzhǐ yīcì. The experiment has failed more than once.

adverb stealthily; secretly; covertly; on the sly (or quiet) 偷偷溜走 tōutōu liūzǒu sneak away 偷偷告訴他 tōutōu gàosu tā tell him on the quiet 偷偷(地)瞧了一眼 tōutōu de qiáo le yī yǎn steal a glance at 這些孩子偷偷地抽煙。 Zhèxiē háizi tōutōu de chōuyān. The boys smoked on the sly.

noun 1 years; ages 2 for generations; from one generation to the next; generation after generation 世代相傳 shìdàixiāngchuán pass on from generation to generation 他家世代務農。 Tā jiā shìdài wùnóng. He comes from a long line of farmers.

adjective 1 bad; harmful; unhealthy 不良傾向 bùliáng qīngxiàng harmful (or unhealthy) trends 不良習慣 bùliáng xíguàn bad (or undesirable) habit 不良現象 bùliáng xiànxiàng unhealthy tendencies 不良影響 bùliáng yǐngxiǎng harmful (or adverse) effects 存心不良 cúnxīnbùliáng harbour evil intentions; have ulterior motives; malicious 2 (of a circuit, etc.) defective 接觸不良 jiēchùbùliáng poor contact; bad connection
noun tyre 輪胎爆了 lúntāi bào le have a blowout 輪胎癟了 lúntāi biě le have a flat tyre 給輪胎充氣 gěi lúntāi chōngqì pump up a tyre 給輪胎放氣 gěi lúntāi fàngqì deflate a tyre
verb heavy sleep; lethargic
verb employ; hire
adverb literary never before 未曾聽說 wèicéng tīngshuō never heard of 歷史上未曾有過的奇跡 lìshǐ shàng wèicéng yǒu guò de qíjì miracle unprecedented in history
1 pouch 2 sack 3 bag

noun 1 response; reaction 作出反應 Zuò chū fǎnyìng make a response 反應不一。 Fǎnyìng bùyī. Reactions vary. 反應冷淡。 Fǎnyìng lěngdàn. The response was far from warm. 研究報告在科學界引起了強烈的反應。 yánjiū bàogào zài kēxuéjiè yǐnqǐ le qiángliè defǎnyìng. The research paper evoked strong reactions in scientific circles. 2 chemistry physics reaction 鏈式反應 liànshìfǎnyìng chain reaction 3 physiology medicine reaction 過敏反應 Guòmǐn fǎnyìng allergic reaction 陽性反應 yángxìng fǎnyìng positive reaction 陰性反應 yīnxìng fǎnyìng negative reaction 病人打針以後的反應 Bìngrén dǎzhēn yǐhòu defǎnyìng patient's reaction to an injection 病人化驗以後的反應 bìngrén huàyàn yǐhòu defǎnyìng patient's reaction to a medical test verb react; respond 對老師的提問, 他反應很快。 Duì lǎoshī de tíwèn, tā fǎnyìng hěn kuài. He responds very quickly to the teacher’s questions. 他對你的建議反應怎麼樣？ Tā duì nǐ de jiànyì fǎnyìng zěnmeyàng？ How did he react to your suggestion?

noun 1 philosophy psychology intuition 直覺能力 zhíjué nénglì powers of intuition 2 instinct; intuition 憑直覺 Píng zhíjué by instinct; by intuition 女人的直覺 nǚrén dezhíjué feminine (or woman’s) intuition 相信自己的直覺 xiāngxìn zìjǐ dezhíjué trust one’s intuitions
noun 1 shellfish 2 cowrie 虎斑貝 hǔ bān bèi tiger cowrie 3 (Bèi) a surname measure word abbreviation VARIANT OF 56189411貝爾bei4er3貝爾 physics bel (= ten decibel)
1 to fight 2 to exchange blows
noun Tieguanyin (a variety of oolong (烏龍) tea)

verb 1 leave; part from 離京赴穗 lí jīng fù suì leave Beijing for Guangzhou 遠離家鄉 yuǎnlí jiāxiāng go far away from home 農民離土不離鄉, 發展鄉鎮企業。 nóngmín lí tǔ bù lí xiāng, fāzhǎn xiāng-zhèn qǐyè. Peasants leave the land but not their home to develop rural enterprises. 2 be at a distance from; be away from 離這裡不遠 lí zhèlǐ bù yuǎn be not far from here; a little way off 離國慶節只有十天了。 Lí Guóqìngjié zhǐ yǒu shí tiān le. National Day is only ten days away. 3 lack; be short of 他離不了酒。 Tā líbuliǎo jiǔ. He can’t stay away from the bottle. 發展工業離不了鋼鐵。 Fāzhǎn gōngyè líbuliǎo gāngtiě. Industry cannot develop without steel. 4 deviate from; shift from See 65399267離譜兒li2pu3r5離譜兒 noun li (one of the Eight Trigrams (八卦) which represents fire ())

verb consign for shipment; check 你的行李託運了嗎？ Nǐ de xíngli tuōyùn le ma？ Have you checked your baggage? 你有幾件託運的行李？ Nǐ yǒu jǐ jiàn tuōyùn de xíngli？ How many pieces of consigned baggage have you got? 你的行李都拿下來了嗎？ 有託運的沒有？ Nǐ de xíngli dōu ná xiàlai le ma？ Yǒu tuōyùn de méiyǒu？ Have you collected all your baggage? Is there any checked through?

verb attend religious service 做禮拜 zuò lǐbài go to church; be at church noun colloquial 1 week 下禮拜 xiàlǐbài next week 2 day of the week 禮拜一 Lǐbàiyī Monday 禮拜二 Lǐbài'èr Tuesday 禮拜三 Lǐbàisān Wednesday 禮拜四 Lǐbàisì Thursday 禮拜五 Lǐbàiwǔ Friday 禮拜六 Lǐbàiliù Saturday 禮拜日 Lǐbàirì Sunday 今天禮拜幾？ Jīntiān lǐbài jǐ？ What day is it today? 3 Sunday 今兒個禮拜。 Jīnrge lǐbài. Today is Sunday.

verb cancel; call off; abolish 取消禁令 qǔxiāo jìnlìng lift a ban 取消決定 qǔxiāo juédìng rescind a decision 取消會員資格 qǔxiāo huìyuán zīgé deprive sb. of his membership 取消一次會議 Qǔxiāo yī cì huìyì cancel (or call off) a meeting 被取消比賽資格 bèi qǔxiāo bǐsài zīgé be disqualified from the contest 這個月獎金取消了。 Zhège yuè jiǎngjīn qǔxiāo le. There will be no bonuses this month.

adjective sensitive; susceptible 敏感皮膚 mǐngǎn pífū sensitive skin 敏感問題 mǐngǎn wèntí sensitive issue 政治敏感性 zhèngzhì mǐngǎn xìng political sensitivity 他對語言很敏感。 Tā duì yǔyán hěn mǐngǎn. He has a good feeling for language.

noun 1 ash 燒成灰 Shāo chéng huī burnt to ashes 2 dust 積了厚厚的一層灰 jī le hòu hòu de yī céng huī accumulate a thick layer of dust 看你弄了一臉的灰。 Kàn nǐ nòng le yī liǎn de huī. Look at your face! It’s covered with dust. 3 lime; (lime) mortar 灰牆 Huī qiáng plastered wall 和灰 hé huī mix mortar adjective 1 grey 灰馬 huī mǎ grey horse 2 disheartened; discouraged 心灰意懶 xīnhuīyìlǎn dispirited; feel down; dejected
verb belong to; be part of 火星屬於克林貢帝國。 Huǒxīng shǔyú Kèlíngòng dìguó. Mars belongs to the Klingon Empire. 猿和猴屬於靈長類。 Yuán hé hóu shǔyú língzhǎnglèi. Apes and monkeys belong to the primates.
noun name list 黑名單 hēi míngdān blacklist 入伍名單 rùwǔ míngdān list of recruits
noun vegetables 布衣蔬食 bùyī-shūshí coarse clothes and simple fare

verb continue; go on 繼續工作 Jìxù gōngzuò continue working 繼續有效 jìxù yǒuxiào remain valid; remain in force 繼續執政 jìxù zhízhèng continue in office; remain in power 會議繼續到深夜。 Huìyì jìxù dào shēnyè. The meeting went on till late at night. 有些問題仍需繼續研究。 Yǒuxiē wèntí réng xū jìxù yánjiū. Some problems require further study. 他們第二天又繼續會談。 Tāmen dì-èr tiān yòu jìxù huìtán. They resumed the talks the next day. 大雨繼續了三晝夜。 Dàyǔ jìxù le sān zhòu-yè. It rained heavily for three days and nights. noun continuation 現行政策是以往政策的繼續。 xiànxíng zhèngcè shì yǐwǎng zhèngcè dejìxù. The present policy is a continuation of the earlier one.
1 popular 2 well-received
noun ladder; a flight of stairs 進身的階梯 jìn shēn de jiētī stepping stone

noun 1 physics weight 2 focal point; stress; emphasis 突出重點 tūchū zhòngdiǎn highlight the key points (as in a speech) 今天重點討論技術革新問題。 Jīntiān zhòngdiǎn tǎolùn jìshù géxīn wèntí. Our discussion today will centre on technical innovation. or Today our discussion will focus on technical innovation. adverb with sth. as the focus; give priority to 重點發展農業 zhòngdiǎn fāzhǎn nóngyè put priority on the development of agriculture 目前要重點發展教育。 mùqián yào zhòngdiǎn fāzhǎn jiàoyù. At present we should give priority to education.

preposition 1 with; by means of 以守為攻 yǐ shǒu wéi gōng use defence as a means of offence 以市場為導向 yǐ shìchǎng wéi dǎoxiàng guided by the market; market-oriented 以天下為己任 yǐ tiān xià wéi jǐ rèn take the destiny of one’s country as one’s own responsibility 以質量求發展 yǐ zhìliàng qiú fāzhǎn strategy of development through quality 以姓氏筆畫為序 yǐ xìngshì bǐhuà wéi xù in order of the number of strokes in their surnames 以我之長, 攻敵之短 yǐ wǒ zhī cháng, gōng dí zhī duǎn utilize our strong points to attack the enemy’s weak points 喻之以理 Yù zhī yǐ lǐ reason with sb.; try to make sb. see reason 贈以鮮花 zèng yǐ xiānhuā present sb. with a bouquet 2 according to 以此類推 yǐcǐlèituī on the analogy of this 以時啟閉 yǐshíqǐbì open and close according to schedule 以到達先後為序 yǐ dàodá xiān-hòu wéi xù in order of arrival 3 because of 不以失敗自餒, 不以成功自滿 bù yǐ shībài zìněi, bù yǐ chénggōng zìmǎn not lose heart because of failure nor feel conceited because of success 何以知之？ Héyǐ zhī zhī？ How do you know? 4 literary at (a certain time); on (a fixed date) 我以三月一日返。 wǒ yǐ Sānyuè yī rì fǎn. I returned on March the first. conjunction 1 in order to; so as to 以示區別 yǐ shì qūbié so as to distinguish this from other cases 以應急需 Yǐ yìng jíxū in order to answer an urgent need 2 literary and; as well as 城高以厚。 Chéng gāo yǐ hòu. The city wall is high and thick. 淅瀝以瀟颯 Xīlì yǐ xiāo sà raindrops pattering and wind rustling preposition [before certain localizers to form compound localizers] 長江以北 Cháng Jiāng yǐ běi north of the Yangtze River noun abbreviation Israel 以軍 yǐjūn Israeli army
verb 1 quote; cite 他在文章中引用了魯迅的話。 Tā zài wénzhāng zhōng yǐnyòng le Lǔ Xùn de huà. In his article he quoted Lu Xun. 2 recommend; appoint 引用賢能 yǐnyòng xiánnéng appoint virtuous and talented people
verb feel uncertain (or unconvinced) 疑惑不解 yíhuòbùjiě feel puzzled; have doubts

adjective 1 rich; abundant; plentiful 博而不精 bó'érbùjīng know a bit about everything 淵博 yuānbó broad and profound; deep 2 erudite; well-informed See 17837056博古通今bo2gu3tong1jin1博古通今 3 literary loose; big 寬衣博帶 Kuānyī bó dài loose garments noun colloquial abbreviation doctor of philosophy; doctorate 讀博 dúbó study (or read) for a doctorate; study for a PhD verb literary 1 win; gain 聊博一笑 liáobóyīxiào just for your entertainment 2 gamble 博局 bójú gambling party 博徒 bótú gambler

verb anticipate; expect 這是意料中的事。 Zhè shì yìliào zhōng de shì. That’s to be expected. 這一結果在他意料之外。 Zhè yī jiéguǒ zài tā yìliào zhīwài. This outcome is beyond his expectations. See 18857216出乎意料chu1hu1yi4liao4出乎意料
verb employ; engage; hire; appoint to a position
noun 1 botany hazel 2 hazelnut

adverb literary most; extremely; exceedingly 極其相似 jíqí xiāngsì close resemblance 他的評論極其深刻。 Tā de pínglùn jíqí shēnkè. His comments were most penetrating. 吸煙對身體極其有害。 Xīyān duì shēntǐ jíqí yǒuhài. Smoking is extremely harmful to your health. 他對這個問題的看法極其荒唐。 Tā duì zhège wèntí de kànfǎ jíqí huāngtáng. His views on this subject are absolutely ridiculous.
noun polished glutinous rice; sticky rice

verb 1 set up; establish 設置專門機構 shèzhì zhuānmén jīgòu set up a special organization 課程設置 kèchéng shèzhì courses offered in a college or school; curriculum 2 put up; install 設置重重障礙 shèzhì chóngchóng zhàng'ài place all sorts of obstacles 設置嚴密的警戒線 shèzhì yánmì de jǐngjièxiàn throw a tight cordon 實驗室裡設置了閉路電視。 Shíyànshì lǐ shèzhì le bìlù diànshì. A closed circuit TV system has been installed in the laboratories. 3 computing configure 系統設置 xìtǒng shèzhì system configuration (or setup)

verb arrive; reach 代表團於今晨到達廣州。 Dàibiǎotuán yú jīnchén dàodá Guǎngzhōu. The delegation arrived in Guangzhou this morning. 按現在的速度, 我們三點以前可以到達。 Àn xiànzài de sùdù, wǒmen sāndiǎn yǐqián kěyǐ dàodá. We can get there before three o’clock at this speed.
1 (literary) what one sees 2 (literary) opinion; view

noun 1 contingency; eventuality 防備萬一 fángbèi wànyī be ready for all eventualities; be prepared for the worst 2 literary one ten thousandth; a very small percentage 筆墨不能形容其萬一。 Bǐmò bù néng xíngróng qí wànyī. It simply beggars description. conjunction just in case; if by any chance; what if 萬一有人找我, 就請他留個條。 Wànyī yǒu rén zhǎo wǒ, jiù qǐng tā liú ge tiáo. If by chance somebody comes to see me, ask him to leave a message. 萬一這傳聞是事實呢？ Wànyī zhè chuánwén shì shìshí ne？ What if the rumour is true?
verb make a thorough inquiry; probe into 探究原因 tànjiū yuányīn look into the causes
noun 1 glass 彩色玻璃 cǎisè bōli tinted glass; coloured glass 2 colloquial nylon; plastic
1 excessively 2 too
1 inside 2 among 3 in the midst of (doing sth) 4 during
(not) any more
noun 1 charcoal 2 dialect coal 3 coal-like substance 山楂炭 shānzhā tàn hawthorn charcoal

verb 1 move backward and forward; swing 甩鞭子 shuǎi biānzi crack a whip 甩著胳膊 shuǎi zhe gēbo swinging one’s arms 他袖子一甩就走了。 Tā xiùzi yī shuǎi jiù zǒu le. He flung up his hands in impatience and walked off. 小女孩一跑, 辮子就來回甩動。 Xiǎo nǚhái yī pǎo, biànzi jiù láihuí shuǎi dòng. The girl’s pigtails swing to and fro as she runs. 2 throw; fling; toss 甩手榴彈 Shuǎi shǒuliúdàn throw hand grenades 3 leave sb. behind; throw off 他加快速度, 一會兒就把別的運動員都甩在後頭了。 Tā jiākuài sùdù, yīhuìr jiù bǎ bié de yùndòngyuán dōu shuǎi zài hòutou le. Quickening his pace, he soon left all the other runners behind. 他的女朋友把他甩了。 Tā de nǚpéngyou bǎ tā shuǎi le. His girlfriend gave him the brush-off. or He was dumped by his girlfriend.

adjective outstanding; remarkable; splendid 幹得很出色 gàn de hěn chūsè do a remarkable job; acquit oneself splendidly 他們出色地完成了任務。 Tāmen chūsè de wánchéng le rènwu. They accomplished their task with flying colours.

noun 1 meaning; significance; implication 我揣摩不透他那番話的意味所在。 Wǒ chuǎimó bù tòu tā nà fān huà de yìwèi suǒzài. I can’t figure out the implications of what he said. 2 interest; overtone; flavour 帶有文學意味的新聞報道 Dàiyǒu wénxué yìwèi de xīnwén bàodào a news report with a literary flavour 這首詩意味無窮。 Zhè shǒu shī yìwèi wúqióng. This is a poem of unlimited interest.
noun a surname noun abbreviation Europe measure word abbreviation ohm (Ω)
within; inside of; among
noun linguistics katakana (one of the written varieties of 假名2, the other being 平假名)

adjective 1 (of a wild animal or of one's temper, words, etc.) fierce; terrible 老虎比獅子還厲害。 lǎohǔ bǐ shīzi hái lìhai. Tigers are even fiercer than lions. 他這張嘴可厲害了。 Tā zhè zhāngzuǐ kě lìhai le. He has a sharp tongue. 2 (of a person) strict; stern; harsh 他的樣子很厲害。 Tā de yàngzi hěn lìhai. His appearance is very stern. 我要給他點兒厲害。 Wǒ yào gěi tā diǎnrlìhai. I’ll teach him a lesson. 我們老師很厲害。 Wǒmen lǎoshī hěn lìhai. Our teacher is very strict. 3 (of illness, heat, cold, etc.) intense; severe; terrible 疼得厲害 Téng de lìhai suffer from severe pain 他病得很厲害。 tā bìng de hěn lìhai. He is seriously ill. 這著棋非常厲害。 Zhè zhuóqí fēicháng lìhai. That’s a devastating (chess) move. 這種煙太厲害。 zhèzhǒng yān tài lìhai. This kind of tobacco is too strong. 這幾天熱得厲害。 Zhè jǐ tiān rè de lìhai. It’s been terribly hot these few days. 4 colloquial great; impressive; awesome; amazing 她是個很厲害的演員。 Tā shì ge hěn lìhai de yǎnyuán. She's a fantastic actress. 他的聲音真的很厲害。 Tā de shēngyīn zhēn de hěn lìhai. His voice is amazing. 她下象棋下得很厲害。 Tā xià xiàngqí xià de hěn lìhai. She plays chess extremely well.
fried potato chips

noun literature jueju (a poem of four lines, each of five or seven characters, with a strict tonal pattern and rhyme scheme); quatrain 五言絕句 wǔyán juéjù pentasyllabic quatrain 七言絕句 qīyán juéjù heptasyllabic quatrain
noun 1 arm 2 figurative reliable helper 他是隊長的得力手臂。 Tā shì duìzhǎng de délì shǒubì. He’s the team leader’s right-hand man.
noun shareholder; stockholder
noun transliteration botany carnation; gillyflower; clove pink
noun intestines
noun midwinter; depth of winter 隆冬盛暑 lóngdōng shèngshǔ in deep winter and high summer 隆冬時節 lóngdōng shíjié at the time of bitter winter

adverb in reverse order; in an opposite direction 我把賬目反過來又算了一遍。 wǒ bǎ zhàng mù fǎnguolai yòu suànle yī biàn. I added up the account items all over again in reverse order. 這話反過來說就不一定對。 Zhè huà fǎnguolai shuō jiù bù yīdìng duì. The converse of this statement may not be true. conjunction conversely; the other way round; vice versa 反過來也是一樣。 fǎnguolai yě shì yīyàng. It’s the same the other way round. verb turn over
oyster (from Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [ô-á])

verb remove; relieve; get rid of 解除顧慮 jiěchú gùlǜ free one’s mind of apprehensions 解除合同 jiěchú hétong rescind (or terminate) a contract 解除婚約 jiěchú hūnyuē renounce an engagement 解除禁令 jiěchú jìnlìng lift a ban 解除警報 jiěchú jǐngbào sound the all-clear 解除武裝 jiěchú wǔzhuāng disarm 解除職務 jiěchú zhíwù remove from post; relieve of office 解除勞動關係 jiěchú láodòng guānxi sever labour relations 解除思想負擔 jiěchú sīxiǎng fùdān take a load off one’s mind; ease a mental burden 旱象已經解除。 Hànxiàng yǐjing jiěchú. The dry spell is over.
noun apprentice; disciple
verb feel grateful; be thankful 感恩不盡 gǎn'ēnbùjìn be extremely grateful
verb be the speaker; give a lecture

noun 1 commander in chief 統帥 tǒngshuài com-mander in chief 2 commander in chief, the chief piece in Chinese chess 3 (Shuài) a surname adjective 1 beautiful; graceful; smart; dashing 他的字寫得真帥。 Tā de zì xiě de zhēn shuài. He writes a beautiful hand. 他的雙杠動作可帥了！ Tā de shuānggàng dòngzuò kě shuài le! His movements on the parallel bars were very graceful. 2 handsome; elegant 這小伙子長得真帥！ Zhè xiǎohuǒzi zhǎng de zhēn shuài! What a handsome strapping young man!

noun 1 leader of feudal lords; overlord; suzerain 春秋五霸 chūnqiū wǔ bà the Five Overlords of the Spring and Autumn Period (770-476 BC) 2 tyrant; despot; bully 他是地方一霸。 Tā shì dìfāng yī bà. He is a local despot. 3 hegemonist power; hegemonism; hegemony 爭霸 zhēngbà contend (or struggle) for hegemony 4 dominate; lord it over; tyrannize 軍閥割據, 各霸一方。 Jūnfágējù, gèbàyīfāng. The country was torn apart by warlords, each controlling a region.

adjective complete; integrated; intact; entire 完整的工業體系 Wánzhěng de gōngyè tǐxì an integrated (or all-round, comprehensive) industrial system 維護領土完整 wéihù lǐngtǔ wánzhěng safeguard territorial integrity 許多珍貴的歷史文物完整地保存了下來。 Xǔduō zhēnguì de lìshǐ wénwù wánzhěng de bǎocún le xiàlai. Many valuable historical relics have been preserved intact.
verb look for a job; seek employment

noun 1 original (from which a translation is made) 讀原文 Dú yuánwén read in the original 2 original text; master copy 原文如此 Yuánwén rúcǐ sic 參考原文 cānkǎo yuánwén refer to the original 把抄件跟原文核對一下 bǎ chāojiàn gēn yuánwén héduì yīxià check the copy against the original 引用原文要加引號。 Yǐnyòng yuánwén yào jiā yǐnhào. Put quoted passages in quotation marks.

noun background; backdrop 家庭背景 jiātíng bèijǐng family background 歷史背景 Lìshǐ bèijǐng historical background (or setting) 以藍天為背景 yǐ lántiān wéi bèijǐng set against the blue sky 此案背景複雜。 cǐ àn bèijǐng fùzá. This case has a complicated background. 他有背景。 Tā yǒu bèijǐng. He has powerful connections. or He is well-connected. 這幅畫的背景是一片森林。 Zhè fú huà de bèijǐng shì yī piàn sēnlín. The painting shows the woods in the background. 這事肯定有背景。 Zhè shì kěndìng yǒu bèijǐng. Someone must be behind this. or There’s more in this than meets the eye.

verb 1 stretch rules, get around regulations, etc., to accommodate; make an exception 這事可以通融。 Zhè shì kěyǐ tōngrong. We can make an exception in this case. 2 accommodate sb. with a short-term loan 我想跟你通融二十塊錢。 Wǒ xiǎng gēn nǐ tōngrong èrshí kuài qián. I wonder if you can lend me 20 yuan.
adjective colloquial (of work) well done; done carefully 實實在在的做法 shíshízaizai de zuòfǎ down-to-earth practice 工作做得很實在。 Gōngzuò zuò de hěn shízai! The work is well done.
verb 1 read aloud 她把賀電念給大家聽。 Tā bǎ hèdiàn niàn gěi dàjiā tīng. She read out the congratulatory message. 2 attend school 他念過中學。 Tā niàn guò zhōngxué. He has been to middle school.
noun (of a person) like a drenched chicken; like a drowned rat 成了落湯雞 chéngle luòtāngjī soaked through; drenched and bedraggled

I come from a long line of farmers. 3 course of study 結業 jiéyè complete a course; wind up one’s studies 4 cause; enterprise 創業 chuàngyè start an undertaking; do pioneering work 5 estate; property 家業 jiāyè (family) property 6 Buddhism karma verb literary engage in 業農 yènóng engage in farming adverb literary already 業已核實 yèyǐ héshí have already been verified

noun 1 alternative 似乎沒有另外的選項。 Sìhū méiyǒu lìngwài dexuǎnxiàng. There doesn’t seem to be an alternative option. 2 computing option verb (-//-) choose a project 對於投資者來說, 選項尤為關鍵。 Duìyú tóuzīzhě lái shuō, xuǎnxiàng yóuwéi guānjiàn. Project choosing is particularly important for an investor.

noun 1 vain hope; wishful thinking; fond dream 夢想成真 mèngxiǎngchéngzhēn dreams come true 渺茫的夢想 miǎománg demèngxiǎng shadowy dream; vain hope 2 dream; earnest wish 治理淮河的夢想已成為現實。 zhìlǐ Huái Hé demèngxiǎng yǐ chéngwéi xiànshí. The long-cherished dream of harnessing the Huai He River has become a reality. verb vainly hope; dream of 夢想不到 mèngxiǎngbùdào have never dreamed of; never expected 夢想成為百萬富翁 mèngxiǎng chéngwéi bǎiwàn fùwēng dream of being a millionaire

verb 1 initiate; sponsor 這次會議是由十四個國家發起的。 Zhècì huìyì shì yóu shísì ge guójiā fāqǐ de. The meeting was sponsored by fourteen countries. 這支樂隊是我們發起成立的。 zhè zhī yuèduì shì wǒmenfāqǐ chénglì de. This band was formed on our initiative. 2 start; launch 發起反攻 Fāqǐ fǎngōng launch a counterattack

pronoun usually literary so; such; in this way; like that 如此等等 rúcǐ děngděng and so on and so forth 如此勇敢 Rúcǐ yǒnggǎn so brave 似乎是如此。 Sìhū shì rúcǐ. So it appears. 情況就是如此。 Qíngkuàng jiù shì rúcǐ. That’s how things stand. 他的脾氣向來如此。 Tā de píqi xiànglái rúcǐ. He has always been so. or He’s always like this. 如此聰明的孩子很少見。 Rúcǐ cōngming de háizi hěn shǎojiàn. Such an intelligent child is rarely seen. 事已如此, 後悔也是枉然。 Shì yǐ rúcǐ, hòuhuǐ yě shì wǎngrán. Now it’s done, regrets are of no avail. or It’s no use crying over spilt milk. 朋友之間互相幫助, 理當如此。 Péngyou zhījiān hùxiāng bāngzhù, lǐdāng rúcǐ. Friends always help each other, and rightly so. 他來得如此之快, 完全出乎意料。 Tā lái de rúcǐ zhī kuài, wánquán chūhū yìliào. I never expected him to get here so soon.

adjective serious; grave; critical 嚴重故障 yánzhòng gùzhàng catastrophe failure 嚴重關頭 yánzhòng guāntóu critical juncture 嚴重後果 yánzhòng hòuguǒ serious (or grave) consequences 嚴重虧損 yánzhòng kuīsǔn heavy loss 嚴重違約 yánzhòng wéiyuē grave breach of a contract 病情嚴重 bìngqíng yánzhòng be seriously ill 充分認識到問題的嚴重性 chōngfèn rènshi dào wèntí de yánzhòngxìng be fully aware of the gravity of the question
adjective grave and stern 冷峻的筆觸 lěngjùn de bǐchù cold and sharp style (of writing) 面色冷峻 Miànsè lěngjùn wear a stern expression

onomatopoeia toot; hoot; zoom 輪船上的汽笛嗚嗚叫。 Lúnchuán shàng de qìdí wūwū jiào. The ship’s whistle hooted. 汽車嗚的一聲飛馳而過。 Qìchē wū de yī shēng fēichí ér guò. The car zoomed past.

adjective 1 true; real; authentic 正確 zhèngquè correct; right; proper 2 firm, resolute 確志 quèzhì firm decision; resolution adverb really; indeed 確有其事。 Quèyǒuqíshì. It’s a fact. or It really happened. adjective literary (of land) barren, infertile 幾畝磽確地 jǐ mǔ qiāo què dì several mu of poor field

noun cold 乘涼 chéngliáng relax in the cool; enjoy the cool 著(受)涼 zhe liáng catch cold adjective 1 cool; cold 涼風 Liángfēng cool breeze 天氣涼了。 tiānqì liáng le. The weather has turned cold. 沒多久熱情就涼下來了。 méi duō jiǔ rèqíng jiù liáng xiàlai le. The passion cooled down (or off) before long. 2 figurative discouraged; disappointed 一聽這消息他就涼了半截。 Yī tīng zhè xiāoxi tā jiù liáng le bànjié. His heart sank at the news.

verb 1 open; unfold 打開門 dǎkāi mén open the door 打開蓋子 dǎkāi gàizi take off the lid 打開缺口 dǎkāi quēkǒu make a breach 2 turn on; switch on 打開收音機 dǎkāi shōuyīnjī turn on the radio 打開電燈 dǎkāi diàndēng turn on the light 3 open up; widen 打開局面 Dǎkāi júmiàn open up a new prospect; make a breakthrough 打開銷路 dǎkāi xiāolù develop new markets for a product 打開眼界 dǎkāi yǎnjiè widen one’s horizon

preposition owing to; thanks to; as a result of; due to; in virtue of 由於各種原因 yóuyú gèzhǒng yuányīn for various reasons 由於健康關係 Yóuyú jiànkāng guānxi on health grounds conjunction because; since 由於各人的觀點不同, 我們沒有能夠取得一致意見。 Yóuyú gèrén de guāndiǎn bùtóng, wǒmen méiyǒu nénggòu qǔdé yīzhì yìjian. Since our points of view differ, we can’t reach an agreement.

verb look attentively at; gaze at 久久注視著陌生人的臉 jiǔjiǔ zhùshì zhe mòshēngrén de liǎn give the stranger a long gaze 密切注視會議的進展 Mìqiè zhùshì huìyì de jìnzhǎn closely follow the progress of the conference 他目不轉睛地注視著熒光屏。 tā mùbùzhuǎnjīng de zhùshì zhe yíngguāngpíng. His eyes were glued to the screen.
verb 1 replace; update; renew 更新設備 gēng xīn shè bèi renew equipment 2 (of forest, plants, etc.) renew; rejuvenate; renovate 更新草場 gēngxīn cǎochǎng rejuvenate the pastures

adjective magical; mystical; miraculous; effective and startling 神奇的效果 shénqí de xiàoguǒ miraculous (or magical) effect 這些古代傳說被人們渲染上一層神奇的色彩。 Zhèxiē gǔdài chuánshuō bèi rénmen xuànrǎn shàng yī céng shénqí de sècǎi. Through the ages, these legends have acquired an element of mystery and wonder.

verb give rise to; lead to; set off; touch off; cause; arouse 引起公憤 yǐnqǐ gōngfèn arouse (or touch off) public indignation 引起轟動 yǐnqǐ hōngdòng cause a sensation 引起懷疑 yǐnqǐ huáiyí arouse suspicion 引起注意 yǐnqǐ zhùyì bring to sb.’s attention 引起併發症 yǐnqǐ bìngfāzhèng lead to complications 引起連鎖反應 yǐnqǐ liánsuǒ fǎnyìng set off a chain reaction 引起嚴重後果 yǐnqǐ yánzhòng hòuguǒ lead to grave consequences 引起強烈的反響 yǐnqǐ qiángliè de fǎnxiǎng cause strong repercussions 引起一場熱烈的討論 yǐnqǐ yī cháng rèliè de tǎolùn evoke a heated discussion 由此而引起的一切後果 yóucǐ ér yǐnqǐ de yīqiè hòuguǒ all consequences arising therefrom 事故是由於粗心大意而引起的。 Shìgù shì yóuyú cūxīndàyì ér yǐnqǐ de. The accident was caused by carelessness.

verb 1 give directions (or pointers, advice); show how (to do sth.) 教練耐心地指點他們。 Jiàoliàn nàixīn de zhǐdiǎn tāmen. The coach patiently instructs them. 請給我們指點。 Qǐng gěi wǒmen zhǐdiǎn. adjective 1 straight (opp. 彎,曲) 把鐵絲拉直 Bǎ tiěsī lā zhí straighten a piece of wire 街道又寬又直。 Jiēdào yòu kuān yòu zhí. The streets are wide and straight. 2 vertical; perpendicular (opp. 橫) 直行的文字 zhí xíng de wénzì characters written in vertical lines 這屋子直裡有六米, 橫裡有三米。 Zhè wūzi zhí lǐ yǒu liù mǐ, héng lǐ yǒu sān mǐ. The room is 6 metres in length and 3 in width. 3 just; upright See 36095744正直zheng4zhi2正直 4 frank; straightforward 直認不諱 zhírènbùhuì admit frankly; own up readily 我就直說了。 Wǒ jiù zhíshuō le. I’ll speak very frankly. 5 stiff; numb 天太冷, 手指都凍直了。 Tiān tài lěng, shǒuzhǐ dōu dòng zhí le. It was so cold my fingers were frozen stiff. verb straighten 直起腰來 zhí qǐ yāo lái straighten one’s back; stand up straight noun vertical stroke (in Chinese characters) adverb 1 directly; straight (一)直走 Yīzhí zǒu go straight ahead 直飛北京 zhí fēi Běijīng fly nonstop to Beijing 直通港口 zhítōng gǎngkǒu lead directly to the harbour 直奔火車站 zhí bēn huǒchēzhàn head straight for the railway station 2 continuously 新井直往外噴油。 Xīn jǐng zhí wǎng wài pēn yóu. Oil gushed from the new well. 他凍得直哆嗦。 Tā dòng de zhí duōsuo. He kept shivering from cold. 這個故事逗得她直樂。 Zhège gùshi dòu dé tā zhí lè. The story made her laugh. 3 just; simply 待他直如兄弟 Dài tā zhí rú xiōng-dì treat him just like a brother 疼得直像針扎一樣 téng de zhí xiàng zhēn zhā yīyàng feel a piercing pain
verb synthesize 綜合群眾的意見 zōnghé qúnzhòng de yìjian synthesize (or sum up) the opinions of the people adjective comprehensive; multiple; composite; integrated 綜合研究 zōnghé yánjiū a comprehensive study

verb embezzle; practise graft; be corrupt 貪污盜竊 tānwū dàoqiè graft and embezzlement 貪污腐化 tānwū-fǔhuà corruption and degeneration; corruption 貪污五百萬元 tānwū wǔbǎi wàn yuán embezzle 5 million yuan 貪污和浪費是極大的犯罪。 Tānwū hé làngfèi shì jí dà de fànzuì. Corruption and waste are very serious crimes.

verb be addicted (to sth.); get into the habit (of doing sth.) 吸毒上了癮 xīdú shàng le yǐn be addicted to drugs; be a drug addict 他抽煙抽上了癮。 Tā chōuyān chōu shàng le yǐn. He’s got into the habit of smoking. 這種藥吃久了會上癮。 Zhèzhǒng yào chī jiǔ le huì shàng yǐn. This medicine is habit-forming. 她看偵探小說看上癮了。 Tā kàn zhēntàn xiǎoshuō kàn shàngyǐn le. She’s developed a yen for detective stories.

adjective 1 false; fake; bogus; counterfeit 偽證件 wěi zhèngjiàn false papers 作偽 zuòwěi fake (works of art, cultural relics, etc.); forgery 2 puppet; collaborationist; illegal 3 pseudo-; quasi- 偽變量 wěi biànliàng pseudo-variable 偽程序 wěi chéngxù pseudo-program 偽代碼 wěidàimǎ pseudocode 偽指令 wěizhǐlìng quasi-instruction; pseudo-instruction

noun reality; practice 客觀實際 kèguān shíjì objective reality 從實際出發 cóng shíjì chūfā proceed from actual conditions; realistic 理論和實際 lǐlùn hé shíjì theory and practice 切合當地實際 qièhé dāngdì shíjì suit local conditions 思想經常會落後於實際。 sīxiǎng jīngcháng huì luòhòu yú shíjì. Thinking often lags behind reality. adjective 1 practical; realistic 實際經驗 shíjì jīngyàn practical experience 你這種想法不實際。 Nǐ zhèzhǒng xiǎngfa bù shíjì. You are being unrealistic. 2 real; actual; concrete 實際的例子 shíjì de lìzi concrete instance 實際生活水平 shíjì shēnghuó shuǐpíng real standard of living 實際使用投資 shíjì shǐyòng tóuzī actual utilized investment 石油產量實際增長百分之四。 shíyóu chǎnliàng shíjì zēngzhǎng bǎi fēnzhī sì. Oil production increased by 4% in real terms.

noun 1 condition; term; factor 貿易條件 màoyì tiáojiàn terms of trade 自然條件 zìrán tiáojiàn natural conditions 利用有利的條件 lìyòng yǒulì de tiáojiàn make use of the favourable factors 在目前條件下 zài mùqián tiáojiàn xià given the present conditions; under present circumstances 在對等的條件下給予優惠待遇 zài duì děng de tiáojiàn xià jǐyǔ yōuhuì dàiyù give preferential treatment on a reciprocal basis 這個工廠生產條件很好。 zhège gōngchǎng shēngchǎn tiáojiàn hěn hǎo. This factory has all the right conditions for production. 2 requirement; prerequisite; qualification 提出條件 Tíchū tiáojiàn list the prerequisites; put forward the requirements 當宇航員對身體條件要求很嚴。 Dāng yǔhángyuán duì shēntǐ tiáojiàn yāoqiú hěn yán. The physical fitness requirements for being an astronaut are very stiff. 做這項工作需要具備什麼條件？ Zuò zhè xiàng gōngzuò xūyào jùbèi shénme tiáojiàn？ What qualifications are needed for this job?

adjective 1 skillful; ingenious; clever 他的手藝很巧。 Tā de shǒuyì hěn qiǎo. His workmanship is excellent. 你嘴巧, 你去說他準聽。 Nǐ zuǐ qiǎo, nǐ qù shuō tā zhǔn tīng. You’re a clever talker and he’ll listen to you if you try to persuade him. 她真巧, 看見什麼花就能畫什麼花。 Tā zhēn qiǎo, kànjian shénme huā jiù néng huà shénme huā. She’s really clever—she can draw any flower that she sees. See 68772067巧匠qiao3jiang4巧匠 2 (of hand, tongue) deft; glib 嘴巧 zuǐ qiǎo glib 心靈手巧 xīnlíngshǒuqiǎo clever and deft 3 cunning; deceitful; artful 花言巧語 huāyánqiǎoyǔ sweet words; fine words; flattery; blandishments 4 opportune; coincidental 你來得真巧, 我們今天正好包餃子。 Nǐ lái de zhēn qiǎo, wǒmen jīntiān zhènghǎo bāo jiǎozi. You’ve come just at the right time. We’re just about to make jiaozi. 太巧了, 我一齣家門就來了一輛出租車。 tài qiǎo le, wǒ yī chūjiā mén jiù lái le yī liàng chūzūchē. It was most opportune that a taxi arrived just as I was leaving the house.

All rights reserved; no part of this publication may be reproduced. 此書版權歸本出版社所有。 cǐ shū bǎnquán guī běn chūbǎnshè suǒyǒu. The publisher has the copyright of the book.
verb 1 consult; refer to 參考歷史文獻 Cānkǎo lìshǐ wénxiàn consult historical documents 2 use as reference 《參考消息》 «cānkǎo xiāoxi» Reference News 僅供參考。 Jǐngōngcānkǎo. For reference only.
noun incident; event 流血事件 liúxuè shìjiàn bloody incident 意外事件 yìwài shìjiàn accident 二十世紀最大的政治事件之一 Èrshí shìjì zuìdà de zhèngzhì shìjiàn zhīyī one of the greatest political events of the 20th century
COVID-19, the coronavirus disease identified in 2019

verb find; realize; detect; discover 錯誤一經發覺, 就應改正。 Cuòwù yījīng fājué, jiù yīng gǎizhèng. Mistakes should be corrected as soon as they are detected. 火撲滅後, 他才發覺自己受了傷。 Huǒ pūmiè hòu, tā cái fājué zìjǐ shòu le shāng. He didn’t realize that he was injured until the fire had been put out.
noun noble; aristocrat 貴族習氣 guìzú xíqì aristocratic ways 封建貴族 fēngjiàn guìzú feudal nobles 精神貴族 jīngshén guìzú intellectual elite

verb 1 turn; shift; change 轉敗為勝 zhuǎnbàiwéishèng turn defeat into victory; a turn around 轉弱為強 zhuǎnruòwéiqiáng go (or grow) from weak to strong 晴轉多雲 qíng zhuǎn duō yún fine then becoming cloudy; clear to cloudy 把工作重點轉到經濟建設上來 bǎ gōngzuò zhòngdiǎn zhuǎn dào jīngjì jiànshè shànglai shift the focus of work to building the economy 她轉過頭來和我說話。 Tā zhuǎn guò tóu lái hé wǒ shuōhuà. She spoke to me over her shoulder. 2 pass on; transfer 把錢從活期存款轉為定期存款 bǎ qián cóng huóqī cúnkuǎn zhuǎnwéi dìngqī cúnkuǎn transfer the money from a current to a fixed deposit account 把她的郵件轉寄到她的新地址 Bǎ tā de yóujiàn zhuǎn jì dào tā de xīn dìzhǐ forward her mail to her new address 這封信請你轉給他。 Zhè fēng xìn qǐng nǐ zhuǎngěi tā. Please pass the letter on to him.

verb 1 arrange; lay out 文字和圖片的編排 Wénzì hé túpiàn de biānpái the layout of pictures and text 課文要按難易程度編排。 Kèwén yào àn nán yì chéngdu biānpái. The lessons should be arranged in order of difficulty. 2 write a play and rehearse it

adverb on the contrary; instead 風不但沒停, 反而更大了。 Fēng bùdàn méi tíng, fǎn'ér gèng dà le. Instead of stopping, the wind blew even harder. 困難嚇不倒我們, 反而激起我們更大的幹勁。 Kùnnan xià bù dǎo wǒmen, fǎn'ér jīqǐ wǒmen gèng dà de gànjìn. We were not cowed by difficulties. On the contrary, they inspired us to even greater efforts.

verb enjoy (rights, prestige, etc.) 享有崇高的威望 Xiǎngyǒu chónggāo de wēiwàng enjoy high prestige; be held in esteem 在我國, 婦女享有同男子平等的權利。 Zài wǒguó, fùnǚ xiǎngyǒu tóng nánzǐ píngděng de quánlì. Women in our country enjoy equal rights with men.

verb colloquial play tricks; scheme in secret; be up to some mischief 提防有人暗中搞鬼。 Dīfang yǒurén ànzhōng gǎoguǐ. Beware of foul play! 你究竟在搞什麼鬼？這麼神秘兮兮。 Nǐ jiūjìng zài gǎo shénme guǐ? Zhème shénmì xī xī. What on earth are you up to? You’re being so mysterious.

noun 1 military company 一個營有三個連。 yī ge yíng yǒu sān ge lián. A battalion has three companies. 2 (Lián) a surname verb 1 link; join; connect 把兩條電線連起來 bǎ liǎng tiáo diànxiàn lián qǐlai connect two electric wires 把零散的土地連成一片 Bǎ língsǎn de tǔdì liánchéng yī piàn join together scattered pieces of land 天連水, 水連天。 Tiān lián shuǐ, shuǐ liántiān. The sky and the water seem to merge. 這兩句話連不起來。 Zhè liǎng jù huà lián bù qǐlai. The two sentences are disconnected (or don’t hang together). 2 involve (in trouble); implicate 那件事把他也連上了。 nà jiàn shì bǎ tā yě lián shàng le. He was involved in that too. adverb continuously; in succession; one after another 連挫強手 lián cuò qiángshǒu defeat strong opponents one after another 連發三條短信 Liánfā sān tiáo duǎnxìn send three short messages in succession preposition 1 including 連你一共十個人。 Lián nǐ yī gòng shí ge rén. There are ten people, including you. 2 [used correlatively with 也,都, etc.] even 連我都知道。 Lián wǒ dōu zhīdao. Even I know. 他連報也看不懂。 Tā lián bào yě kàn bù dǒng. He can’t even read a newspaper. 他連看都沒看。 Tā lián kàn dōu méi kàn. He didn’t even look. 她緊張得連他姓什麼也沒問。 tā jǐnzhāng de lián tā xìng shénme yě méi wèn. She was so nervous that she didn’t even ask for his name.
always

noun shop sign; signboard 打著人道主義的招牌 Dǎ zhe réndàozhǔyì de zhāopai under the guise of humanitarianism 據說這招牌是一位名書法家寫的。 Jùshuō zhè zhāopai shì yī wèi míng shūfǎjiā xiě de. This signboard is said to have been written by a famous calligrapher.

verb translate; interpret 翻譯電碼 Fānyì diànmǎ decode; decipher 筆頭翻譯 bǐtóu fānyì translation 口頭翻譯 kǒutóu fānyì interpretation 逐字翻譯 zhúzì fānyì word-for-word (or literal) translation 這部書已經翻譯成多種語言。 zhè bù shū yǐjingfānyì chéng duōzhǒng yǔyán. This book has been translated into several languages. noun translator; interpreter 擔任翻譯 dānrèn fānyì work as interpreter

noun colloquial early in the morning 蘇先生今天一早就來過了。 Sū xiānsheng jīntiān yīzǎo jiù lái guò le. Mr. Su was here early this morning. 我明天一早就告訴他。 Wǒ míngtiān yīzǎo jiù gàosu tā. I’ll let him know first thing tomorrow morning.

auxiliary 1 [at the end of a sentence to express enthusiasm] 多好的天兒啊！ Duō hǎo de tiānr a! What a fine day! 這次參觀收穫不小啊！ Zhè cì cānguān shōuhuò bù xiǎo a! We’ve learned so much during this visit! 2 [at the end of a sentence to express impatience or what is obvious] 你這話說得是啊。 Nǐ zhè huà shuō de shì a. What you say is quite true. or You’re absolutely right. 我沒有去是因為我病了啊。 Wǒ méiyǒu qù shì yīnwèi wǒ bìng le a, I didn’t go because I was ill. 我也沒說你全錯了啊。 Wǒ yě méi shuō nǐ quán cuò le a. I didn’t say you were entirely wrong, did I? 3 [at the end of an order, warning, etc.] 快走啊！ Kuài zǒu a! Hurry up! 你可要小心啊！ Nǐ kě yào xiǎoxīn a! Do be careful! 4 [at the end of a sentence to express questioning] 是誰啊？ Shì shuí a？ Who is it? 這消息是真的啊？ Zhè xiāoxi shì zhēn de a？ Is this really true? 這本書你倒是要不要啊？ Zhè běn shū nǐ dào shì yào bù yào a？ So do you really want this book? 5 [indicating a deliberate pause] 你啊, 老這樣下去可不行！ Nǐ a, lǎo zhèyàng xiàqu kě bùxíng! Look, you can’t go on like this. 去年啊, 去年這會兒啊, 我還在上海呢。 Qùnián a, qùnián zhèhuìr a, wǒ hái zài Shànghǎi ne. Well, last year—about this time last year, I was still in Shanghai. 6 [enumerating items] 茄子啊, 黃瓜啊, 洋白菜啊, 西紅柿啊, 各種蔬菜擺滿了貨架。 Qiézi a, huánggua a, yángbáicài a, xīhóngshì a, gèzhǒng shūcài bǎi mǎn le huòjià. The shelves were filled with all sorts of vegetables—eggplants, cucumbers, cabbages, tomatoes. 這啊, 那啊, 她說了一大堆。 Zhè a, nà a, tā shuō le yī dà duī, She talked about this, that, and the other—oh, she said a lot of things.

verb 1 pass; pass on 此件請按名單順序向下傳。 Cǐ jiàn qǐng àn míngdān shùnxù xiàng xià chuán. Please pass on this document in the order of the name list. 2 hand down 這種藥方沒能傳下來。 Zhèzhǒng yàofāng méi néng chuán xiàlai. That herbal prescription has been lost to posterity. 這是古代傳下來的文化遺產。 Zhè shì gǔdài chuán xiàlai de wénhuà yíchǎn. This is a cultural heritage handed down from ancient times. 3 pass on (knowledge, skill, etc.); impart; teach 把技術傳給徒弟 bǎ jìshù chuán gěi túdi pass one’s skills on to one’s apprentices 4 spread 喜訊傳來, 歡聲雷動。 Xǐxùn chuánlái, huānshēng léidòng. The glad tidings gave rise to thunderous cheers. 消息很快傳開了。 Xiāoxi hěn kuài chuánkāi le. The news spread quickly. or The news soon got around. 這個秘密是他傳出去的。 Zhège mìmì shì tā chuánchū qù de. He’s the one who let out the secret. 5 transmit; conduct 傳熱 chuánrè transmit heat 銅傳電。 Tóng chuán diàn. Copper conducts electricity. 6 convey; express 難以言傳 nányǐ yán chuán hard to express in words 7 summon 傳證人 chuán zhèngrén summon a witness 8 infect; be contagious 小心別讓孩子們傳上流感。 xiǎoxīn bié ràng háizimenchuán shàngliú gǎn. Mind that the children don’t catch the flu. 9 send a document by email or fax 把一篇文章作附件傳給某人 bǎ yī piān wénzhāng zuò fùjiàn chuán gěi mǒurén send an article as an attachment to sb.

noun fortune; luck 他運氣好, 提升了。 Tā yùnqi hǎo, tíshēng le. He had the good fortune to be promoted. 唉, 運氣老是不好。 Ài, yùnqi lǎo shì bù hǎo. Just my luck! 這回可來了運氣了。 Zhè huí kě lái le yùnqi le. adjective 1 soft; flexible; supple; pliable (opp. 硬) 軟椅 ruǎn yǐ soft chair 軟任務 ruǎn rènwu elastic (or open-ended) task 柳條很軟。 Liǔtiáo hěn ruǎn. Willow twigs are pliable. 2 soft; mild; gentle 你對他軟了些。 Nǐ duì tā ruǎn le xiē. You’ve been a bit soft with him. 他話說得太軟了。 Tā huà shuō de tài ruǎn le. He spoke too mildly. 兒子一哭, 她心就軟了下來。 Érzi yī kū, tā xīn jiù ruǎn le xiàlai. When she saw her son cry, her heart softened. 3 weak; feeble 他兩腿發軟。 Tā liǎng tuǐ fā ruǎn. His legs felt weak (or like jelly). 近來爺爺的身子骨兒越來越軟。 Jìnlái yéye de shēnzigǔr yuèláiyuè ruǎn. adverb even (to the extent that) 他忙得甚至好幾夜沒睡覺。 Tā máng de shènzhì hǎo jǐ yè méi shuìjiào. He was so busy that he didn’t even go to bed for several nights. conjunction (go) so far as to; so much so that 他對大家的批評置若罔聞, 甚至反唇相譏。 tā duì dàjiā de pīpíng zhìruòwǎngwén, shènzhì fǎnchúnxiāngjī. He not only ignored the criticism of the others but went so far as to be sarcastic.

verb lose hope; lose heart 雖然多次失敗, 他們並沒有完全失望。 Suīrán duōcì shībài, tāmen bìng méiyǒu wánquán shīwàng. They failed time and again, but they never gave up hope. adjective disappointed 感到失望 Gǎndào shīwàng be disappointed 令人失望 lìng rén shīwàng disappointing 我們對你太失望了。 Wǒmen duì nǐ tài shīwàng le. We are utterly disappointed with (or in) you. 很抱歉又一次讓你失望, 可是我實在抽不出身來。 Hěn bàoqiàn yòu yīcì ràng nǐ shīwàng, kěshì wǒ shízài chōu bù chūshēn lái. I’m sorry to disappoint you again, but really I’ll be tied up then.

noun difference 這兩個詞在意義上沒有區別。 Zhè liǎng ge cí zài yìyì shàng méi yǒu qūbié. There is no difference in meaning between the two words. verb distinguish; differentiate; make a distinction between 區別對待 qūbié duìdài deal with each case on its merits; deal with different things or people in different ways 區別好壞 qūbié hǎo-huài distinguish between good and bad 把兩者區別開來 Bǎ liǎngzhě qūbié kāi lái differentiate one from the other 你能區別普通話和北京話嗎？ Nǐ néng qūbié Pǔtōnghuà hé Běijīng huà ma？ Can you tell the difference between putonghua and Beijing dialect?

noun [after 年, 月, 省 or 縣 to form units for differentiation] 年份 niánfèn year 月份 yuèfèn month measure word 1 share; part; portion (of a whole) 把錢平分成三份。 Bǎ qián píng fēnchéng sān fèn. Divide the money into three equal shares. 這一份是你的。 Zhè yī fèn shì nǐ de. This share is yours. 2 [with numerals to form a nominal phrase] part; portion 送一份禮 Sòng yī fèn lǐ present a gift 為祖國出一份力 wèi zǔguó chū yī fèn lì do one’s bit for one’s country 兩份客飯, 三份冰激凌 liǎng fèn kèfàn, sān fèn bīngjilíng two set meals and three ice creams 跟大伙兒一樣, 我也為她擔著一份心呢！ gēn dàhuǒr yīyàng, wǒ yě wèi tā dān zhe yī fèn xīn ne! I’m worried about her just as you are. 3 [for certain nonphysical things, used after 這 or 那] 瞧他那份神氣！ Qiáo tā nà fèn shénqi! Look what airs he puts on! 我心裡那份痛快就甭提了。 Wǒ xīnli nà fèn tòngkuai jiù béngtíle. Needless to say, I was overjoyed. 4 [for documents, newspapers, periodicals, etc.] copy 一份《人民日報》 Yī fèn 《Rénmín Rìbào》 a copy of People’s Daily 這篇報告請複印三份。 Zhè piān bàogào qǐng fùyìn sān fèn. Xerox three copies of this report, please. 協議一式兩份, 每份都用漢語和英語寫成, 兩種文本具有同等效力。 Xiéyì yī shì liǎng fèn, měi fèn dōu yòng Hànyǔ hé Yīngyǔ xiě chéng, liǎng zhǒng wénběn jùyǒu tóngděng xiàolì. The agreement is in duplicate, in the Chinese and English languages, both texts being equally authentic.

Her family has been working-class for three generations. 學習是一輩子的事。 xuéxí shì yī bèizi de shì. Learning is a lifelong affair. or Live and learn.

pronoun it 這杯牛奶你喝了它。 Zhè bēi niúnǎi nǐ hē le tā. Drink up this glass of milk. 有個東西在黑影裡蹲著, 我也看不清它到底是貓還是狗。 Yǒu ge dōngxi zài hēiyǐng lǐ dūn zhe, wǒ yě kàn bù qīng tā dàodǐ shì māo háishi gǒu. He can’t do anything without grumbling. 她總是埋怨自己不好, 從不抱怨別人。 Tā zǒngshì mányuàn zìjǐ bù hǎo, cóngbù bàoyuàn biéren. She always blames herself, and never others. 這臺錄音機是他搞壞的, 卻埋怨上我了。 Zhè tái lùyīnjī shì tā gǎo huài de, què mányuàn shàng wǒ le. verb 1 live; reside; stay 住城外 Zhù chéngwài live in the suburbs 住旅館 zhù lǚguǎn stay at a hotel 對面沒人住。 Duìmiàn méi rén zhù. Nobody lives opposite me. 他住在北京。 Tā zhù zài Běijīng. He lives in Beijing. 我住這間屋。 Wǒ zhù zhè jiān wū. I live in this room. or This is my room. 我們住上了新房。 Wǒmen zhù shàng le xīnfáng. We’ve moved into a new house. 2 stop; cease 雨住了。 Yǔ zhù le. The rain has stopped. 等風住了再走。 Děng fēng zhù le zài zǒu. Go when the wind drops. 3 [after a verb] firmly; to a stop 支持不住 zhīchíbuzhù cannot withstand; cannot hold out 拿住了, 別撒手。 Ná zhù le, bié sāshǒu. Hold tight and don’t let go. 她擋住了我的去路。 Tā dǎngzhù le wǒ de qù lù. She blocked my way. 這一下你可把我問住了。 Zhè yī xià nǐ kě bǎ wǒ wèn zhù le. You’ve got me there. or I don’t know what to say. 聽到這個消息我一下子愣住了。 Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi wǒ yīxiàzi lèng zhù le. I was struck dumb at the news. 悠揚的小提琴聲把我吸引住了。 Yōuyáng de xiǎotíqín shēng bǎ wǒ xīyǐn zhù le. The beautiful notes of a violin held me spellbound.

He’s got too much to do and should be relieved of some of his work. 3 avoid; avert; escape 免受嫌疑 miǎn shòu xiányí avert suspicion; be free from suspicion 免於受災 Miǎnyú shòuzāi avert a disaster 4 should not; not be allowed 免納捐稅 miǎn nà juānshuì exempt from taxes and duties 閒免進。 Xiánrénmiǎnjìn. Staff only.
adjective moving; touching 動人的情景 dòngrén de qíngjǐng a moving scene 動人的事跡 dòngrén de shìjì stirring deeds 故事非常動人。 gùshi fēicháng dòngrén. The story is very touching.

verb 1 gather together; collect; assemble 昨天下班後大伙兒湊合在一起練歌。 Zuótiān xiàbān hòu dàhuǒr còuhe zài yīqǐ liàn gē. Yesterday we gathered after work to practise singing. 2 improvise 請大家會前作好發言準備, 不要臨時湊合。 Qǐng dàjiā huì qián zuò hǎo fāyán zhǔnbèi, bùyào línshí còuhe. Please prepare before coming to the meeting. Don’t speak off the cuff. 3 make do 我這件棉襖湊合著還能穿一冬。 Wǒ zhè jiàn mián'ǎo còuhe zhe hái néng chuān yī dōng. I can make this padded jacket do for another winter. 他沒有學過會計, 但還能湊合著記記賬。 Tā méiyǒu xué guò kuàijì, dàn hái néng còuhe zhe jì jì zhàng. He isn’t a trained accountant, but he manages to keep simple accounts. adjective passable; not too bad 這本小說怎麼樣？——還湊合。 Zhè běn xiǎoshuō zěnmeyàng？ —— hái còuhe. What do you think of this novel?—Not too bad.

noun happiness; well-being 人生的幸福 Rénshēng de xìngfú happiness of life 為人民謀幸福 wèi rénmín móu xìngfú work for the well-being of the people 祝你幸福。 Zhù nǐ xìngfú. I wish you happiness. 幸福是太多和太少之間的一站。 xìngfú shì tài duō hé tài shǎo zhījiān de yī zhàn. Happiness is a way station between too much and too little. adjective happy 幸福的回憶 Xìngfú de huíyì happy memories

verb reflect; mirror; shine 他的臉被爐火映得通紅。 Tā de liǎn bèi lúhuǒ yìng de tōnghóng. His cheeks shone red before the glowing oven. 朝霞映在湖面上。 Zhāoxiá yìng zài húmiàn shàng. The glory of the dawn is mirrored on the lake.

noun 1 abbreviation chemistry 2 (Huà) a surname verb 1 change; turn; transform 化公為私 huàgōngwéisī appropriate public property 化害為利 huà hài wéi lì turn harm into good; turn a disadvantage into an advantage 化悲痛為力量 huà bēitòng wéi lìliang turn grief into strength [usu. in a memorial speech] 2 convert; influence 感化 gǎnhuà reform through persuasion 3 melt; dissolve 雪化了。 Xuě huà le. The snow has melted. 他把藥片用水化開。 Tā bǎ yàopiàn yòngshuǐ huà kāi. He dissolved the pills in water. 4 digest 消化 xiāohuà digestion 5 burn up 焚化 fénhuà cremate 6 religion die 坐化 zuòhuà die in a sitting posture 7 [as a verb suffix] -ize; -ify 磁化 cíhuà magnetize 簡化 jiǎnhuà simplify 歐化 ōuhuà Europeanize verb (of Buddhist monks or Taoist priests) beg alms See 22934016化齋hua4zhai1化齋

verb 1 choose; select; pick out 挑最好的作種子 tiāo zuì hǎo de zuò zhǒngzi select the best for seeds 挑個好日子舉行婚禮 tiāo ge hǎo rìzi jǔxíng hūnlǐ choose a propitious day for the wedding 把那筐西紅柿挑一挑。 Bǎ nà kuāng xīhóngshì tiāo yī tiāo. Pick over that basket of tomatoes. 她挑出了一件特別喜歡的連衣裙。 Tā tiāo chū le yī jiàn tèbié xǐhuan de liányīqún. She picked out one dress that she particularly liked. 2 nitpick; be hypercritical; be fastidious 挑毛病 tiāo máobìng find fault 他講的話你就別挑錯兒了。 Tā jiǎng de huà nǐ jiù bié tiāocuòr le. Stop picking holes in what he said. verb carry (or tote) on the shoulder with a pole; shoulder 挑水點種 tiāoshuǐ diǎnzhǒng carry (or fetch) water for dibbling (seeds, young plants, etc.) 挑著一擔菜 Tiāo zhe yī dān cài carry two baskets of vegetables on a shoulder pole 挑起領導生產的重擔 tiāoqǐ lǐngdǎo shēngchǎn de zhòngdàn shoulder the heavy responsibility of leading production noun VARIANT OF 31447040挑子tiao1zi5挑子 1 carrying pole with its load 2 load carried on a shoulder pole measure word [for a load carried on a shoulder pole] 一挑水 yī tiāoshuǐ two buckets of water on a shoulder pole

verb seem; look like 好像要下雪。 Hǎoxiàng yào xiàxuě. It looks like snow. 好像誰也沒聽見鈴響。 Hǎoxiàng shuí yě méi tīngjiàn líng xiǎng. No one seems to have heard the bell. 他們好像是多年的老朋友了。 Tāmen hǎoxiàng shì duōnián de lǎopéngyou le. They seem to have been close friends for many years. 她們倆處得好像親姐妹一樣。 Tāmen liǎ chǔ de hǎoxiàng qīnjiěmèi yīyàng. The two of them were as intimate as sisters. 這個人我好像在哪兒見過。 zhège rén wǒ hǎoxiàng zài nǎr jiàn guò. I seem to have met this man before.

verb remember; learn by heart; bear in mind 記住這個教訓 jìzhu zhège jiàoxun keep this lesson in mind 把這首詩記住 bǎ zhè shǒu shī jìzhu learn the poem by heart 你記得住這些數字嗎？ Nǐ jì de zhù zhèxiē shùzì ma？ Can you carry all these figures in your head? 我記不住這麼多電話號碼。 Wǒ jì bù zhù zhème duō diànhuà hàomǎ. I can’t bear in mind so many telephone numbers.

noun reason; cause; motive 為了友誼的緣故 Wèile yǒuyì deyuángù for the sake of friendship 那孩子身體虛弱, 是因為營養不良的緣故。 nà háizi shēntǐ xūruò, shì yīnwèi yíngyǎng bùliáng deyuángù. Malnutrition was the cause of the child’s weakness. 西紅柿在這土里長不好, 其中必有緣故。 Xīhóngshì zài zhè tǔ lǐ zhǎng bù hǎo, qízhōng bì yǒu yuángù. There must be some reason why tomatoes will not flourish in this soil.

noun 1 figurative trend of events (as affecting a person) 避避風頭 Bì bìfēng tou lie low until sth. blows over 看風頭辦事 kàn fēngtou bànshì act according to circumstances 2 pejorative show-off 風頭十足 Fēngtoushízú be very much in the limelight See 18852608出風頭chu1feng1tou5出風頭
1 (slang) wow! 2 also pr. [wāsēi]

noun 1 essay; article 2 literary works; writings 3 hidden (or implied) meaning 話裡有文章。 Huà lǐ yǒu wénzhāng. There is something behind that remark. or That’s an insinuating remark. 其中大有文章。 Qízhōng dàyǒuwénzhāng. There is more than meets the eye. See 37179904做文章zuo4wen2zhang1做文章

noun colloquial all one's life; throughout one's life; as long as one lives; lifetime 一輩子也忘不了。 Yī bèizi yě wàngbuliǎo. I won’t forget as long as I live. 這工作我準備幹它一輩子。 Zhè gōngzuò wǒ zhǔnbèi gàn tā yī bèizi. I’m taking this as a lifelong job.
verb 1 boil; cook in water; brew (tea, coffee, etc.) 2 fry quickly in hot oil and stir in sauce 烹對蝦 Pēng duìxiā quick-fried prawns in brown sauce
noun good faith; sincerity 表明誠意 Biǎomíng chéngyì show one’s good faith 缺乏誠意 quēfá chéngyì lack sincerity 誰也不懷疑你的誠意。 Shuí yě bù huáiyí nǐ de chéngyì. No one doubts your sincerity.

noun 1 bittern 2 chemistry halogen 3 thick gravy used as a sauce for noodles, etc. 打鹵麵 dǎlǔmiàn noodles with thick gravy 拿什麼打鹵？ Ná shénme dǎ lǔ? What to make the gravy with? 4 thick infusion 茶鹵兒 chálǔr strong tea (to be diluted before drinking) verb stew chickens, ducks, meat, etc. in soy sauce 鹵蛋 lǔdàn spiced corned egg 鹵雞 lǔjī pot-stewed chicken adjective stupid; dull
