verb 1 VARIANT OF 23928064交代jiao1dai4交代 3 account for; justify oneself 2 VARIANT OF 23928064交代jiao1dai4交代 4 confess; make a clean breast of sth. 3 humorous fail; end 我這條命差點兒在車禍中交待了。 Wǒ zhè tiáo mìng chàdiǎnr zài chēhuò zhōng jiāodài le. I was almost killed in the traffic accident.

noun 1 week 上周 shàngzhōu last week 2 abbreviation VARIANT OF 36472320週波zhou1bo1週波 a cycle b unit of electric frequency, equal to one cycle per second; hertz verb go round; move in a circular course See 36473088週而復始zhou1er2fu4shi3週而復始 adjective 1 all; whole; all over; all around 周體 zhōu tǐ all over the body measure word circle; round; circuit 轉體兩周半 zhuǎntǐ liǎng zhōu bàn two and half twists 運動員繞場一周。 Yùndòngyuán rào chǎng yī zhōu. The athletes went round the field once. 地球繞太陽一周是一年。 Dìqiú rào tàiyáng yī zhōu shì yī nián. It takes the earth one year to circle the sun.

verb 1 have a mind to; be inclined (or disposed) to 有意幫忙 Yǒuyì bāngmáng be ready to help 2 take a fancy to sb.; be attracted sexually 他早就對她有意, 可就是開不了口。 Tā zǎojiù duì tā yǒuyì, kějiùshi kāibuliǎo kǒu. He has been attracted to her for a long time but does not have the courage to declare. adverb intentionally; deliberately; purposely 有意刁難 yǒuyì diāonàn make things difficult for sb. on purpose 有意歪曲 yǒuyì wāiqū deliberately distort 他有意與我們作對。 Tā yǒuyì yǔ wǒmen zuòduì. He set himself against us intentionally. 有意栽花花不開, 無心插柳柳成蔭。 yǒuyì zāihuā huā bù kāi, wúxīn chā liǔ liǔ chéngyìn. Follow love, and it will flee; flee love, and it will follow (thee).
mushroom
noun 1 catalogue; list 圖書目錄 túshū mùlù library catalogue 出口商品目錄 chūkǒu shāngpǐn mùlù catalogue of export commodities; export list 2 table of contents; contents 3 computing directory
1 its place 2 one's appointed place 3 the place for that

adjective fixed; regular 固定節目 gùdìng jiémù regular (or scheduled) programme 固定職業 Gùdìng zhíyè permanent occupation 不要用固定眼光看問題。 Bù yào yòng gùdìng yǎnguāng kàn wèntí. Don’t take a static view of things. verb fix; regularize 把燈座固定在車床上 Bǎ dēngzuò gùdìng zài chē chuáng shàng fix the lampstand on the lathe 把業務學習時間固定下來 bǎ yèwù xuéxí shíjiān gùdìng xiàlai set a regular time for vocational study

verb contain; embody; include 沒有什麼事物是不包含矛盾的。 Méiyǒu shénme shìwù shì bù bāohán máodùn de. There is nothing that does not contain contradictions. 這句話包含好幾層意思。 Zhè jù huà bāohán hǎojǐ céng yìsi. This statement has quite a few implications.

verb 1 embezzle; practise graft; be corrupt 貪污 tānwū embezzle 2 have an insatiable desire for 貪女色 Tān nǚsè be fond of women; be a womanizer 他貪吃, 這回把肚子吃壞了。 Tā tānchī, zhè huí bǎ dùzi chī huài le. He’s such a glutton and this time he ate himself sick. 3 covet; hanker after 貪安逸 Tān ānyì seek ease and comfort 貪大求全 tāndàqiúquán go in for grandiose projects; be fond of ostentation

noun man and wife; husband and wife 夫妻分居 fū qī fēn jū separation; live apart 夫妻無隔夜之仇 (=夫妻不生隔夜氣)。 fūqī wú géyè zhī chóu Enmity between husband and wife doesn’t last the night.

verb explain; expound; interpret 解釋法律 jiěshì fǎlǜ interpret laws 解釋新詞 jiěshì xīncí explain a new word 對這件事你怎樣解釋？ Duì zhè jiàn shì nǐ zěnyàng jiěshì? How do you account for this? 這些事實不能有別的解釋。 Zhèxiē shìshí bù néng yǒu bié de jiěshì. The facts admit of no other explanation. 這是誤會, 解釋一下就行了。 Zhè shì wùhuì, jiěshì yīxià jiù xíng le. This is a misunderstanding. A little explanation will clear it up. 河水的流動可以用重力原理來解釋。 Héshuǐ de liúdòng kěyǐ yòng zhònglì yuánlǐ lái jiěshì. The flow of river water is explained by the principle of gravity. 對本協定在解釋上遇有分岐, 應以中文本為準。 Duìběn xiédìng zài jiěshì shàng yù yǒufèn qí, yīng yǐ Zhōngwén běn wéi zhǔn. In case of divergence of interpretation of this agreement, the Chinese text shall prevail.

noun 1 upheaval; riot; unrest; turmoil 內亂 nèiluàn civil strife 戰亂 zhànluàn chaos caused by war; war 2 disorder; disturbance; trouble 添亂兒 Tiān luàn r add confusion to sth. 當斷不斷, 反受其亂。 dāngduànbùduàn, fǎn shòu qí luàn. Being indecisive will lead to troubles. 3 archaic literature last paragraph of a musical composition or genre of classical Chinese poetry verb throw into disorder; confuse; mix up 亂了方寸 luàn le fāngcùn put one’s mind in turmoil; be greatly agitated 亂了手腳 luànleshǒujiǎo throw sb. into disarray 君其遺之女樂, 以亂其政。(《韓非子》) Jūn qí wèi zhī nǚ yuè, yǐ luàn qí zhèng. (《Hán Fēi Zǐ》) You might send him some women musicians to throw his rule into disorder. adjective 1 in disorder; in a mess; in confusion 全亂了 quán luàn le be in a utter (or wild) confusion 線亂了。 Xiàn luàn le. The thread is tangled. 車站很亂。 Chēzhàn hěn luàn. The station was in a state of disorder. 屋裡很亂, 請收拾一下。 wū lǐ hěn luàn, qǐng shōushi yīxià. The room is in a mess; please tidy it up. 這篇稿子太亂, 是不是重抄一下？ Zhè piān gǎozi tài luàn, shì bù shì zhòng chāo yīxià？ The manuscript’s too messy. How about copying it out? 這裡太亂, 找個安靜點兒的地方談談。 Zhèlǐ tài luàn, zhǎo ge ānjìng diǎnr de dìfang tán tán. It’s too noisy here; let’s find a quieter place to chat. 2 in a confused state of mind 我心裡很亂。 Wǒ xīnli hěn luàn. My mind is in turmoil. 3 (of a society) turbulent; riotous See 26311424亂世luan4shi4亂世 4 (of sexual relationships) improper; promiscuous 性亂行為 Xìng luàn xíngwéi sexual promiscuity adverb indiscriminately; at random; arbitrarily 亂跑 luànpǎo run all over the place; dash about 亂扔 luànrēng tumble over 亂罰款 luàn fákuǎn impose unjustified fines 亂花錢 luànhuāqián spend money extravagantly 亂收費 luàn shōufèi collect fees arbitrarily 亂出主意 luàn chū zhǔyi give advice offhand 亂穿馬路 luànchuānmǎlù jaywalk 亂講一氣 luànjiǎng yī qì speak indiscreetly; make irresponsible remarks 亂作決定 luànzuòjuédìng make an arbitrary decision 他在牆上亂寫。 Tā zài qiáng shàng luàn xiě. He scribbled on the wall. 各種木料亂堆在一起。 Gèzhǒng mùliào luàn duī zài yīqǐ. Logs and planks of all shapes and sizes were jumbled together.
adjective 1 statistics random 2 mathematics stochastic adverb according to circumstances 隨機調整做法 suíjī tiáozhěng zuòfǎ adjust one’s approach according to what happens

verb 1 lose (opp. 得) 失民心 shī mínxīn lose the support of the people 失而復得 shī'érfùdé lost and found again 得大於失。 Dé dàyú shī. Gains outweigh losses. 2 miss; let slip 失標 shī biāo fail in bidding; fail to win the tender 良機莫失。 Liángjī mò shī. Don’t let slip this good chance. 3 not act according to; neglect; violate 失序 shīxù be in disorder 4 lose control of 失魂 shīhún get frightened; be out of one’s wits 5 err; have a slip; be defective in 失之於煩瑣 shī zhī yú fánsuǒ have the defect of being too detailed 6 cannot find 迷失 míshī lose one’s bearings See 29966080失群shi1qun2失群 7 fail to achieve one's end See 29971712失望shi1wang4失望;29976576失意shi1yi4失意 8 deviant from the normal 驚慌失色 jīnghuāngshīsè turn pale from fear or surprise 不失身份 bù shī shēnfen be compatible with one’s status See 29967360失神shi1shen2失神;29971200失態shi1tai4失態 noun slip; mistake; defect; mishap 唯恐有失 wéikǒng yǒushī fear that there may be some mishap
adverb inadvertently; unwittingly; accidentally 他們無意中發現了一些古代文物。 tāmenwúyìzhōng fāxiàn le yīxiē gǔdài wénwù. They accidentally unearthed some ancient relics.

noun finger 拇指 mǔzhǐ thumb verb 1 point at; point to 時針指向十二點。 Shízhēn zhǐxiàng shí'èr diǎn. The hour hand points to twelve. 他朝那個門指了指。 Tā cháo nàge mén zhǐ le zhǐ. He pointed at that door. 2 indicate; point out; refer to 指出缺點 zhǐchū quēdiǎn point out sb.’s shortcomings 指出正確方向 Zhǐchū zhèngquè fāngxiàng point out the correct direction 他的話不是指你說的。 Tā de huà bù shì zhǐ nǐ shuō de. His remarks were not directed at you. 文學史上談到李, 杜, 指的是李白和杜甫。 wénxuéshǐ shàng tándào lǐ, dù, zhǐ de shì Lǐ Bó hé Dù Fǔ. In histories of Chinese literature, Li and Du refer to Li Bai and Du Fu. 3 depend on; count on 一家子都指著我。 Yījiāzi dōu zhǐ zhe wǒ. My wife and children depend on me. 他們就指著你幫忙哩。 Tāmen jiù zhǐ zhe nǐ bāngmáng li. They’re counting on your help. 4 literary (of hair) bristle See 20665600髮指fa4zhi3髮指fàzhǐ measure word fingerwidth; digit 兩指寬的紙條 liǎng zhǐ kuān de zhǐtiáo a strip of paper two finger wide 下了四指雨。 Xiàle sì zhǐ yǔ. We had about four inches of rain.
noun (academic) degree 博士學位 bóshì xuéwèi doctor’s degree; doctorate 名譽學位 míngyù xuéwèi honorary degree 碩士學位 shuòshì xuéwèi master’s degree

verb 1 revolve; turn round 行星繞著太陽運轉。 Xíngxīng rào zhe tàiyáng yùnzhuǎn. The planets revolve round the sun. 2 (of machines) work; operate 運轉不靈 Yùnzhuǎn bù líng not work well; be out of order 機器運轉正常。 Jīqì yùnzhuǎn zhèngcháng. The machine is running well. 3 (of organization) work; operate 保持市場運轉 bǎochí shìchǎng yùnzhuǎn keep the market in operation 經濟運轉水平 jīngjì yùnzhuǎn shuǐpíng level of economic activity

noun the eight points of the compass; all directions 八方呼應 bāfāng hūyìng responses from every direction; cooperation from all 八方受困 bāfāngshòukùn be hard pressed from all sides 一方有難, 八方支援。 Yī fāng yǒu nàn, bāfāng zhīyuán. noun 1 king; magnate 石油大王 shí yóu dà wáng oil king; oil magnate 2 person of the highest class or skill in sth.; ace 足球大王 zúqiú dàwáng ace footballer; football hero

verb (of a past event) reappear; be reproduced 再現在眼前 Zàixiàn zài yǎnqián reappear before one’s eyes 使救援行動的場面在銀幕上再現 Shǐ jiùyuán xíngdòng de chǎngmiàn zài yínmù shàng zàixiàn reproduce on the screen scenes of the rescue operation

verb rise; hoist; go up; ascend (opp. 降) 東方紅, 太陽升。 Dōngfāng hóng, tàiyáng shēng. In the east the sky is red. The sun is rising. verb promote (opp. 降) 升(為)教授 shēng jiàoshòu get promoted to professor 升到領導崗位 shēng dào lǐngdǎo gǎngwèi be promoted to positions of leadership noun a sheng measure, equal to 0.1 dou (斗) measure word 1 litre (l) 三升啤酒 sān shēng píjiǔ three litres of beer 2 sheng (a traditional unit of volume, equivalent to 1 litre or 1.76 pints or 0.22 gallon)

noun assignment; mission; task; job 承擔任務 chéngdān rènwu assume a mission 接受任務 Jiēshòu rènwu accept an assignment 完成任務 wánchéng rènwu fulfill the task; complete the mission 主要任務 zhǔyào rènwu main task 擔負艱巨的任務 Dānfù jiānjù de rènwu shoulder a difficult task 壓倒一切的任務 yādǎo yīqiè de rènwu overwhelming task

auxiliary [expressing forbearance, resignation, etc.] well; all right 也罷, 你一定要走, 我就不留你了。 Yěbà, nǐ yīdìng yào zǒu, wǒ jiù bù liú nǐ le. All right, I won’t keep you any longer since you insist on going. auxiliary [reduplicated] whether...or...; no matter whether 颳風也罷, 下雪也罷, 他都堅持跑步。 Guāfēng yěbà, xiàxuě yěbà, tā dōu jiānchí pǎobù. He keeps up his jogging whether it’s blowing or snowing. 你去也罷, 不去也罷, 反正是一樣。 Nǐ qù yěbà, bù qù yěbà, fǎnzheng shì yīyàng. It makes no difference whether you go or not.
noun astronomy constellation
verb pace; stroll 踱方步 duó fāngbù walk with measured tread 踱來踱去 duóláiduóqù pace to and fro; pace up and down
verb abandon; give up; renounce 放棄原則 fàngqì yuánzé forsake one’s principles 放棄表決權 fàngqì biǎojuéquán abstain from voting 放棄原有計劃 fàngqì yuányǒu jìhuà abandon the original plan

verb conform to; agree with; correspond to; identical to; fall in with; the same as; fit in with 他的想法跟我們的計劃恰好相合。 Tā de xiǎngfa gēn wǒmen de jìhuà qiàhǎo xiānghé. His ideas coincided perfectly with our plan.
idiom arise suddenly; come all of a sudden; appear out of nowhere

verb 1 prop up; support 兩手撐著下巴 Liǎng shǒu chēng zhe xiàba rest one’s chin in both hands 一手撐起身子 yīshǒu chēng qǐ shēnzi prop oneself up on one hand 2 push (or move) with a pole; pole 撐船 chēngchuán pole a boat; punt 3 maintain; keep up 他實在撐不住, 笑出了聲。 tā shízài chēng bùzhù, xiàochū le shēng. He could not help laughing. 他連著打了兩場球, 再打恐怕撐不住勁兒了。 Tā lián zhe dǎ le liǎng chǎng qiú, zài dǎ kǒngpà chēng bù zhù jìnr le. I’m afraid he won’t be able to go on with another game; he’s played two in a row already. 4 open; unfurl 撐傘 chēngsǎn open an umbrella 把麻袋撐開 bǎ mádài chēng kāi hold open the sack 5 colloquial fill to the point of bursting 別裝得太多, 把口袋撐破了。 Bié zhuāng de tài duō, bǎ kǒudài chēng pò le. Don’t stuff the sack too full or it’ll burst. 我已經有點兒撐, 不能再吃了。 Wǒ yǐjing yǒudiǎnrchēng, bùnéng zài chī le. I’m rather full and can’t eat any more. noun mechanics brace; stay 角撐 Jiǎo chēng corner brace

adverb literary (be) about to; on the point of; soon 即將到來 jí jiāng dàolái be at hand; upcoming; drawing near 比賽即將開始。 Bǐsài jíjiāng kāishǐ. The match is about to begin. 勝利即將到來。 Shènglì jíjiāng dàolái. Victory is at hand. 國慶節即將來臨。 Guóqìngjié jíjiāng láilín. It will soon be National Day. 水電站即將竣工。 Shuǐdiànzhàn jíjiāng jùngōng. The hydroelectric station is nearing completion.
verb 1 look up at 仰望星空 yǎngwàng xīngkōng look up at the starlit sky 2 literary respectfully seek guidance or help from; look up to
verb 1 measure with the eye; look sb. up and down; size up 上下打量 shàng-xià dǎliang look up and down 2 dialect think; suppose; reckon 你打量她會來嗎？ nǐ dǎliang tā huì lái ma? Do you think she will come?
adverb over and over again; time and again; again and again; repeatedly 再三考慮 zàisān kǎolǜ reconsider 再三再四 Zàisānzàisì over and over again 再三囑咐 Zàisān zhǔfu repeatedly bid (or tell)

noun condition; state; state of affairs 健康狀況 jiànkāng zhuàngkuàng physical condition; state of health; health 經濟狀況 jīngjì zhuàngkuàng (a person’s) financial situation; (a country’s) economic situation 改善這種狀況 gǎishàn zhèzhǒng zhuàngkuàng remedy this state of affairs

pronoun literary what; which 何人 hérén who 何時 héshí what time; when 何往 hé wǎng whither 何濟於事？ Héjìyúshì？ Of what avail is it? 從何而來？ Cóng hé ér lái？ Where from? 有何不可？ Yǒuhébùkě？ Why not? noun (Hé) a surname

verb be able to bear (or endure) 耐穿 nàichuān (of clothing) can stand wear and tear; wear well 耐嚴寒 nài yánhán resistant to low temperature 他再也耐不住性子了。 Tā zài yě nài bù zhù xìngzi le. He could no longer contain his anger. 這種料子很耐洗。 Zhèzhǒng liàozi hěn nài xǐ. This material washes well.
egg tart
noun weight lifting
verb boil; cook 煮飯 zhǔfàn cook rice 煮雞蛋 zhǔjīdàn boil (or boiled) eggs

verb defend; guard; protect 保家衛國 bǎojiāwèiguó protect our homes and defend our country noun dated place for stationing troops (in the Ming Dynasty) noun 1 Wei (a vassal state of the Zhou Dynasty) 2 a surname
noun pet 寵物狗 chǒngwùgǒu pet dog 寵物貓 chǒngwù māo pet cat 養寵物 yǎng chǒngwù keep a pet 電子寵物 diànzǐ chǒngwù electronic pet 他把蛇當寵物養。 tā bǎ shé dāng chǒngwù yǎng. He keeps snakes as pets.
adverb indeed; really 我的確不知道。 Wǒ díquè bù zhīdao. I really don’t know. 聽到這消息我的確很高興。 Tīngdào zhè xiāoxi wǒ díquè hěn gāoxìng. I was indeed very glad to hear the news.
noun sweet food; sweets 他愛吃甜食。 Tā ài chī tiánshí. He has a sweet tooth. or He likes sweet things.
1 to contain 2 including

adjective 1 fragrant; sweet-smelling; aromatic; scented (opp. 臭) 稻香千里 dào xiāng qiān lǐ the fragrance of ripening rice spreading far and wide 茉莉花好香。 Mòlihuā hǎo xiāng. What a sweet jasmine scent! 2 savoury; appetizing; delicious; tasty 這飯真香。 Zhè fàn zhēn xiāng. This food is really tasty. 炒什麼菜啊？好香呀！ Chǎo shénme cài a？ Hǎo xiāng ya! What’s cooking? It smells delicious. 3 with relish; with good appetite 吃得很香 Chī de hěn xiāng eat with relish; enjoy the food 昨晚沒睡好, 吃飯不香。 Zuówǎn méi shuì hǎo, chīfàn bù xiāng. I have no appetite because I had a bad night. 4 (of sleep) sound 她睡得正香呢。 Tā shuì de zhèng xiāng ne. She’s sound asleep. 5 popular; welcome 這種摩托車在農村可香了。 Zhèzhǒng mótuōchē zài nóngcūn kě xiāng le. This type of motorcycle is very popular in the countryside. noun 1 perfume; fragrance; spice; flavouring 麝香 shèxiāng musk 檀香 tánxiāng white sandalwood 2 incense; joss stick 盤香 pánxiāng incense coil 蚊香 wénxiāng mosquito-repellent incense

verb 1 be able to; be capable of 能夠獨立工作 Nénggòu dúlì gōngzuò be able to work on one’s own 他能夠說三種外語。 Tā nénggòu shuō sān zhǒng wàiyǔ. He can speak three foreign languages. 這條河的下游能夠行駛輪船。 Zhè tiáo hé de xiàyóu nénggòu xíngshǐ lúnchuán. The lower reaches of the river are navigable for steamers. 2 be allowed to 明天的晚會, 家屬也能夠參加。 Míngtiān de wǎnhuì, jiāshǔ yě nénggòu cānjiā. Family members are also welcome at tomorrow’s party.

verb tighten 緊一緊背包帶 Jǐn yī jǐn bēibāo dài tighten the knapsack straps adjective 1 tight; taut; close 緊握手中槍 jǐnwò shǒuzhōng qiāng hold the gun tightly 把螺絲擰緊 bǎ luósī níng jǐn tighten the screw 把繩子拉緊 Bǎ shéngzi lā jǐn pull the rope taut 日程安排得很緊。 Rìchéng ānpái de hěn jǐn. The programme is packed. 他住在我的緊隔壁。 Tā zhù zài wǒ de jǐn gébì. He lives right next door to me. 一個勝利緊接著一個勝利。 Yī ge shènglì jǐnjiēzhe yī ge shènglì. One victory followed another in quick succession. 這雙鞋太緊。 Zhè shuāng xié tài jǐn. These shoes are too tight. or These shoes pinch. 2 urgent; pressing; tense 風聲緊。 Fēngshēng jǐn. Things are tense. 任務緊。 Rènwu jǐn. The task is urgent. 槍聲越來越緊。 Qiāngshēng yuèláiyuè jǐn. The firing got heavier and heavier. 雨下得正緊。 Yǔ xià de zhèng jǐn. It was raining hard. 這篇報告廠裡催得很緊。 Zhè piān bàogào chǎng lǐ cuī de hěn jǐn. The factory management is pressing us to hand in this report. 3 strict; stringent 管得緊 Guǎn de jǐn exercise strict control; be strict with 4 hard up; short of money 手頭緊 shǒutóu jǐn short of money; hard up 銀根緊。 Yíngēn jǐn. Money is tight.

verb 1 merge; amalgamate 五個組合併為兩個。 Wǔ ge zǔ hébìng wéi liǎng ge. The five groups have merged into two. 這三個提議合併討論。 Zhè sān ge tíyì hébìng tǎolùn. The three proposals will be discussed together. 該公司由幾家小公司合併組成。 Gāi gōngsī yóu jǐ jiāxiǎo gōngsī hébìng zǔchéng. This firm is an amalgamation of several small ones. 2 (of an illness) be complicated by another illness 妊娠合併糖尿病 Rènshēn hébìng tángniàobìng pregnancy complicated by diabetes
1 and so on 2 and such

adjective hard to avoid 犯錯誤是難免的, 認真改了就好。 Fàn cuòwù shì nánmiǎn de, rènzhēn gǎi le jiù hǎo. Mistakes are hard to avoid, but if you correct them conscientiously, things will be all right. 人們的看法有時難免會帶片面性。 Rénmen de kànfǎ yǒushí nánmiǎn huì dài piànmiànxìng. Sometimes people can’t help having one-sided views.

verb stop up; block up 把老鼠洞堵死 bǎ lǎoshǔ dòng dǔ sǐ stop up mouseholes 別堵著門！ Bié dǔ zhe mén! Don’t stand in the doorway! 我鼻子堵了。 Wǒ bízi dǔ le. My nose is all blocked up. adjective stifled; suffocated; oppressed 胸口堵得慌 Xiōngkǒu dǔ de huāng suffocated; feel a tightness in the chest 心裡堵得難受 xīnli dǔ de nánshòu have a load on one’s mind; feel oppressed noun archaic wall 觀者如堵。 Guānzhěrúdǔ. There was a crowd of spectators. measure word [of walls] 一堵牆 Yī dǔ qiáng a wall

verb describe; depict; portray 描寫一位畫家的成長過程 miáoxiě yī wèi huàjiā de chéngzhǎng guòchéng describe his development into painter 這段描寫非常生動。 Zhè duàn miáoxiě fēicháng shēngdòng. This description is very vivid. adjective linguistics descriptive

verb replace; substitute for; displace; take the place of 帶上一套替換的衣服。 Dài shàng yī tào tìhuàn de yīfu. Take a change of clothes with you. 教練決定讓3號替換8號。 Jiàoliàn juédìng ràng 3 hào tìhuàn 8 hào. The coach decided to replace player No. 8 with No. 3. 我們去替換值夜班的同志。 Wǒmen qù tìhuàn zhí yèbān de tóngzhì. We are going to relieve the comrades on night duty.

adjective identical; the same; alike 兩者毫無相同之處。 Liǎngzhě háowú xiāngtóng zhī chù. The two have nothing in common. 我們在這個問題上觀點相同。 Wǒmen zài zhège wèntí shàng guāndiǎn xiāngtóng. We have identical (or the same) views on this question. or We see eye to eye on this.

verb 1 found; establish; set up 成立一所學校 Chénglì yī suǒ xuéxiào set up (or establish) a school 舉行成立大會 jǔxíng chénglì dàhuì hold an inaugural meeting 中華人民共和國於1949年10月1日成立。 Zhōnghuá Rénmín Gònghéguó yú 1949nián ¹⁰yuè ¹rì chénglì. The People’s Republic of China was founded on October 1st, 1949. 2 be tenable; hold water 這個論點不能成立。 Zhège lùndiǎn bùnéng chénglì. That argument is untenable (or does not hold water).
noun swordsman; person adept in martial arts who performs chivalrous deeds (in olden times)

verb 1 rub 揉眼睛 róu yǎnjing rub one’s eyes 2 knead; roll 揉麵 róumiàn knead dough 把泥揉成小球 bǎ ní róu chéng xiǎo qiú roll the earth into small balls 把信揉成一團 bǎ xìn róu chéng yī tuán crumple a letter into a ball 3 literary bend; twist 揉木以為稼穡之具 róu mù yǐwéi jiàsè zhī jù make a farm tool out of a log

verb enjoy 享受公費醫療 Xiǎngshòu gōngfèi yīliáo enjoy public health care noun enjoyment; treat 貪圖享受 tāntú xiǎngshòu seek ease and comfort 看這樣的好戲是一種藝術享受。 Kàn zhèyàng de hǎoxì shì yī zhǒng yìshù xiǎngshòu. A good play like this is an artistic treat.
excellent (interjection)

verb 1 divide; separate; part (opp. 合) 分組討論 fēnzǔ tǎolùn hold discussions in groups 分階段實行 Fēn jiēduàn shíxíng carry out stage by stage 一年分四季。 Yī nián fēn sìjì. The year is divided into four seasons. 這藥分三次吃。 Zhè yào fēn sān cì chī. This medicine is to be taken in three separate doses. 他的頭髮往右邊分。 Tā de tóufa wǎng yòubianfēn. He parts his hair on the right side. 一條河把縣城分成兩半。 Yī tiáo hé bǎ xiànchéng fēn chéng liǎngbàn. A river divides the county town into two parts. 2 distribute; assign; allot 她分到了一套新房子。 Tā fēn dào le yī tào xīn fángzi. She has been allotted a new flat. 把這個任務分給我們吧。 Bǎ zhège rènwu fēn gěi wǒmen ba. Assign (or Give) this task to us, please. 音樂會的票都已經分完了。 Yīnyuèhuì de piào dōu yǐjing fēn wán le. The tickets for the concert have all been distributed. 大學畢業後, 他就分到外交部工作。 Dàxué bìyè hòu, tājiù fēn dào Wàijiāobù gōngzuò. After his graduation from college, he was assigned to work at the Foreign Ministry. 3 distinguish; differentiate 是非不分 shìfēibùfēn make no distinction between right and wrong 現在還分不出個勝負來。 Xiànzài hái fēn bù chū ge shèng-fù lái. It’s still quite impossible to tell who’ll win. 這對雙胞胎長得一模一樣, 簡直分不出誰是誰。 Zhè duì shuāngbāotāi zhǎng de yīmúyīyàng, jiǎnzhí fēn bù chū shuí shì shuí. The twins look so much alike that you can hardly tell them apart. adjective branch (of an organization) 新華社上海分社 Xīnhuáshè Shànghǎi fēnshè the Shanghai Branch of the Xinhua News Agency measure word 1 fraction 約分 yuēfēn reduction of a fraction 2 [in spoken forms of fractions and percentages] 三分之一 sānfēn zhīyī one-third 十分之七 shífēn zhī qī seven-tenths 百分之四 bǎifēn zhī sì four per cent 3 one tenth (of certain units of the metric system) 4 fen (of the traditional system of weights and measures) a a traditional unit of length, equal to 0.01 chi (市尺), and equivalent to 0.333 centimetre or 0.131 inch b a traditional unit of weight, equal to 0.001 jin (市斤), and equivalent to 0.5 gram or 0.175 ounce c a traditional unit of area, equal to 0.1 mu (市畝) and equivalent to 0.667 acre or 79.73 square yards d a unit of weight equal to 0.1 qian (錢) or 0.01 liang (兩) 5 fen (equal to one hundredth of a yuan (元)) 六元三角五分 liù yuán sānjiǎo wǔfēn 6.35 yuan 6 minute (equal to one sixtieth of an hour) 7 minute (equal to one sixtieth of a degree of angle or arc) 成 36 度 30分角 chéng 36 dù 30fēn jiǎo form an angle of 36 degrees 30 minutes (36°30′) 東經 129 度 15分 dōngjīng 129 dù 15 fēn 129 degrees 15 minutes (129°15′) east longitude 8 a unit of interest rate a 1% monthly interest 月利一分二釐. yuèlì yī fēn èr lí 1.2% monthly interest b 10% annual interest 年利一分二釐. niánlì yī fēn èr lí 12% annual interest 9 point; mark 六十分為及格。 Liùshí fēnwéi jígé. Sixty is the passing mark. 甲隊罰球連得二分。 Jiǎ duì fáqiú lián de èrfēn. Team A scored two successive points by free throws. 他今天考試得了一百分。 Tā jīntiān kǎoshì déle yībǎi fēn. He got full marks in today’s exam. 10 [for nonphysical things] one-tenth 七分成績, 三分錯誤 Qī fēn chéngjì, sānfēn cuòwù 70 per cent achievements, 30 per cent mistakes 他已經有三分醉了。 Tā yǐjing yǒu sānfēn zuì le. He’s a bit tipsy already. 我的牙痛好了幾分。 Wǒ de yátòng hǎo le jǐ fēn. My toothache has been partly relieved. 這消息使我多了一分希望。 Zhè xiāoxi shǐ wǒ duō le yī fēn xīwàng. The news raised my hopes a little.
measure word carat (k)
noun law prime culprit; principal criminal (or offender); principal (opp. 從犯) 主犯和從犯 zhǔfàn hé cóngfàn principal and accessories in a crime
noun 1 spoken language (opp. 書面語) 口語表達能力 kǒuyǔ biǎodá nénglì ability in oral expression 2 literary slander; calumny

noun 1 foot; leg 自首至足 zìshǒu zhì zú from head to foot; from head to toe 2 leg (of utensils) 3 football 女足 nǚzú women’s football (team) adjective enough; ample; sufficient 足吃足喝 zúchīzúhē eat and drink to full satisfaction 賺足了錢 zhuàn zú le qián make plenty of money 運動員們勁頭很足。 Yùndòngyuán men jìntóu hěn zú. The athletes are full of drive. adverb 1 fully; as much as 路上足足走了兩個鐘頭。 Lùshang zúzú zǒu le liǎng ge zhōngtóu. The journey took fully two hours. 從這裡到郵局足有二裡路。 Cóng zhèlǐ dào yóujú zú yǒu èr lǐ lù. It’s a good two li from here to the post office. 2 [usu. in the negative] enough; sufficiently 無足掛齒 wúzúguàchǐ not worth mentioning

adjective peculiar; characteristic; typical 表現出青年特有的熱情 biǎoxiàn chū qīngnián tèyǒu de rèqíng display the typical enthusiasm of youth 這是廣東人特有的說法。 Zhè shì Guǎngdōng rén tèyǒu de shuōfa. This is an expression peculiar to people from Guangdong.
noun (Jí) 1 abbreviation Jilin Province 吉劇 jíjù Jilin opera 2 abbreviation Jilin City 3 a surname adjective lucky; auspicious; propitious (opp. 凶) 吉訊 jí xùn good news
noun leading role; lead; protagonist (opp. 配角) 在該片中演主角 Zài gāi piàn zhōng yǎn zhǔjué play the lead in the film
instant; in the twinkling of an eye; in a split second; in a flash
verb provide an explanation; defend oneself 為自己的錯誤辯解 wèi zìjǐ de cuòwù biànjiě explain away one’s mistakes; be on the defensive about one’s mistakes
verb 1 rinse; wash; clean 清洗炊具 Qīngxǐ chuījù clean cooking utensils 2 purge; comb out 把腐化墮落分子清洗出去 bǎ fǔhuà duòluò fènzǐ qīngxǐ chūqu comb out the degenerates

noun 1 metals 五金 wǔjīn metals 2 money 現金 xiànjīn cash 3 ancient metal percussion instruments 鳴金收兵 míngjīnshōubīng beat the gong and recall the troops—call off the battle 4 chemistry gold (Au) 5 (Jīn) a surname adjective 1 golden 紅底金字 hóngdǐ jīnzì golden characters on a red background 2 highly respected; precious See 24239104金口玉言jin1kou3yu4yan2金口玉言 noun Jin Dynasty See DYNASTIES

verb 1 affirm; confirm; approve; regard as positive (opp. 否定) 肯定成績 kěndìng chéngjì affirm one’s achievements 他的設計得到了總工程師的肯定。 Tā de shèjì dédào le zǒnggōngchéngshī de kěndìng. His design was approved by the chief engineer. 2 be sure; have no doubt 他今天來不來, 我不能肯定。 Tā jīntiān lái bù lái, wǒ bù néng kěndìng. I’m not sure whether he will come today. adjective 1 positive; affirmative (opp. 否定) 肯定的判斷 Kěndìng de pànduàn positive assessment 他的回答是肯定的。 Tā de huídá shì kěndìng de. His answer is in the affirmative. 2 definite; certain 肯定的答復 kěndìng de dáfù definite answer adverb certainly; undoubtedly; definitely 肯定按時送到 Kěndìng ànshí sòng dào guarantee punctual delivery 情況肯定對我們有利。 qíngkuàng kěndìng duì wǒmen yǒulì. The situation is undoubtedly in our favour.
noun Paris (capital of France)

adverb a little; a bit; slightly; a trifle 稍加修改 shāo jiā xiūgǎi make slight changes; make a few alterations 稍勝一籌 shāoshèng-yīchóu a notch (or cut) above; slightly better 稍遜一籌 shāoxùnyīchóu slightly inferior 請稍等一會兒。 Qǐng shāo děng yīhuìr. Please wait a moment. or Just a moment, please. 他稍懂一點兒德語。 Tā shāo dǒng yīdiǎnr Déyǔ. He knows a little German. 這大衣稍長了一點兒。 Zhè dàyī shāo cháng le yīdiǎnr. The coat is a bit too long.

verb 1 move back; retreat (opp. 進) 退一步說 tuì yī bù shuō even if that is so; even so 敵人已經退了。 Dírén yǐjing tuì le. The enemy has retreated. 他往後退了幾步。 Tā wǎng hòu tuì le jǐ bù. He stepped back a few paces. or He backed up several steps. 2 cause to move back; withdraw; remove 把子彈退出來 bǎ zǐdàn tuì chūlai remove a cartridge from the breech of a gun; unload a gun 3 withdraw from; quit See 31861248退黨tui4dang3退黨 4 decline; recede; ebb 潮水退了。 Cháoshuǐ tuì le. The tide has receded. or The tide is on the ebb. 5 fade See 31867392退色tui4shai3退色 tuì//shǎi 6 return; give back; refund 空瓶不退。 Kōng píng bù tuì. Empty bottles are not refundable. 把這份禮退掉。 Bǎ zhè fèn lǐ tuì diào. Return this gift. 7 cancel; break off 退掉訂貨 Tuì diào dìnghuò cancel an order (for merchandise)
noun 1 peach 2 peach-shaped 棉桃 miántáo cotton boll 3 walnut

verb 1 take out (from in between); draw 從文件夾裡抽出一份申請書 cóng wénjiànjiā lǐ chōuchū yī fèn shēnqǐngshū take an application out of the file 2 take (a part from a whole) 把他抽出來管倉庫 bǎ tā chōu chūlai guǎn cāngkù release him from his job and put him in charge of the warehouse 開會前請抽時間把文件看一下。 Kāihuì qián qǐng chōu shíjiān bǎ wénjiàn kàn yīxià. Try and find time to read the document before the meeting. 3 obtain by drawing, etc. 抽骨髓 chōu gǔsuǐ draw bone marrow (for a test or transplant) 4 (of certain plants) put forth 抽枝 Chōu zhī branch out; sprout 小樹抽出了嫩芽。 Xiǎo shù chōuchū le nènyá. The saplings are budding. verb 1 shrink 這種襯衣一洗就抽。 zhèzhǒng chènyī yī xǐ jiù chōu. This shirt shrinks in the wash. 2 lash; whip; thrash 抽牲口 chōu shēngkǒu lash a draught animal 抽陀螺 Chōu tuóluó whip a top 3 sports drive 大力抽球 Dàlì chōu qiú drive hard; give a strong drive
noun archaic senior official

verb introduce; put out; present 推出新產品 tuīchū xīn chǎnpǐn put out a new product 推出一部新影片 tuīchū yī bù xīn yǐngpiàn present a new film 推出兩部新雙語詞典 tuīchū liǎng bù xīn shuāng yǔ cídiǎn put out two new bilingual dictionaries
noun patent 申請專利 shēnqǐng zhuānlì apply for (or file) a patent
noun [in place names] 畹町 Wǎndīng Wanding (a town in Yunnan Province)
verb promote sales; market; peddle 推銷商品 Tuīxiāo shāngpǐn promote the sale of goods

adverb deeply; keenly; profoundly 深深地鞠個躬 shēnshēn de jū ge gōng make a deep bow 深深地吸一口氣 shēnshēn de xī yī kǒu qì take a deep breath 深深感到友情的溫暖 shēnshēn gǎndào yǒuqíng de wēnnuǎn keenly feel the warmth of sb.’s friendship 在群眾中深深地扎下了根 zài qúnzhòng zhōng shēnshēn de zhā xià le gēn strike deep root (or take firm root) among the masses 她的話深深地銘刻在我心上。 Tā de huà shēnshēn de míngkè zài wǒ xīnshang. Her advice was indelibly engraved on my mind.
1 (taboo curse) damn it! 2 fucking

noun diversion; pastime; hobby 下棋是我喜愛的一種消遣。 Xiàqí shì wǒ xǐ'ài de yī zhǒng xiāoqiǎn. Playing chess is one of my favourite pastimes. verb divert oneself; while away the time 在火車上打撲克消遣 Zài huǒchē shàng dǎ pūkè xiāoqiǎn beguile the train journey by playing cards

noun clock

noun ability; capacity; capability 能力強 nénglì qiáng have great ability; be very capable 培養學生的推理能力 péiyǎng xuésheng de tuīlǐ nénglì develop students’ reasoning capacity 分析問題和解決問題的能力 fēnxi wèntí hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì ability to analyse and solve problems 他經驗豐富, 有能力擔當這項工作。 Tā jīngyàn fēngfù, yǒu nénglì dāndāng zhè xiàng gōngzuò. He is very experienced and can very well take on this responsibility.
verb (esp. of a teacher) put a question to; quiz 老師提問後, 他答不上來。 Lǎoshī tíwèn hòu, tā dábushànglai. The teacher asked him the question, but he couldn’t answer.

noun thickness 一尺厚的雪 yī chǐ hòu de xuě snow one chi deep 這城牆有幾丈厚。 zhè chéngqiáng yǒu jǐ zhàng hòu. The city wall is several zhang thick. verb favour; stress See 22753536厚此薄彼hou4ci3bo2bi3厚此薄彼 adjective 1 thick (opp. 薄) 厚帆布 hòu fānbù sailcloth; cottonine 厚棉衣 hòu miányī heavy padded coat 厚木板 Hòu mùbǎn thick plank 2 deep; profound 交情很厚 jiāoqing hěn hòu profound friendship 3 kind; magnanimous See 36406016忠厚zhong1hou4忠厚 4 large; generous See 22756352厚利hou4li4厚利 5 rich or strong in flavour 酒味很厚。 Jiǔwèi hěn hòu. The wine tastes strong.
verb stir; agitate; mix 攪拌混凝土 jiǎobàn hùnníngtǔ mix cement with sand 把農藥和種子攪拌在一起 Bǎ nóngyào hé zhǒngzi jiǎobàn zài yīqǐ mix insect powder with seed

verb go so far as to 你要是早請大夫看, 何至於病成這樣？ Nǐ yào shì zǎo qǐng dàifu kàn, hé zhìyú bìng chéng zhèyàng？ If you had seen the doctor earlier, you wouldn’t be so ill now. preposition as for; as to 至於其他問題, 以後再說。 Zhìyú qítā wèntí, yǐhòu zàishuō. As for other matters, we’ll take them up later. 我願意讀一讀他寫的書, 至於出版嘛, 那是另外一回事。 wǒ yuànyi dú yīdú tā xiě de shū, zhìyú chūbǎn ma, nàshi lìngwài yīhuíshì. I’m willing to read his book, but as for publishing it, that’s a different matter.
adjective multiple

verb 1 seniority among siblings 他(在家裡)排行第三。 Tā páiháng dì-sān. He’s the third child. 2 rank; place (within a grading system) 在中國排行第三 Zài Zhōngguó páiháng dì-sān rank third in China 在暢銷書中排行第二 zài chàngxiāoshū zhōng páiháng dì-èr be the second on the best-seller list

verb 1 draw; stretch; pull 引弓 yǐngōng draw a bow 2 lead; guide 引灤入津 yǐn luán rù jīn divert the water of the Luan He River to Tianjin 3 leave 引避 yǐnbì keep (or stay, steer) clear of; make way for 4 stretch out See 34753792引頸yin3jing3引頸 5 lure; induce; attract 劈柴太濕, 火引不著。 Pīchái tài shī, huǒ yǐn bu zháo. The firewood is too wet to kindle. 6 cause; make 引人深思 yǐnrénshēnsī cause one to think deeply 他這一句話引得大家都笑了起來。 tā zhè yī jù huà yǐn dé dàjiā dōu xiào le qǐlai. His remark set everybody laughing. 7 quote; cite 引書為證 yǐnshūwéizhèng cite a book as proof 引某人的話 Yǐn mǒurén de huà quote sb. 引自《中國日報》 yǐn zì 《Zhōngguó Rìbào》 quoted from China Daily measure word yin (a traditional unit of length equal to 10 zhang (市丈) and equivalent to 33 metres)
noun record of formal schooling; academic credentials 學歷教育 xuélì jiàoyù education with record of formal schooling
verb have no job; be out of work; be unemployed (opp. 就業)
noun botany durian (Durio zibethinus)

conjunction colloquial to say nothing of; not to mention; let alone 別說在下雨, 你現在出去也太晚了。 Bié shuō zài xiàyǔ, nǐ xiànzài chūqu yě tài wǎn le. It’s too late for you to go out, to say nothing of the rain. 這種動物我連聽也沒聽說過, 別說見過了。 Zhè zhǒng dòngwù wǒ lián tīng yě méi tīngshuō guò, bié shuō jiàn guò le. I haven’t never even heard of such an animal, let alone seen one.
adjective perplexed; puzzled; confused; bewildered 困惑不解 kùnhuòbùjiě feel puzzled 困惑的神色 kùnhuò de shénsè perplexed look 令人困惑的問題 Lìngrén kùnhuò de wèntí baffling problem verb confuse; puzzle

verb 1 study; research 研究自然規律 yánjiū zìrán guīlǜ study the laws of nature 科學研究 kēxué yánjiū scientific research 癌症病源研究 áizhèng bìngyuán yánjiū researches into the causes of cancer 2 consider; discuss; deliberate 這些問題正在研究。 Zhèxiē wèntí zhèngzài yánjiū. These matters are under review (or consideration).

verb 1 transport; convey 油管把原油從油田直接輸往港口。 Yóuguǎn bǎ yuányóu cóng yóutián zhíjiē shū wǎng gǎngkǒu. The pipeline carries crude oil directly from the oil field to the harbour. 2 literary contribute money; donate See 30468608輸將shu1jiang1輸將 shūjiāng verb lose; beaten; defeated (opp. 贏) 輸不起 shūbùqǐ cannot afford a loss; be a sore loser 輸得起 shū de qǐ remain untouched when defeated 輸了一局 Shū le yī jú lose one game in the set

noun 1 wind; breeze 大風 dàfēng strong wind 和風 héfēng gentle breeze 一陣風 yīzhènfēng a gust of wind 起風了。 Qǐ fēng le. The wind is rising. 2 practice; custom; tendency 此風不可長。 Cǐ fēng bù kě zhǎng. This tendency is not to be encouraged. 3 scene; view See 21041152風光feng1guang1風光 fēngguāng 4 style; attitude 文風 wénfēng style of writing 5 news; information 他剛聽見一點兒風就來打聽。 tā gāng tīngjiàn yīdiǎnrfēng jiù lái dǎting. He came to ask the moment he got wind of it. 6 one of the three sections of The Book of Songs (《詩經》) 7 Chinese medicine feng [in the names of certain diseases] 羊癇風 yángxiánfēng epilepsy verb air-dry; winnow 曬乾風凈 Shài gān fēng jìng sun-dried and well winnowed adjective 1 air-dried 風肉 fēng ròu air-dried meat 2 swift as the wind See 21038592風發feng1fa1風發 3 rumoured; unfounded See 21065216風聞feng1wen2風聞
1 copilot (abbr. for 副駕駛員fùjiàshǐyuán [副駕駛員]) 2 front passenger seat (abbr. for 副駕駛座fùjiàshǐzuò [副駕駛座])

number one half; half; in part 一半以上 Yībàn yǐshàng more than half 歉收一半由於乾旱, 一半由於蟲災。 Qiànshōu yībàn yóuyú gānhàn, yībàn yóuyú chóngzāi. The crop failure was due in part to drought and in part to insect pests. 把菜籽平分一下, 給他們一半, 咱們留一半。 bǎ càizǐ píngfēn yīxià, gěi tāmenyībàn, zánmen liú yībàn. Let’s share the vegetable seeds with them, share and share alike.
noun 1 fine works (of art); objets d'art 藝術精品 yìshù jīngpǐn art treasures 2 quality goods; articles of fine quality

adverb 1 in addition; besides 另有多少？ Lìng yǒu duōshao？ How many more are there? 2 in place of 另搞一套 lìng gǎo yī tào go one’s own way; do what suits oneself 另立戶頭 lìng lì hùtóu open another (or separate) bank account 另謀高就 lìngmóugāojiù find better employment elsewhere 另想辦法 lìng xiǎng bànfǎ find some other way 另有打算 Lìng yǒu dǎsuan have other plans 全文另發。 Quánwén lìng fā. The full text will be dispatched separately. pronoun [with nouns] different; other 另信寄上 lìng xìn jìshang send a separate letter 從一個極端跳到另一個極端 Cóng yī ge jíduān tiào dào lìng yī ge jíduān jump from one extreme to another 那是另一回事。 Nà shì lìng yī huí shì. That’s a different matter.

noun festival; red-letter day; holiday 節日氣氛 jiérì qìfēn festive air 慶祝節日 qìngzhù jiérì celebrate (or observe) a festival 致以節日的問候 zhìyǐ jiérì de wènhòu extend holiday greetings 穿上節日的盛裝 chuān shàng jiérì de shèngzhuāng in one’s holiday best; in gala dress

noun imagination 完美無缺的人只存在於人們的想象之中。 Wánměiwúquē de rén zhǐ cúnzài yú rénmen dexiǎngxiàng zhīzhōng. Perfect people exist only in imagination. verb imagine; fancy; visualize 難以想象 nányǐxiǎngxiàng hard to imagine (or visualize) 想象不到的困難 xiǎngxiàng bùdào de kùnnan unimaginable difficulties
noun literary (or artistic) talent 有才華的青年作家 Yǒu cáihuá de qīngnián zuòjiā gifted young writer
1 glistening 2 gleaming 3 lustrous
noun pickled Chinese cabbage; Chinese sauerkraut
noun retail sales

verb consult; arrange with 接洽 jiēqià take up a matter with; arrange (business, etc.) with; consult with adjective 1 in harmony; in agreement 意見不洽 yìjian bù qià have different opinions; not see eye to eye 2 extensive; wide 博識洽聞 bóshíqiàwén experienced and knowledgeable; erudite
verb 1 win; beat (opp. 輸) 我象棋下不贏他。 Wǒ xiàngqí xià bù yíng tā. I can’t beat him at Chinese chess. 這場比賽誰贏了？ Zhè chǎng bǐsài shuí yíng le？ Who won the game? 2 gain (profit)
accumulate hidden merit
literary noun gathering of people or collection of things 出類拔萃 chūlèibácuì stand out from one’s fellows verb come together; assemble 薈萃 huìcuì gather together; assemble

noun pleasure; happiness; joy 帶給人們歡樂 Dàigěi rénmenhuānlè bring pleasure to people 他認為歡樂本身是善的。 tā rènwéi huānlè běnshēn shì shàn de. He believed that only pleasure or happiness is good in itself. adjective happy; joyous 歡樂的景象 huānlè de jǐngxiàng a joyful scene 歡樂的人群 huānlè de rénqún happy crowds 給節日增添了歡樂氣氛 gěi jiérì zēngtiān le huānlè qìfēn add to the gaiety of the festival
1 to flow into 2 to converge (of river) 3 (computing) to import (data)
noun hickory; hickory nut; pecan; carya

verb (-//-) gather; assemble; muster; call together (opp. 解散) 緊急集合 Jǐnjí jíhé emergency muster 集合！ Jíhé! [word of command] Fall in! 命令全排戰士集合。 Mìnglìng quán pái zhànshì jíhé. Order the whole platoon to fall in. noun mathematics set; assemblage; collection; aggregation
verb give as a present; present as a gift 這本書是老友所贈。 zhè běn shū shì lǎoyǒu suǒ zèng. This book is a present from an old friend of mine.

verb 2 improvise 請大家會前作好發言準備, 不要臨時湊合。 Qǐng dàjiā huì qián zuò hǎo fāyán zhǔnbèi, bùyào línshí còuhe. Please prepare before coming to the meeting. Don’t speak off the cuff. 3 make do 我這件棉襖湊合著還能穿一冬。 Wǒ zhè jiàn mián'ǎo còuhe zhe hái néng chuān yī dōng. I can make this padded jacket do for another winter. 他沒有學過會計, 但還能湊合著記記賬。 Tā méiyǒu xué guò kuàijì, dàn hái néng còuhe zhe jì jì zhàng. He isn’t a trained accountant, but he manages to keep simple accounts.

adverb [usu. followed by 為 or 是] worthy of; deserve to be called; prove oneself 不愧為民族英雄 Bùkuì wéi mínzú yīngxióng be worthy of the title of national hero 她不愧是律師的女兒。 Tā bùkuì shì lǜshī de nǚ'ér. She was not the daughter of an attorney for nothing. 他們不愧為中國人民的好兒女。 Tāmen bùkuì wèi Zhōngguó rénmín de hǎo ér-nǚ. They have proved themselves fine sons and daughters of the Chinese people.

adjective 1 rough; fierce; savage; unreasoning 野蠻 yěmán savage; cruel 2 reckless; rash See 26502144蠻幹man2gan4蠻幹 noun archaic the tribes in Southern China adverb dialect quite; pretty 蠻有意思 mán yǒu yìsi quite interesting 這電影蠻好。 Zhè diànyǐng mán hǎo. This is quite a good film. or This is a pretty good film.
noun nutrition; nourishment 有營養 yǒu yíngyǎng nourishing; nutritious 缺乏營養 quēfá yíngyǎng (suffer from) inadequate nutrition

verb point out; prompt 請把學習重點向大家提示一下。 Qǐng bǎ xuéxí zhòngdiǎn xiàng dàjiā tíshì yīxià. Please brief us on the main study points. 如果她忘了臺詞, 你就給她提示一下。 Rúguǒ tā wàng le táicí, nǐ jiù gěi tā tíshì yīxià. Prompt her if she forgets her lines.
noun 1 VARIANT OF 74818730套間兒tao4jian1r5套間兒 a small room opening off another; inner room b apartment; flat 2 suite; apartment; flat 總統套房 zǒngtǒng tàofáng presidential suite

noun query; question; doubt 打消疑問 dǎxiāo yíwèn dispel sb.’s suspicion 毫無疑問 Háowú yíwèn doubtless; without a doubt; without question 有人對他是否勝任這項工作提出疑問。 Yǒurén duì tā shì-fǒu shèngrèn zhè xiàng gōngzuò tíchū yíwèn. Some people question his ability to do the job.

noun 1 news; information 本地消息 Běndì xiāoxi local news 頭版消息 tóubǎn xiāoxi a front-page story; front-page news 據新華社消息 jù Xīnhuáshè xiāoxi according to a Xinhua dispatch 2 tidings; news 你弟弟最近有消息了嗎？ Nǐ dìdi zuìjìn yǒu xiāoxi le ma？ Have you had any news of your brother? 他至今毫無消息。 Tā zhìjīn háowú xiāoxi. We have no news of him yet.

noun distance 保持一定距離 Bǎochí yīdìng jùlí keep one’s distance; remain at a distance 他的看法和你有距離。 Tā de kànfǎ hé nǐ yǒu jùlí. His opinion differs from yours. verb apart (or away) from; at a distance from 距離車站十五裡 jùlí chēzhàn shíwǔ lǐ 15 li from the station 我們的工作距離要求還很遠。 Wǒmen de gōngzuò jùlí yāoqiú hái hěn yuǎn. Our work falls far short of the standard.
noun 1 power of the Buddhist doctrine; dharma power 2 magic power 使法力 shǐ fǎlì exercise one’s magic power

verb (of a vehicle, ship, etc.) go; ply; travel 列車向南行駛。 Lièchē xiàng nán xíngshǐ. The train is going south. 長江下游可以行駛萬噸輪。 Cháng Jiāng xiàyóu kěyǐ xíngshǐ wàn dūn lún. The lower reaches of the Chang Jiang River are navigable by 10,000-ton steamers. 汽車正以每小時八十公里的速度行駛。 Qìchē zhèng yǐ měi xiǎoshí bāshí gōnglǐ de sùdù xíngshǐ. The car was doing eighty kilometres an hour.
noun 1 throat; larynx 嗓子疼 sǎngzi téng have a sore throat 清清嗓子 qīngqīng sǎngzi clear one’s throat 2 voice 嗓子好 sǎngzi hǎo have a good voice 他的嗓子啞了。 Tā de sǎngzi yā le. He’s lost his voice.

verb mutually related; interrelated 與此相關的事物 Yǔ cǐ xiāngguān de shìwù matters connected with this 體育事業和人民健康密切相關。 Tǐyù shìyè hé rénmín jiànkāng mìqiè xiāngguān. Physical culture has a direct bearing on the people’s health.

verb 1 add up; sum up 把賬攏一攏 bǎ zhàng lǒng yī lǒng sum up the accounts 2 hold (or gather) together 歸攏 guīlǒng put together 用繩子把柴火攏住。 Yòng shéngzi bǎ cháihuo lǒng zhù. Tie the firewood in a bundle. 她把孩子攏在懷裡。 Tā bǎ háizi lǒng zài huáilǐ. She held her child in her arms. 3 comb (hair) 我來給你攏一攏頭(髮)。 Wǒ lái gěi nǐ lǒng yī lǒng tóufa. Let me comb your hair. 4 dialect approach; reach 我們快攏工地了。 Wǒmen kuài lǒng gōngdì le. We are almost at the worksite now. 5 [after verbs] bring together; close 他們談不攏。 Tāmen tán bù lǒng. They talk but never get close to each other. 他笑得嘴都合不攏了。 Tā xiào de zuǐ dōu hé bù lǒng le. He grinned from ear to ear.
verb gather and take to the threshing ground 小麥已經登場。 Xiǎomài yǐjing dēngcháng. The wheat is on the threshing ground.

adjective cold and cheerless; desolate; lonely; deserted 冷清的商店 lěngqing de shāngdiàn deserted shop 冷清的舊房子 lěngqing de jiù fángzi desolate (or lonely) old house 冷清的遊樂場 lěngqing de yóulèchǎng unfrequented pleasure resort 生意冷清。 shēngyi lěngqing Business is dull. 他一個人住著很冷清。 Tā yī ge rén zhù zhe hěn lěngqing. He’s very lonely living all by himself.

verb 1 manage with an effort; do with difficulty 病人勉強喝了點兒粥。 bìngrén miǎnqiǎng hē le diǎnr zhōu. With an effort the patient ate some gruel. or The patient forced himself to take a few mouthfuls of gruel. 你最近過得怎麼樣？——勉勉強強。 Nǐ zuìjìn guò de zěnmeyàng? ——miǎnmiǎnqiǎngqiǎng. How are you recently? — Just so-so. 2 force sb. to do sth. 要是他不願意去, 就不要勉強他。 Yào shì tā bù yuànyi qù, jiù bùyào miǎnqiǎng tā. If he doesn’t want to go, don’t force him to. adjective 1 reluctant; grudging 勉強協助 miǎnqiǎng xiézhù give reluctant assistance 勉強許諾 miǎnqiǎng xǔnuò give a reluctant promise 2 inadequate; unconvincing; strained; far-fetched 勉強多數 miǎnqiǎng duōshù a bare majority 你的理由很勉強。 Nǐ de lǐyóu hěn miǎnqiǎng. Your reasons are unconvincing. adverb 1 reluctantly; grudgingly; unwillingly 勉強同意 miǎnqiǎng tóngyì reluctantly agree 勉強笑了笑 miǎnqiǎng xiào le xiào force a smile 勉強維持生活 miǎnqiǎng wéichí shēnghuó eke out a bare living; scrape along 他接受了我們的建議, 但是很勉強。 Tā jiēshòu le wǒmen de jiànyì, dànshì hěn miǎnqiǎng. He accepted our suggestion, but rather grudgingly. 2 barely 勉強及格 miǎnqiǎng jígé barely pass the examination; only just make the grade

noun standard; criterion 不夠標準 bùgòu biāozhǔn substandard; below (or under) the standard (or mark) 合乎標準 Héhū biāozhǔn up to standard (or mark) 公認的標準 Gōngrèn debiāozhǔn accepted standard 按我們的標準來看 àn wǒmen de biāozhǔn lái kàn by our standards 用高標準要求自己 yòng gāo biāozhǔn yāoqiú zìjǐ set high demands on oneself; set high standards for oneself 真理的標準只能是社會實踐。 zhēnlǐ debiāozhǔn zhǐnéng shì shèhuì shíjiàn. Social practice alone can be the criterion for truth. adjective serving as or conforming to a standard
noun pig; hog; swine 公豬 gōngzhū boar 母豬 mǔzhū sow 小豬(羔) Xiǎo zhū pigling; piglet

verb include; consist of; comprise; incorporate 報價中不包括運費。 bàojià zhōng bù bāokuò yùnfèi. Carriage is not included in the quotation. 房租每月四百元, 水電費包括在內。 Fángzū měi yuè sìbǎi yuán, shuǐ-diànfèi bāokuò zàinèi. The rent is 400 yuan a month, including water and electricity. 他的報告包括三個方面。 Tā de bàogào bāokuò sān ge fāngmiàn. His report touched on three aspects. 我們的設計已經包括了你們的意見。 Wǒmen de shèjì yǐjing bāokuò le nǐmen de yìjian. Our design has incorporated your suggestions.

noun heavily fortified point; fortification; stronghold 攻堅 gōngjiān assault fortified position adjective hard; solid; firm; strong 堅冰 jiānbīng solid ice; hard ice 堅城 jiānchéng fortified city 身殘志堅 shēncánzhìjiān disabled in body but firm in will adverb firmly; steadfastly; flatly; resolutely 堅稱 jiānchēng state insistently 堅拒 jiānjù flatly refuse
verb settle (or square) accounts; balance the books 服務員, 結賬。 Fúwùyuán, jiézhàng. Waiter, bill, please!
adjective harmoniously combine or arrange; go well together; match 瞧她的繡品, 深淺顏色多配合！ Qiáo tā de xiùpǐn, shēnqiǎn yánsè duō pèihe! What a wonderful combination of shades in her embroidery!

noun programme; project; plan 長遠規劃 chángyuǎn guīhuà long-term programme 城市規劃 chéngshì guīhuà city planning verb set up a programme; draw up a plan 興修水利, 應當全面規劃。 Xīngxiū shuǐlì, yīngdāng quánmiàn guīhuà. An overall plan should be made for the construction of water conservancy projects.
1 necessary (for) 2 required
to look (pretty, the same etc)
noun Europe
noun example; model 厲行節約的出色範例 Lìxíngjiéyuē de chūsè fànlì an outstanding example of strict economy

verb fall; tumble; lose one's balance 摔倒 shuāidǎo fall down 他把腿摔斷了。 Tā bǎ tuǐ shuāi duàn le. He had a fall and broke his leg. 他摔了好多次才學會騎自行車。 Tā shuāi le hǎoduō cì cái xuéhuì qí zìxíngchē. He fell off many times before he learned to ride a bicycle. verb 1 hurtle down; plunge 飛機摔下來了。 Fēijī shuāi xià lái le. The plane plunged to the ground. 2 cause to fall and break; break 我不小心把玻璃杯摔了。 Wǒ bù xiǎoxīn bǎ bōlibēi shuāi le. I accidentally broke a glass. 3 cast; throw; fling 把帽子往床上一摔 Bǎ màozi wǎng chuáng shàng yī shuāi throw one’s cap onto the bed 4 VARIANT OF 30559488摔打shuai1da5摔打1 beat; knock

noun opportunity; opportune moment 時機一到 shíjī yī dào when the opportunity arises; at the opportune moment 時機的選擇 shíjī de xuǎnzé choice of the right moment; timing 等待時機 děngdài shíjī wait for an opportunity; bide one’s time 錯過最有利的時機 cuòguò zuì yǒulì de shíjī let slip a golden opportunity 抓住每一個可利用的時機 Zhuāzhù měi yī ge kě lìyòng deshíjī seize (or take) every opportunity available 時機已經成熟, 可以行動了。 shíjī yǐjing chéngshú, kěyǐ xíngdòng le. The time is ripe for action.

verb 1 literary support; take; bring 將幼弟而歸 jiāng yòu dì ér guī bring home one’s little brother 相將而去 xiāng jiāng ér qù go off supporting each other 2 take care of (one's health) See 23884288將養jiang1yang3將養 3 literary do sth.; handle (a matter) 慎重將事 shènzhòng jiāng shì handle a matter with care 4 chess check 將！ Jiāng! Check! 將死 jiāngsǐ check mate 他連將我三次。 Tā lián jiāng wǒ sān cì. He checked me three times in a row. 5 put sb. on the spot 我們這一問可把他將住了。 Wǒmen zhè yī wèn kě bǎ tā jiāng zhù le. Our question certainly put him on the spot. 6 incite sb. to action; challenge; prod 他已拿定主意不參加比賽了, 你再將他也沒用。 Tā yǐ nádìng zhǔyi bù cānjiā bǐsài le, nǐ zài jiāng tā yě méiyòng. It’s no use egging him on; he’s made up his mind not to take part in the tournament. 7 dialect (of domestic animals) give birth to; breed 將駒 jiāng jū give birth to a foal adverb usually literary 1 be going to; be about to; will; shall 船將啟碇。 Chuán jiāng qǐ dìng. The ship is about to weigh anchor. 天色將暗。 tiānsè jiāng àn. It’s almost dusk. 我們將制定一個長遠規劃。 Wǒmen jiāng zhìdìng yī ge chángyuǎn guīhuà. We are going to draw up a long-range plan. 2 certainly; no doubt 如不刻苦鑽研, 則將一事無成。 Rú bù kèkǔ zuānyán, zé jiāng yīshìwúchéng. You will certainly achieve nothing unless you study assiduously. 3 besides; and; also See 23884032將信將疑jiang1xin4jiang1yi2將信將疑 4 just; barely 將夠吃 jiāng gòu chī barely enough to eat preposition 1 with; by means of; by 將酒消愁 jiāngjiǔxiāochóu take to drinking trying to forget one’s sorrows 2 [used in the same way as 把 2] 將他請來 jiāng tā qǐng lái invite him to come over 將傳統文明與現代文明熔為一體 jiāng chuántǒng wénmíng yǔ xiàndài wénmíng róng wéi yītǐ fuse traditional culture with modern civilization auxiliary dialect [between a verb and its complement of direction] 唱將起來 Chàng jiāng qǐlai start to sing 傳將出去 chuán jiāng chūqu (of news, etc.) spread abroad 趕將上去 gǎn jiāng shàng qù hurry to catch up
not know why it is so
noun diplomacy; foreign affairs 穿梭外交 chuānsuō wàijiāo shuttle diplomacy 乒乓外交 pīngpāng wàijiāo ping-pong diplomacy 通過外交途徑解決 Tōngguò wàijiāo tújìng jiějué settle through diplomatic channels

noun dress; apparel 穿著入時 chuānzhuó rùshí be fashionably dressed 穿著大方得體 chuānzhuó dàfang détǐ be decently dressed 穿著樸素整潔 chuānzhuó pǔsù zhěngjié be plainly but neatly dressed

noun 1 (of an animal, plant, etc.) hair; feather; down 桃子的皮上有細毛。 Táozi de pí shàng yǒu xìmáo. A peach has downy skin. 這馬長得一身好毛。 Zhè mǎ zhǎng de yī shēn hǎo máo. The horse has a fine coat of hair. 2 (of humans) hair; beard 眉毛 méimáo eyebrows 3 plant; crop 不毛之地 bùmáozhīdì barren land 4 wool 毛襪 máowà woollen stocks 這件夾克衫是棉的還是毛的？ Zhè jiàn jiákè shān shì mián de hái shì máo de？ Is this jacket cotton or woollen? 5 mildew; mould 長了毛的麵包 Zhǎng le máo de miànbāo mouldy bread 6 (Máo) a surname adjective 1 rough; semi-finished See 26568448毛坯mao2pi1毛坯 2 gross See 26566400毛利mao2li4毛利 3 little; small 毛賊 máozéi petty thief; pilferer 4 thin See 26569472毛渠mao2qu2毛渠 adjective 1 careless; crude; rash 毛頭毛腦 máotóumáonǎo rash; impetuous 2 panic; scared; nervous 發毛 fāmáo flustered 嚇毛了 xiàmáole scared 3 dialect get angry; lose one's temper 把他惹毛了 bǎ tā rě máo le made him angry verb colloquial 1 (of currency) no longer worth its face value; depreciated 錢毛了。 Qián máo le. Money has gone down in value. 2 (of horses, cattle, etc.) be startled measure word colloquial mao (a fractional unit of money in China, equal to 1/10 yuan or 10 fen) 一毛錢 Yī máo qián one mao 這支筆幾毛錢？——四毛。 Zhè zhī bǐ jǐ máo qián？ —— sì máo. How much is this pen?—Four mao.

adverb 1 perhaps; maybe; probably 代表團明晨或可到達。 Dàibiǎotuán míng chén huò kě dàodá. The delegation may arrive tomorrow morning. 2 literary [usu. in the negative] a little; a bit; slightly 不可或緩 bùkěhuòhuǎn brook no delay; urgent conjunction or; either... or... 無論唱或跳, 她都行。 Wúlùn chàng huò tiào, tā dōu xíng. She is good at both singing and dancing. 這塊地可以種高粱或玉米。 Zhè kuài dì kěyǐ zhòng gāoliang huò yùmǐ. You can grow sorghum or maize on this plot. pronoun literary someone; some people 或曰 huòyuē some may say; some people say

verb [usu. in the negative] take offence; mind 我是開玩笑, 你可別介意呀。 Wǒ shì kāi wánxiào, nǐ kě bié jièyì ya. Please don’t take offence; I was only joking. 即使有些批評過頭了, 他也不介意。 Jíshǐ yǒu xiē pīpíng guò tóu le, tā yě bù jièyì. He didn’t mind even when some criticisms were excessive.

noun usually literary nowadays; now 如今很少有人用毛筆了。 Rújīn hěn shǎo yǒurén yòng máobǐ le. Few people use writing brushes nowadays. 如今咱們山村也有了自己的大學生。 Rújīn zánmen shāncūn yě yǒu le zìjǐ de dàxuéshēng. Now our mountain village has its own college students.

adverb usually literary still; yet; as before 至今仍然未見回音。 Zhìjīn réngrán wèijiàn huíyīn. As yet, we have received no answer. 等候半天, 她仍然未到。 Děnghòu bàntiān, tā réngrán wèi dào. We’ve been waiting a long time for her, but she still hasn’t arrived. 他把信看完, 仍然裝回信封。 Tā bǎ xìn kànwán, réngrán zhuāng huí xìnfēng. He put the letter back into the envelope after he’d read it.

Looking ahead, we are filled with great confidence. 3 forecast; prospect (opp. 回顧) 二十一世紀展望 Èrshíyī shìjì zhǎnwàng prospects for the 21st century; 21st century predictions

verb 1 read 2 study; attend school 他在北大念書。 Tā zài Běi Dà niànshū. He studies at Beijing University.

adjective 1 deputy; assistant; vice- (opp. 正, 主) 副教授 fùjiàoshòu associate professor 副總理 fùzǒnglǐ vice-premier 副國務卿 fùguówùqīng deputy secretary of state (飛機)副駕駛員 (fēijī) fù jiàshǐyuán copilot 2 auxiliary; subsidiary; secondary 副泵 fù bèng auxiliary pump noun assistant post; person who takes an assistant post 大副 dàfù first (chief) mate verb correspond to; fit 名不副實。 míngbùfùshí The name fails short of the reality. measure word 1 [for a set of sth.] 一副手套 yī fù shǒutào a pair of gloves 2 [for facial expression] 一副笑臉 yī fù xiàoliǎn a smiling face 裝出一副莊嚴的面孔 zhuāng chū yī fù zhuāngyán de miànkǒng put on solemn looks; assume a solemn face

verb 1 lead; guide 導淮入海 Dǎo Huái rù hǎi channel the Huai He River into the sea 2 transmit; conduct See 19697664導電dao3dian4導電 3 instruct; teach; give guidance to 教導 jiàodǎo instruct noun colloquial abbreviation 1 VARIANT OF 19703040導演dao3yan3導演 2 VARIANT OF 19703552導遊dao3you2導遊 1 李導 Lǐ dǎo Director Li (or Guide Li)

verb stroll; ramble; roam 逛街 guàngjiē stroll around the streets; go window-shopping 逛公園 guàng gōngyuán go for a walk in the park 咱們哪天到上海逛逛去吧。 Zánmen nǎ tiān dào Shànghǎi guàng guàng qù ba. Let’s go sightseeing in Shanghai sometime.

verb just when; just the time for 正當春耕之時 zhèngdāng chūngēng zhī shí just the time for spring ploughing 正當人手少的時候, 他們來了。 Zhèngdāng rénshǒu shǎo de shíhou, tāmen lái le. They came to help just when we were short of hands.

verb 1 string together 把魚串起來 Bǎ yú chuàn qǐlai string the fish together 2 conspire; gang up See 19023104串通chuan4tong1串通 3 get things mixed up 字印得太小, 很容易看串行。 Zì yìn de tài xiǎo, hěn róngyì kàn chuàn háng. The print is too small, and you can easily miss (or skip) a line. 4 go from place to place; run about; rove 串親戚 chuàn qīnqi go visiting one’s relatives 到處亂串 Dàochù luàn chuàn run about aimlessly 5 play a part (in a play); act 客串 kèchuàn be a guest performer measure word [for a string of things] string; bunch; cluster 一串葡萄 yī chuàn pútao a cluster of grapes 一串鑰匙 yī chuàn yàoshi a bunch of keys 一串珠子 yī chuàn zhūzi a string of beads

noun delight; pleasure; joy 家庭樂趣 jiātíng lèqù homely pleasures 生活的樂趣 shēnghuó delèqù joys of life 要在工作中找到樂趣, 得先把工作做好。 Yào zài gōngzuò zhōng zhǎodào lèqù, děi xiān bǎ gōngzuò zuò hǎo. Joy in work comes from mastery.
verb save life; rescue 救命！ Jiùmìng! Help!
verb pass through; cut across 穿越國境 Chuānyuè guójìng cross the border 鐵路穿越原始森林。 Tiělù chuānyuè yuánshǐ sēnlín. The railway cuts through a primeval forest.

noun 1 figure; personage 領袖人物 Lǐngxiù rénwù leading personage; leading public figure 英雄人物 yīngxióng rénwù heroic figure; hero or heroine 知名人物 zhīmíng rénwù eminent figure 他也算個人物了。 Tā yě suàn ge rénwù le. He’s really somebody. or He’s quite a distinguished individual now. 2 person in literature; character 典型人物 diǎnxíng rénwù typical character

adjective 1 spirited; vigorous 小明帶上紅領巾多神氣。 Xiǎo míng dài shàng hónglǐngjīn duō shénqì. Xiaoming looks quite impressive with his red scarf on. 2 putting on airs; cocky; overweening 呵！ 他倒神氣起來了。 Hē! Tā dào shénqì qǐlai le. Humph! What airs he gives himself! 你神氣什麼？ Nǐ shénqì shénme？ What makes you think you’re so wonderful? or You’ve got nothing to be cocky about. noun expression; air; manner 臉上顯出得意的神氣 Liǎn shàng xiǎnchū déyì deshénqì have an air of complacency 他說話的神氣特別像他爸爸。 Tā shuōhuà de shénqì tèbié xiàng tā bàba. He is very much like his father in the way he speaks.
verb recommend 向青年推薦優秀的文學作品 xiàng qīngnián tuījiàn yōuxiù de wénxué zuòpǐn recommend outstanding literary works to young people
verb measure; calculate; count; estimate 這項發明影響之大不可計量。 Zhè xiàng fāmíng yǐngxiǎng zhī dà bùkě jìliàng. The influence of the invention is inestimable.

verb 1 guess; conjecture; speculate 別亂猜一氣！ bié luàn cāi yīqì! Don’t make wild guesses! 他準猜不著。 Tā zhǔn cāi bu zháo. He’s sure to guess wrong. 你猜這本書多少錢？ Nǐ cāi zhè běn shū duōshao qián? Guess how much the book costs? 這個謎語很好猜。 zhège míyǔ hěn hǎo cāi. This riddle is really easy to solve. 2 suspect 我猜他和這件事有點兒牽連。 Wǒ cāi tā hé zhè jiàn shì yǒudiǎnr qiānlián. I suspect he is somewhat involved in this affair.

The road is slippery. 2 cunning; crafty; slippery 又奸又滑 yòu jiān yòu huá mean and crafty

noun 1 cotton cloth; cloth 洗碗布 Xǐwǎn bù dish-cloth 把車用塊乾凈的布擦一擦 Bǎ chē yòng kuài gānjìng de bù cā yī cā. wipe the car with a clean cloth 2 cloth-like sheet 塑料布 sùliàobù plastic cloth 3 an ancient coin verb 1 declare; announce; publish; proclaim See 20587008發布fa1bu4發布;21690368公布gong1bu4公布 2 spread; disseminate 布滿血絲的眼睛 bù mǎn xiěsī de yǎnjing bloodshot eyes 陰雲密布。 Yīnyúnmìbù. The sky is overcast. 桌上布滿灰塵。 zhuō shàng bù mǎn huīchén. The desk is covered with dust. 3 dispose; arrange; deploy 布崗 bùgǎng deploy sentinels 布好陣勢 Bù hǎo zhènshì deploy the troops in battle formation 布下天羅地網 bù xià tiānluódìwǎng cast an escape-proof net
adjective marvellous; wonderful; intriguing 世界真奇妙。 shìjiè zhēn qímiào. The world is full of wonders.
raise money (or funds); fund raise

verb 1 use; utilize; make use of 利用廢料 lìyòng fèiliào make use of scrap material; turn scrap material to good account 利用假日為社區做好事 lìyòng jiàrì wèi shèqū zuò hǎoshì give a helping hand to one’s neighbourhood while on holidays 充分利用最新科技成就 chōngfèn lìyòng zuìxīn kējì chéngjiù make full use of the latest achievements in science and technology 2 take advantage of; exploit 利用外資 lìyòng wàizī introduce (or absorb) foreign investment; utilize foreign capital (or funds) 利用職權 Lìyòng zhíquán take advantage of one’s position and power; exploit one’s office 利用公款吃喝 lìyòng gōngkuǎn chīhē entertain guests at public expense 互相利用 hùxiāng lìyòng each using the other for his own ends 受人利用 shòu rén lìyòng be made use of; be a cat’s-paw
noun chessboard; checkerboard
verb abandon; forsake; cast aside 拋棄妻兒 Pāoqì qīr abandon one’s wife and kids 被人民所拋棄 bèi rénmín suǒ pāoqì be abandoned (or spurned) by the people
verb duplicate; reproduce; make a copy of 複製模型 fùzhì móxíng reconstruct a model

verb not have; there is not; be without 無一定計劃 Wú yīdìng jìhuà without a definite plan conjunction regardless of; no matter whether, what, etc. 事無大小, 都有人負責。 Shì wú dà xiǎo, dōu yǒurén fùzé. Everything, big and small, is properly taken care of. adverb 1 not 無礙大局 wú'àidàjú not affect the situation as a whole 2 VARIANT OF 32521728毋wu2毋 wú literary no; not affix [placed before a noun to form another noun or verb] See 32506880無形wu2xing2無形

adjective unusual; abnormal 異常天氣 yìcháng tiānqì anomalous weather 異常現象 Yìcháng xiànxiàng abnormal phenomena 異常行為 yì cháng xíng wéi behaviour disorder 神色異常 shénsè yìcháng not be one’s usual self adverb extremely; exceedingly; particularly 異常豐富 yìcháng fēngfù exceedingly rich 異常危險 yìcháng wēixiǎn extremely dangerous 異常需要 yìcháng xūyào particularly necessary
1 preview 2 to preview
verb literary write (articles) 撰寫評論文章 zhuànxiě pínglùn wénzhāng write a commentary

verb feel surprised; wonder 我奇怪他怎麼不來。 Wǒ qíguài tā zěnme bù lái. I wonder why he didn’t come. 他們都奇怪你為什麼要辭職。 Tāmen dōu qíguài nǐ wèishénme yào cízhí. They feel surprised at your resignation. 我們都奇怪為什麼這點兒小事就是辦不了。 wǒmen dōu qíguài wèishénme zhèdiǎnr xiǎoshì jiùshì bànbuliǎo. We really don’t understand why such a small matter is so hard to settle. 這個人雖然住我隔壁, 但奇怪的是我從未見到他。 Zhège rén suīrán zhù wǒ gébì, dàn qíguài de shì wǒ cóngwèi jiàn dào tā. He lives right next door, but strangely enough I’ve never seen him. adjective strange; surprising; odd 奇怪的聲音 qíguài de shēngyīn strange noise 奇怪的現象 qíguài de xiànxiàng unusual phenomena 這個問題提得很奇怪。 Zhège wèntí tí de hěn qíguài. It’sa strange question to raise. 各有各的愛好, 沒什麼奇怪 。 Gè yǒu gè de àihào, méi shénme qíguài. Everyone has his or her own hobby. It’s only natural. 螢火蟲很奇怪, 身體能發光。 Yínghuǒchóng hěn qíguài, shēntǐ néng fāguāng. The firefly is a strange insect that can give off light. 真奇怪, 他們至今還一無所知。 Zhēn qíguài, tāmen zhìjīn hái yīwúsuǒzhī. It’sreally surprising that they should still be in the dark. 隕石雨是一種自然現象, 沒有什麼可奇怪的。 Yǔnshíyǔ shì yī zhǒng zìrán xiànxiàng, méiyǒu shénme kě qíguài de. A meteorite shower is a natural phenomenon; there’s nothing strange about it.

verb unable; incapable 無法形容 wúfǎ xíngróng beyond description 無法應付 wúfǎ yìngfu unable to cope with; at the end of one’s resources 無法解脫的困境 wúfǎ jiětuō de kùnjìng inextricable dilemma 局勢無法控制。 Júshì wúfǎ kòngzhì. The situation was out of control.

verb capture; occupy; seize 占領市場 zhànlǐng shìchǎng dominate the market 占領要塞 Zhànlǐng yàosài capture a fort 二戰期間德軍占領法國達四年之久。 Èrzhàn qījiān Déjūn zhànlǐng Fǎguó dá sì nián zhījiǔ. During World War II, German occupation of France lasted four years.
Ni Kuang (1935-2022), Chinese novelist and screenwriter
